upadarśitakrameṇa saṃkliṣṭaṃ saṃkleśasaṃprayuktaṃ niṣphalavyāpāraṃ vā jñātvā svacittaṃ sarvapravṛttinigedhena prabhāvamandatāṃ vidhāya nigṛhṇīyād abhibhavet. dṛḍhaṃ yathā punar api samudācāradharmakaṃ na bhavati. kleśādisaṃgrāme vijayāya kṛtaparikaraḥ śuro bodhisattvaḥ. pratipakṣeṇa yo yasmin pratipakṣa uktaḥ yathā rāgādāv aśubhādi, tena tadviparītavidhānenety arthaḥ. sadā sarvakālam, yadā yadā saṃkliṣṭaṃ pratīyate. ugraparipṛcchāyāṃ gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisattvamadhikṛtyoktam—

	tena surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānāt prativiratena bhavitavyam, amattena anunmattena acapalena acañcalena abhrāntena amukhareṇa anunnatena upasthitasmṛtināsasaṃprajanyena.

iti. atraiva ca—

	pravrajitaṃ bodhisattvam adhikṛtyoktam. smṛtisaṃprajanyasyāvikṣepaḥ.

iti. tathā āryatathāgataguhyasūtre darśitam—

	na khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisattvasya vāg raktā vā duṣṭā vā mūḍhā vā kliṣṭā vā kṣaṇavyākaraṇī vā svapakṣotkarṣaṇavacanā vā parapakṣanigrahavacanā vā ātmavarṇānunayavacanā vā paravarṇapratighātavacanā vā pratijñottāraṇavacanā vā ābhimānikavyākaraṇavacanā vā ||

iti. evaṃ niṣphalaspandavarjanenānarthād ātmabhāvasya rakṣā pratipāditā bhavati. tasmān mayā śīlasusthitenāprakampenāśithilena bhavitavyam iti.

etac ca samāhitacittasya sidhyati. ata idaṃ śamathamāhātmyam avagamya tātparyeṇa bhāvayitavyam. anena tīvra ādaro bhavati śikśāsu. tenāpi smṛtir upatiṣṭhate. upasthitasmṛtir niṣphalaṃ varjayati. tasyānarthā na saṃbhavanti. tasmād ātmabhāvaṃ rakṣitukāmena smṛtimūlam anviṣya nityam upasthitasmṛtinā bhavitavyam. etad evāha—

	tatrātmabhāve kā rakṣā yadanarthavivarjanam |
	kena tallabhyate sarve niṣphalaspandavarjanāt ||

	etatsidhyetsadā smṛtyā smṛtistīvrādarādbhavet |
	ādaraḥ śamamāhātmyaṃ jñātvātāpena jāyate || (Śikṣāsamuccaya 7–8)

iti |

śamathamāhātmyaṃ tu yathāvasaram ihaiva kathayiṣyate.

anekaiś ca vajrayogivajrayoginīgaṇaiḥ । tadyathā । śvetācalena ca vajrayoginā । pītācalena ca vajrayoginā । raktācalena ca vajrayoginā । śyāmācalena ca vajrayoginā । mohavajryā ca vajrayoginyā । piśunavajryā ca vajrayoginyā । rāgavajryā ca vajrayoginyā । īrṣyāvajryā ca vajrayoginyā । evaṃ pramukhair yogiyoginīkoṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ ||1.1||
commentary:
evaṃ mayetyādyāha saṅgītikāraḥ | nidānavākyaṃ etat | yasmāt saṅgītikāreṇa sūtratantrādāv avaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ | bhagavato vacanāt | tathā ca | evaṃ mayā śrutam iti kṛtvā bhikṣavo mama dharmaḥ saṅgātavyam ityādi | evaṃ sati | 

śraddhāvatāṃ pravṛttyaṅgaṃ śāstā parṣac ca sākṣiṇi | 
deśakālau ca nirdiṣṭau svaprāmāṇyaprasiddhaye || iti pratipāditaṃ bhavati ||

tatra | evam iti yathā saṃgāsyāmi | mayety anena viparītaśrutaparaṃparāśrutayor nirāsaḥ | etenātmanaḥ sākṣāt śrutam aviparītaṃ ca pratipādayati | śrutam iti śrotajñānenādhigatam | ekasmin samaya iti | ekasmin kāle | anyasmin kāle tv anyad api śrutam ity arthaḥ | etenātmano bāhuśrutyam etattantrasya daurlabhyaṃ ca pratipādayati | bhagavān iti | bhagā aiśvaryādayaḥ | tathā ca | aiśvaryasya samagrasya jñānasya yaḥ yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ rūpasyātha prayatnasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhagasya iti śrutiḥ || tāni vidyante 'syeti rāgādikleśabhañjanād vā | 
vajrasattva iti | vajram abhedyaṃ sattvam arthakriyākāritvam asyeti | athavā vajra iva vajraḥ sa cāsau sattvaḥ prāṇī ceti | sarvetyādi | sarve ca te tathāgatāś ca teṣāṃ kāyavākcittaṃ jīvaccharīra tasya hṛdayam atyantābhilaṣaṇīyatvāt | tad eva vajradhātvīśvarībhagam ||

vajro liṅgaṃ tasya dhātuḥ sāṃvṛtavivṛtatvalakṣaṇaḥ | bodhicittaṃ tasyeśvarī vā prajñā vajradhātunā sevitatvāt tasyāḥ | tadvarāṅge bhage vijahāreti | vihṛtavān vajrapadmasaṃyogena sampuṭayogena sthitavān ity arthaḥ | ayaṃ ca vihāraḥ prākṛtajanasyāpy atyantagupto bhavati kiṃ punar bhagavato vajrasattvasya | tataś cārthād uktaṃ bhavati | sumerugirimūrdhnivajrasatvabhūmau vajramaṇiśikharakūṭāgāre viharati smeti | etena śāstrā kālo deśaś coktaḥ ||

parṣadaṃ vaktum āha | anekaiścetyādi | vajrayoginaḥ | śvetācalādayaḥ | vajrayoginyo mohavajryādayaḥ | teṣām tāsāṃ ca gaṇāḥ samūhā ekarasāktāḥ bahuvacanaṃ tv ekavacanasyāpi pañcatathāgatātmatvāt ||

tadyathetyupadarśane | śvetācaleneti bhagavato bhagavatīdehagatarūpajñānena | evaṃ pītācaleneti | bhagavatīdehagatagandhajñānena | raktācaleneti | bhagavatīdehagatarasajñānena | śyāmācaleneti | bhagavatīdehagatasparśajñānenana || 

mohavajryā ceti | bhagavatyo bhagavaddehagatarūpajñānena | piśunavajryā ceti bhagaddehagatagandhajñānena | rāgavajryā ceti bhagavaddehagatarasajñānena | īrṣyāvajryā ceti bhagavaddehagatasparśajñānena | svayaṃ tu bhagavān bhagavatīdehagataśabdajñāne rūpaḥ | bhagavatī tu bhagavaddehegataśabdajñānarūpā ato naitat prabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ ||

evaṃ pramukhair iti | evaṃprakāraiḥ | cakṣuṣā ghrāṇena rasanayā kāyena śrotreṇa rūpeṇa vedanayā saṃjñayā saṃskāreṇa vijñānena pṛthivyā jalena tejasā vāyūnā ākāśena ityādibhir ityarthaḥ | etenaivamvidhe vihāre parṣaddevyopyetāddṛśyo bodhicitte tu kathitaṃ bhavati ||

commentary:
tad eva lakṣaṇavyañjanātmani rūpakāye 'nabhisaṃskārāl lakṣaṇaśūnyatā || balavaiśāradyādisvabhāvadharmakāyānabhisaṃskārāt sarvadharmaśūnyatā || pudgaladharmāsamāropaṇād abhāvaśūnyatā || yathoktaśūnyatālakṣaṇāpavādānabhisaṃskaraṇāc ca abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā | ataś cāha mahāmāyetyādi |

tatra mahāmāyādharo vidvān iti vajraviśvaḥ | māyeti sarvatathāgatavicitravipulodārapūjānirmāṇaṃ tad dhārayatīti māyādharaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau māyādharaś ceti mahāmāyādharaḥ | ata eva vidvān paṇḍitas tena pūjākarmaṇā puṇyasaṃbhāropārjanāt || mahāmāyārthasādhaka iti vajrarakṣaḥ | māyārtheti nirmāṇārthaḥ | tena kusīdasattvāni sādhayati protsāhayatīti māyārthasādhakaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau mayārthasādhakaś ceti mahāmāyārthasādhakaḥ | mahāmāyāratirata iti vajrayakṣaḥ | māyāyāṃ ratir māyāratiḥ | tathāgatapūjānirmāṇaratir ity arthaḥ | māyāratau rataḥ sakto māyāratirataḥ | mahāṃś cāsau māyāratirataś ca mahāmāyāratirataḥ || mahāmāyendrajālika iti vajramuṣṭiḥ | māyendrajālaṃ nirmāṇasamūhaṃ kāyavākcittavajrāṇām ekībhāvaḥ | tad vettīti māyendrajālikaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau māyendrajālikaś ca mahāmāyendrajālikaḥ || vṛddhyabhāvo 'tra draṣṭavyaḥ saddharmapāṭhāt || 

tataś ca kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānāśrayavajrakarmādicatuṣṭayātmakaṃ cakṣurādivijñānaparāvṛttyātmani kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñāne sati | uktaviparyāsāpahrāsamukhena samastasugatapūjābhisaṃrakṣaṇavighnopaśamakāyādiśūnyatājñānakāraṇatvāt | ata eva caiṣāṃ vajraviśvādīnāṃ krama iti ||

root: ity ekallavīrākhye śrīcaṇḍamahāroṣaṇatantre tantrāvatāraṇapaṭalaḥ prathamaḥ || 1.20 ||
commentary: tantrasyāvatāraṇas upodghātaḥ prastāvanety ekārthaḥ | tat pradhānaṃ paṭalaḥ paricchedaḥ || iti prathamapaṭalavyākhyā ||

root: ity ekallavīrākhye śrīcaṇḍamahāroṣaṇatantre tantrāvatāraṇapaṭalaḥ prathamaḥ || 1.20 ||
commentary: caturānandasvabhāvā kāyikī karmamudroktaiva | vācasīṃ dharmamudrāṃ caturānandasvabhāvām āha—vicitram ityādi | karmamudrāto nimittāt sadgurūpadeśena vacasā pratīyamānā jagadātmatā citrollekhatvād vicitram | saiva ca bhāvanayā nirvedhābhimukhyā citrollekhāpagamād vipākaḥ | tatra jagadātmatāyāṃ bhāvanāprakarṣād yad anullekhasya sthairyaṃ tad vilakṣaṇam | itthaṃ sarvākāravaropetaśūnyatākhyajagadātmatāyāṃ sthairye 'pi bhāvakasya yogino 'pratiṣṭhānādhimokṣeṇa tathaiva vyavaharamāṇasya yaj jagadīkṣaṇam ālocanaṃ sa vimardaḥ | eṣu vicitrādiṣv ānandacatuṣṭayaṃ kramato yojyam | atrāpi "caturthaṃ tat punas tatheti" caturthaṃ pūrvavat | yadā "eka eva suratānandaś catuḥsaṅkhyāvicchinnaḥ" iti vacanāt sarvaṃ sahajarūpaṃ tadā dharmamudrā caturānandarūpaika eva paramānandaḥ ||

atha bhagavān vajrasattvaḥ kṛṣṇācalasamādhiṃ samāpadyedam udājahāra |
bhāvābhāvavinirmuktaś caturānandaikatatparaḥ |
niṣprapañcasvarūpo ‘haṃ sarvasaṃkalpavarjitaḥ ||1.2||
commentary:
atiguptatvāt | nanu tadā tvayā katham śrutam iti ced āha || 
athetyādi | ayam arthaḥ | tena vihāreṇa yadā caturānandasukham anubhūya tadanantaraṃ sarvapuruṣeṣu mahākaruṇām āmukhīkṛtyāt | evaṃ kṛṣṇācalasamādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ vakṣyamāṇam udājahāra udāhṛtavān | tadā śrutam ity arthaḥ | saṅgītikārasya mama vajrapāṇeḥ śrotrendriyarūpatvād bhagavadbhagavatīdeha eva sthitvā mayā śrutam iti bhāvaḥ ||
kim udāhṛtavān | bhāvābhāvetyādi | bhāva ānandaparamānandavikalpaḥ | abhāvo viramānandavikalpaḥ | tābhyāṃ vinirmuktas tyaktaḥ | catvāra ānandās tatra prajñopāyābhyām anyonyānurāgalakṣaṇam āliṅganacumbanastanamardananakhadānādinā yantrārūḍhabandhena vajrapadmasaṃyogaṃ yāvad ānandaḥ | etena kiṃcit sukham utpadyate | tataḥ padmāntargatavajracālanena yāvan maṇimūlaṃ bodhicittam āyāti tāvat paramānandaḥ | etena tadadhikaṃ sukham utpadyate | maṇimūlād yāvat padmodarāntargatam aśeṣaṃ na bhavati tāvat sahajānandaḥ | etena grāhyagrāhakagrahaṇābhimānarahitaṃ paramaṃ sukham utpadyate | ataḥ paraṃ yāvan niśceṣṭībhūya sukhaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti vikalpayati tāvad viramānandaḥ | virameṇa trividhasukhavisargeṇa ānando harṣo yatra sa tathā | etena sukhānubhavasmaraṇarūpaṃ sukham utpadyate | tair ekam ānandādivikalparahitaṃ sukhajñānamātraṃ tena tatpara āsakta ity arthaḥ || 
niḥśabdo niṣedhe prapañca ādhārādheyacakrabhāvanārūpaḥ tena svasya rūpaṃ yasya sa tathā | saṃkalpaḥ svarganarakādihetukarmasukhaduḥkhādiphalavikalpaḥ ||

root:
atha bhagavān vajrasattvaḥ kṛṣṇācalasamādhiṃ samāpadyedam udājahāra |
bhāvābhāvavinirmuktaś caturānandaikatatparaḥ |
niṣprapañcasvarūpo ‘haṃ sarvasaṃkalpavarjitaḥ ||1.2||
commentary: tvayīti || kṛṣer halakarmaṇaḥ phalaṃ sasyaṃ tvayi || adhikaraṇavivakṣāyāṃ saptamī || āyattam adhīnam || "adhīno vighna āyattaḥ" ity amaraḥ || iti hetoḥ prītyā snigdhaiḥ | akṛtrimapremārdrair ity arthaḥ | bhrūvikārāṇāṃ bhrūvilāsānām anabhijñaiḥ | pāmaratvād iti śeṣaḥ | janapadavadhūnāṃ pallīyoṣitāṃ locanaiḥ pīyamānaḥ sādaraṃ vīkṣyamāṇaḥ san | mālaṃ mālākhyaṃ kṣetraṃ śailaprāyam unnatasthalam || "mālam unnatabhūtalam" ity utpalamālāyām || sadyas tatkālam eva sīrair halair utkaṣaṇena karṣaṇena surabhi ghrāṇatarpaṇaṃ yathā tathā āruhya || tatrābhivruṣyety arthaḥ || "surabhir ghāṇatarpaṇaḥ" ity amaraḥ || kiñcit paścāl laghugatis tatra nivṛṣṭatvāt kṣipragamanaḥ san "laghu kṣiprataraṃ drutam" ity amaraḥ || bhūyaḥ punar apy uttareṇaivottaramārgeṇaiva vraja gaccha || tṛtīyāvidhāne "prakṛtyādibhya upasaṃkhyānam" iti tṛtīyā || yathā kaścid bahuvallabhaḥ patiḥ kutracit kṣetre kalatre gūḍhaṃ vihṛtya || "kṣetraṃ śarīre kedāre siddhasthānakalatrayoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || dākṣiṇyabhaṅgabhayān nīcamārgeṇa nirgatya punaḥ sarvādhyakṣa iva sañcarati tad vaditi dhvaniḥ ||

māṃ na jānanti ye mūḍhāḥ sarvapumvapuṣi sthitam |
teṣām ahaṃ hitārthāya pañcākāreṇa saṃsthitaḥ ||1.3||
commentary: pumvapuṣīti | prajñāsamparkonmukhe iti bhāvaḥ | hitaṃ tatkathanaṃ pañcākāreṇeti | nirmitādhārādheyaprapañcarūpeṇautpattikrameṇa ādikarmikāṇām etadvyātirekeṇa kathayitum aśakyatvād iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
māṃ na jānanti ye mūḍhāḥ sarvapumvapuṣi sthitam |
teṣām ahaṃ hitārthāya pañcākāreṇa saṃsthitaḥ ||1.3||
commentary:
tasmin baddho 'pi punaḥ punar nirūpaṇīya ity āha.

kva punar idaṃ mano mama vartate, pūrvasminn ālambane anyatra vā gatam. gatam avagamya tato nirvatya tatraiva yojayitavyam. svarasavāhitāyām upekṣaṇīyam iti śamathadhuram ekam api kṣaṇaṃ yathā na parityajati tathā dhārayitavyam. etāvatā śīlaṃ hi samādhisaṃvartanīmam ity uktaṃ bhavati. yathoktaṃ candrapradīpasūtre-

	kṣipraṃ samādhiṃ labhate niraṅgaṇaṃ
	viśuddhaśīlasya mi ānuśaṃsāḥ || (Samādhirāja 27.6)

iti. ato 'vagamyate—ye kecit samādhihetavaḥ prayogāḥ, te śīle 'nugatā iti. tasmāt samādhyarthinā smṛtisaṃprajanyaśīlena bhavitavyam. tathā śīlārthināpi samādhau yatnaḥ kārya iti.

sarvakalpavihīnāhaṃ niṣprapañcā nirākulā || 1.4 ||
commentary: athetyādi | sarvastrīṣu mahākaruṇām āmukhīkṛtyāta eva dveṣavajrīsamādhiṃ samāpadyedam udājahāra | śūnyatā viramānandaḥ | karuṇā ānandatrayaṃ tasyām | abhinnā kevalamahāsukhasvabhāvety arthaḥ | ata eva divyakāmasukhe na sthitā vikalpa ānandādiprabhedakalpanā | prapañco bījacihnādivikalpaḥ | nirākulā cittaikāgratayā ||

śūnyatākaruṇābhinnā divyakāmasukhasthitā |

commentary: vidyāgurūṇām idānīṃ stutinamaskārau karoti abhivandyeti | śiṣyadhīpadminīnāṃ ravīn iva vikāsakān gurūnādau vande | tato vārttikaṃ kariṣye | teṣām eva prasādena dṛṣṭenārthatattvopadeśenādṛṣṭena ca stutinamaskārabhuvā | gurvanugamanādayo 'pi hy ācārapramāṇakā eva | vārttikagrahaṇena ca duruktabhaṅgam anuktavacanaṃ ca samādhatte | mīmāṃsāśabdena nyāyaśāstram idam ato nyāyānusāreṇādhikaraṇabhaṅgādyadūṣaṇam iti darśayati | ślokapadena ca lāghavavikāsaṃ kṣipāma iti darśayati | tataś ca sūtritaprāyam imam artham avahitā jijñāsavo bhāvayiṣyantīti tātparyārtha iti ||

commentary:
dhyānaṃ tu cittaikāgratālakṣaṇaṃ cittādanyathā vaktumaśakyamity āha-

mantrādyāvartanalakṣaṇā vacanavyāpārā japāḥ. tapāṃsi ca indriyadamanalakṣaṇāḥ kāyikāḥ. tāny atibahukālam abhyastāny apy anyatra saktacittena middhādyupahatacittena vā, samānapāṭavavikalenety arthaḥ, vṛthaiva niṣphalam eva, atyarthakṛśaphalatvāt, abhimatārthe 'nupayogād vā. putro 'py aputra eva, putrakāryākaraṇād yathā. ity āha bhagavān sarvajñaḥ. tasmād dhyānapāramitāpi cittam eva.

commentary: mahātantram iti | trividhaṃ tantraṃ | hetuphalopāyabhedena tatra hetur anādinidhanasahajaikasvabhāvaṃ jñānaṃ mahāsukhaṃ | bhāvyamānatvāt | tad eva phalam āgantukakleśādimalāpagamena sādhyatvāt | upāyas tv āgantukamalāpakarṣaṇe utpattyutpannakramabhāvenaiva | tanpratipādako ’pi granthasandarbhaḥ prabandhaḥ tantraśabdenocyate | upacārāt | tantraḥ kriyātantraḥ tasya rājā tad ukto mantradevatābhāvanādividhiḥ | tasyeśvaraṃ prabhuṃ paraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ āśu śīghram ||

commentary:
vīryapāramitā tu kuśalotsāhasvabhāvātivispaṣṭaṃ cittam evety āha.

vacanakāyasahitasyāpi cittasya kuśalapakṣe mandapracārasya na tādṛśaṃ phalamupajāyate, yādṛśaṃ dhyānādiviṣaye paṭupravṛtter ekākino 'pi cittasya phalaṃ brahmabhūyādikam. tasmāt sā cittam eva.

commentary:
kiṃ punar evaṃ syād yadi na syād ity āha.

yasmād evam anutiṣṭhataḥ sarvaṃ suśliṣṭaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt. tadviparyaye punar duḥśliṣṭam ubhayaṃ pūrvaṃ cāttaṃ paścāt svīkṛtaṃ ca syāt. calapravṛtter asaṃprajanyaṃ syāt. praveśe vṛddhiḥ syāt.

commentary:
maṇḍalādhiṣṭhānam iti jhaṭity ātmānaṃ bhagavadrūpeṇālambhya svahṛdaye viśvapadmacandraHŪṂ sūryopariHŪṂkāraṃ dhyātvā tannirgataraśmibhir anādisaṃsiddhaṃ maṇḍalacakram akaniṣṭhabhuvanasthitaṃ JAḤkārapāṭhenākṛṣya purato dṛṣṭvā cetonirmitāsanaṃ ca dhyātvā HŪṂkārapāṭhena tatropaveśayet | tato VAṂkārapāṭhena tatraivābhiniveśena sthitaṃ cintayet | tato HOḤkārapāṭhena siddhidānonmukhaṃ parituṣṭaṃ cintayet | tato manonirmitānekapūjābhiḥ saṃpūjyaḥ | OṂ śrīcaṇḍetyādimantraṃ vāraṃ trayaṃ paṭhet | tatas

commentary: vijayakalaśaṃ sarvacihnātmakaṃ pañcaratnapañcavrīhipañcauṣadhiparikṣiptaṃ sahakārādipallavācchāditaṃ | tasmāt sahakārapallavety upalakṣaṇaṃ tadabhāvād anyo ’pi pallavo boddhavyaḥ ||

root:
tatrāyam udakābhiṣekaḥ | 
śiṣyaṃ śuddhaṃ sphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ nirmalaṃ dhyātvā vijayakalaśād udakam ākṛṣya sahakārapallavena oṃ āḥ sarvatathāgatābhiṣekasamayaśriye hūṃ ity anenābhiṣiñcet || 3.11 ||
commentary:
kṛtvetyādi. svādhipaṃ sveṣṭadaivataṃ sākṣāt kṛtvāmukhīkṛtya sātarūpaṃ sukhaikasvabhāvam, paścād devatākāraṃ parityajya, sukhamātraṃ phalaṃ sādhyaṃ vyavasthitaṃ syāt.

nanu yadi sākṣāt kṛtvāpi devatākāras tyaktavyaḥ, tarhi prathamam eva kasmād vibhāvitaḥ? sukhamātram eva dvitīyasādhyavat kiṃ na vibhāvitam? kiṃ vṛthāprayāsenety āha—śuddham ityādi. śuddhaṃ kevalaṃ devatākāravirahitaṃ sukhamātraṃ naiva sākṣāt kartuṃ śakyate, ākārarahitasya sukhasyānupalambhāt. tasmāt tena kāraṇenākāro bhāvitaḥ svādhipasyeti tṛtīyam. ayam arthaḥ—devatākārasaṃvalitam eva sukhaṃ vibhāvya, sākṣātkṛte devatākāraṃ tyaktvā, sukhamātram eva sādhyam uktaguṇam.

kalyāṇamitrasya paryupāsanaparijñānārtham āha.

śrīsaṃbhavavimokṣād āryagaṇḍavyūhaparivartāt kalyāṇamitraparyupāsanaṃ śikṣet jānīyāt. yathoktam āryagaṇḍavyūhe āryaśrīsaṃbhavena- 

	kalyāṇamitrasaṃdhāritāḥ kulaputra bodhisattvā na patanti durgatiṣu. yāvat saṃcodakāḥ kalyāṇamitrā akaraṇīyānām. saṃnivārakāḥ pramādasthānāt. niṣkāsayitāraḥ saṃsārapurāt. tasmāt tarhi kulaputra evaṃmanasikārāpratiprasrabdhena kalyāṇamitrāṇy upasaṃkramitavyāni. pṛthivīsamacittena sarvabhārodvahanāparitasanatayā. vajrasamacittenābhedyāśayatayā. cakravālasamacittena sarvaduḥkhāsaṃpravedhanatayā. lokadāsasamacittena sarvakarmasamādānāvijugupsanatayā. rajoharaṇasamacittena mānābhimānavivarjanatayā. yānasamacittena gurubhāranirvāhanatayā. aśvasamacittena akrudhyanatayā. nausamacittena gamanāgamanāparitasanatayā. suputrasadṛśena kalyāṇamitramukhavīkṣaṇatayā. ātmani ca te kulaputra āturasaṃjñotpādayitavyā kalyāṇamitreṣu ca vaidyasaṃjñā, anuśāsanīṣu bhaiṣajyasaṃjñā, pratipattiṣu vyādhinirghātanasaṃjñā. ātmani ca te kulaputra bhīrusaṃjñotpādayitavyā, kalyāṇamitreṣu śūrasaṃjñā, anuśāsanīṣu praharaṇasaṃjñā, pratipattiṣu śatrunirghātanasaṃjñā.

yad uktaṃ sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadekṣaṇād iti tad upadarśayitum āha. etad iha śāstre pratipāditam, anyad yad iha noktam. buddhena bhagavatā bodhisattvānāṃ karaṇīyatayā nirdiṣṭam, tan nānāsūtrāntārthaparicayād veditavyam.

ajātajñānabodhena mahāmudrā yathā labhyate tad darśayati—pratipakṣa ityādi | pratipakṣa iti svabhāvaguṇasāranirūpaṇatayā dānaśīlakṣamāvīryadhyānaprajñātmakapratipakṣanirūpaṇavikalpāsaṅge 'manasikāreṇa varjanāt sthito naiva yaḥ | pratipakṣanirūpaṇavikalpāsaṅgaprahāṇyā sāsravarūpādipañcopādānaskandhādyātmakavipakṣanirūpaṇavikalpāsaṅgaprahāṇir api draṣṭavyā | tadabhāva etadabhāvasyāvaśyambhāvitvāt | tattvāsakto 'pīti svabhāvādinirūpaṇatayā śūnyatātathatādyātmakatattvanirūpaṇavikalpe 'py āsaktaḥ saṃsakto naiva yaḥ | gārddhyaṃ naiva phale yasyeti prathamabhūmyādisarvākārajñatāntaprāptinirūpaṇavikalpāsaṅgarūpaṃ phale gārddhyaṃ kāṅkṣā yasya nāsti | mahāmudrāṃ sa vindati labhate | etenāpratiṣṭhānānāroparūpajagadātmatayā vipakṣapratipakṣatattvaphalāsaṅgavigamena sarvāsaṅgavinirmuktāṃ mahāmudrām ācaṣṭe |

tarhi mahāmudrāyāṃ dānapāramitādīnāṃ kim abhāva eva | na | tasyā eva sarvapāramitādyātmakapuṇyajñānasambhāradvayarūpatvāt | tad uktaṃ viśeṣacintibrahmaparipṛcchāmahāyānasūtre—

	yaḥ sarvakleśaparityāgaḥ idaṃ dānaṃ | yo 'nabhisaṃskāraḥ idaṃ śīlaṃ | yālakṣaṇatā iyaṃ kṣāntiḥ | yo vivekaḥ idaṃ vīryam | yad apratiṣṭhānam idaṃ dhyānam | yāprapañcatā iyaṃ prajñā |

etenāpratiṣṭhānāprapañcarūpaiva prajñāpāramiteti sthitam | tad uktaṃ saptaśatikāyām—

	bhagavān āha—yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi tadā kutra pratiṣṭhāya prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi | mañjuśrīr āha—yasminn ahaṃ bhagavan samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi | apratiṣṭhito 'haṃ tasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi | bhagavān āha—apratiṣṭhitasya te mañjuśrīḥ kā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā | mañjuśrir āha—saiva bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yan na kvacit pratiṣṭhānam | bhagavān āha—yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi katarat te kuśalamūlaṃ tasmin samaya upacayaṃ gacchaty apacayaṃ vā | mañjuśrīr āha—na me bhagavan tasmin samaye kiñcit kuśalamūlam upacayaṃ gacchaty apacayaṃ vā | nāsau bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati yasya kasyacid dharmasyopacayo vāpacayo vā | na sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā veditavyā yā kasyacid dharmasyopacayāya vāpacayāya vā pratyupasthitā | sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmān jahāti nāpi buddhadharmān upādatte |

ityādi ||

	sādhanāṅgam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvatantrārthasaṅgrahaḥ ||

	eṣāṃ kramāṇāṃ bhedāṃs tu prastāravidhinā bahūn |
	sammīlanaṃ ca teṣāṃ vai yo vetti sa hi tantravit ||

tathā cāryadevapādair api sūtakamelāpake mantratattvamudrātattvātmatattvadharmatattvadevatātattvanāmabhiḥ pañcakramāṇām uddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ | tatra mantratattvam iti hūṃkārādimantrotthitā hevajrādimūrtiḥ | mudrātattvam iti saṅkhyāgaṇanākrameṇa neyārthatayā cittanidyaptimātraṃ nītārthatas tu karmamudrāyām | ātmatattvam iti jagataś ciccitraniḥsvabhāvatā | dharmatattvam iti dharmānutpādaḥ | devatātattvam ity ātmatattvadharmatattvayos tādāmīkaraṇam abhinnateti yāvat | 

	etāni pañca tattvāni gurūṇām upadeśataḥ |
	caturmudrāsu yojyāni pañcakrama iva kramāt ||

nanu—

	kramam utpattikaṃ caiva utpannakramam eva ca ||
	kramadvayaṃ samāśritya vajriṇāṃ dharmadeśanā |

iti tantre pāṭha | tat kathaṃ pañca kramāḥ | ucyate | utpattikrame piṇḍīkramavajrajāpau bāhyotpattigambhīrotpattyaparanāmakau | utpanne ca svādhiṣṭhānābhisambodhiyuganaddhakramā utpannapariniṣpannasvābhāvikakramāparanāmakā iti |

etāsāṃ caturmudrāṇāṃ sadbhāvaḥ svabhāvaś ca sarvarahasyatantrokto vijñeyaḥ | tad uktaṃ tatra—

	mānasikā mahāmudrā samayamudrā tu sarvagā |
	vācasī dharmamudrā tu karmamudrā tu kāyikī ||

etayor vajrarūpasattvarūpayor vajrasattvaśūnyatākaruṇāprajñopāyanirvāṇabhavādivyapadeśo boddhavyaḥ | ayam eva cārtha utpattikrame mahārāgād drutāpattau candrārkamadhyasthabindudvayarūpeṇordhvādhovartinā tatra tatra bhagavatā darśitaḥ | utpannas tu yathoktaḥ sekārthaḥ | pariniṣpannas tu dravād bolarūpasūryasthaḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ śūnyatākaruṇārūpo dharmadhātusvabhāva utthito bhagavān | ekapādāṅguṣṭhāsanalagnatā tu skhaladavasthākālākalitatāṃ sūcayitum ||

nanv evam—

	vajravaraṭakamadhyasthaṃ hūṃtattvaṃ vibhāvayet punaḥ ||

iti katham | atra hi vajravaraṭakasya madhyastham ity asyārthasya vighaṭanāt | na | anyārthatvād asya | tathā hi vajravaraṭakayoḥ prajñopāyavarāṅgayor madhyasthaṃ hūṃtattvam iti ha iti hetuśūnyam u ity ūhāpagatam aṃ ity apratiṣṭhitaṃ bhāvayed iti vivakṣitatvāt |

tarhi maṇer antargatam iti katham | ucyate | atrāpy anya evārthaḥ | tathā hi maṇyoḥ paṅkajakuliśayor antargatam itīdam api sustham | 

nanv etat katham avagamyate yad ubhayatrāyam artho vivakṣita iti | ucyate—

	kamalākāśe maṇivaraṭakayoḥ pīḍanasthāne |
	vajraparyaṅkataś cittaṃ maṇyantargatam īkṣayan |
	yat tad utpadyate jñānaṃ jñānaṃ tadrūpam ity alam ||

iti paramādye pravacanāt | atrāyam arthaḥ | kamalasyākāśe kamalamadhyaśūnyadeśe maṇivaraṭakayoḥ pañkajakuliśayoḥ pīḍanasthāne saṅghaṭṭanasthāne | vajraparyaṅkata iti vajrasya pari sarvato 'ṅkataḥ kroḍata iti pañcamyā vajrād bahir lagnamātraṃ vivakṣitam | cittaṃ maṇyor antargatam īkṣamāṇasya yad vijñānam utpadyate tad vijñānasvarūpam ity arthaḥ | tathā ca vajāmṛte—

	nābhimadhye sthitaṃ devi karṇikāgūḍhagocare |
	sravate śukrarūpeṇa bhagaliṅgāntare sthitam ||

iti | uktaṃ ca hevajre—

	candrāli kālimārtaṇḍa bījaṃ madhyagataṃ bhavet |

iti | tathā ca |

	yāvan no patati prabhāsvaramayaḥ śītāṃśudhārādravo 
		devīpadmadalodare samarasībhūto jinānāṃ gaṇaiḥ |
	sphūrjadvajraśikhāgrataḥ karuṇayābhinnaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ 
		tāvac chrīkaruṇābalasya sahajaṃ jānīhi rūpaṃ vibhoḥ || (1)

	yāvad vajramaṇes trivajradahane bhraśyan vidhur vāyunā 
		tiṣṭhaty abjapuṭe sukoṭarakuṭīlīnecchur asmin kṣaṇe |
	yad bhūtaṃ svaparādikalparahitaṃ vyāpārahīnaṃ mano
		jānīmaḥ sahajaṃ tad eva hi punar yuktyāgamena sphuṭam | (2) 

	prajñāpaṅkajavajrayogaparamānandāvaśeṣe sthite
		sthānasrāvaviśuddhabindur acalo yāvan mṛgāṅko mataḥ |
	tāvac cittam acañcalaṃ calamarutsrotaś ca vidhvaṃsyate 
		na śrotraṃ śṛṇute 'kṣi neṅgati mahāmudreti sā ceṣyate || (3) 

tarhi—

	nānyena kathyate sahajaṃ na kasminn api labhyate |
	ātmanā jñāyate puṇyād guruparvopasevayā ||

ity uktaṃ katham | atra guruparva vajraparva | sevākāla ity arthasaṅgatyabhāvād upasevābhāvāt | na | upaśabdena sāmīpyavācakatvena vajrād bahiḥ samīpe sevety uktam | 

tarhi—

	bolasaukhyaṃ mahāmudrā vajrāyatanam upāyakam |

iti katham | atrāpi yad bolasaukhyaṃ sā mahāmudrā | vajram eva āyatanaṃ sthānam upāyakam ity arthāsaṅgateḥ | na | bolasaukhyaṃ mahāmudrā ca vajrāyatanasthaṃ yat sa paramānandaḥ | tad upāyakam iti darśitam | kiṃ cāsmanmate—

	athāto rahasyaṃ vakṣye samāsān na tu vistarāt |
	rahasye parame 

ityādi sustham | tathā hi rahasye rahasyaṃ vakṣya iti sambandhaḥ | rahasya iti rahau vajraṃ padmamṃ ca tayor antarāle | seti sarvākāreṇa | yeti yathātathyam | ety advayam | ītīdantātītam | 

tathā coktam—

	repho vajram iti prokto hakāraḥ padmam ucyate |

iti ||

commentary: hanyād iti māmakyāṃ mātari kāmacittam adhiṣṭhāya pitur akṣobhyasya māraṇaṃ kṛtvā dvābhyāṃ bhakṣayet svadeha evāntar bhāvayet | etenaitad uktaṃ bhavati | krodhādveṣālape jātāmāraṇārthāndhacintakāḥ | na sidhyanti māraṇenaiva krodhabhāvanayā sthitāḥ | kāmayed iti akṣobhyasya sthāne sthitveti bhāvaḥ ||

vasudhāṃ tarjayantaṃ ca vāmajānvagrataḥ sthitam |
akṣobhyakṛtamaulaṃ tu nīlaṃ ratnakirīṭinam || 4.21 ||
commentary: saṃprati sahāyasampattiś cāstīty āha-kartum iti || yad garjitaṃ kartṛ mahīm ucchilandhrām udbhūtakandalikām || "kandalyāṃ ca śilīndhrā syāt" iti śabdārṇave || ata evāvandhyāṃ saphalāṃ kartuṃ prabhavati śaknoti | śilīndhrāṇāṃ bhāvisasyasampattisūcakatvād iti bhāvaḥ | tad uktaṃ nimittanidāne—"kālābhrayogād uditāḥ śilīndhrāḥ sampannasasyāṃ kathayanti dhātrīm" iti || tac chravaṇasubhagaṃ śrotrasukham | lokasyeti śeṣaḥ | te tava garjitaṃ śrutvā mānasotkā mānase sarasy unmanasaḥ | utsukā iti yāvat || "utka unmanāḥ iti nipātanāt sādhu || kālāntare mānasasya himaduṣṭatvād dhimasya ca haṃsānāṃ rogahetutvād anyatra gatā haṃsāḥ punarvarṣāsu mānasam eva gacchantīti prasiddhiḥ || bisakisalayānāṃ mṛṇālāgrāṇāṃ chedaiḥ śakalaiḥ | pātheyavantaḥ pathi sādhu pātheyaṃ pathi bhojyam || "pathyatithivasatisvapater ḍhañ" taddantaḥ | mṛṇālāgraśakalasaṃbandhavanta ity arthaḥ | rājahaṃsāḥ haṃsaviśeṣāḥ || "rājahaṃsās tu te cañcucaraṇair lohitaiḥ sitāḥ" ity amaraḥ || nabhasi vyomni bhavatas tava | ākailāsāt kailāsaparyantam || padadvayaṃ caitam | sahāyāḥ sayātrāḥ "sahāyas tu sayātraḥ syāt" iti śabdārṇave || sampatsyante bhaviṣyanti ||

commentary: manthānayogeneti devyāḥ padmasthitam ubhayakṣaraṇajātam ubhayabījaṃ janyajanakabījaṃ dhyātvā devadevībhedena vāmadakṣiṇakukṣibhedena ca tatpariṇataṃ dhyātvā devīpadmato nirgatam agre ājñāṃ prārthayantam | pūrvādisthāne tadavasthanāya niryuñjayed iti ||

evaṃ sarvathānupayogini kāye sāpekṣatāṃ nirasyann āha.

commentary: rādhāṃ prati sahacarī sakhī sarasaṃ yathā syāttathā yadagre gītena vakṣyamāṇaṃ idameva ūce uvāca | rasena saha vartata iti sarasam | tatkriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ dvitīyāntaṃ napuṃsakameva | kiṃbhūtām rādhām | valadbādhāṃ valantī vardhamānā bādhā vyathā yasyāstām | kasmin kāle | vasante | kiṃbhūtām bhramantīṃ calantīm | kasmin | kāntāre durge pathi mārge | kairavayavaiḥ | caraṇādibhiḥ | kiṃbhūtaiḥ | vāsantīkusumasukumāraiḥ | vāsantī mādhavīlatā | tasyāḥ kusumāni | tadvat sukumārā mṛdulāḥ taiḥ | punaḥ kiṃbhūtām | bahuvihitakṛṣṇānusaraṇām | bahudhā anekaprakāreṇa athavā bahuvāraṃ vihitaṃ kṛtaṃ kṛṣṇānusaraṇaṃ kṛṣṇānveṣaṇaṃ yayā sā tathā tām| kayā hetubhūtayā| amandaṃ atyarthaṃ yathā syāttathā kandarpajvarajanitacintākulatayā | dāhahetutvāt kandarpa eva jvaraḥ athavā kandarpeṇa jvarastena janitā prādurbhūtā jīvanacintā tayā ākulā vyākulā tasyāḥ bhāvastayā |

commentary: karuṇācittaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhodharaṇābhilāṣabhāvanām | mā tyaja prabho mā ca bhava tvaṃ śūnyaḥ | kimartham iti ced āha | mama dehaḥ suṣṭuduḥkhitaḥ san bhaviṣyati jīvena prāṇena tyaktaḥ ||

commentary: sthitveti || he megha, vane caranti te vanacarāḥ || tatpuruṣe kṛti bahulam" iti bahulagrahaṇād lug bhavati || teṣāṃ vadhūbhir muktāḥ kuñjā latāgṛhā yatra tasmin || nikuñjakuñjau vā klībe latādipihitodare ity amaraḥ || tatra te nayanavinodo 'stīty arthaḥ | tasmin āmrakūṭe muhūrtam alpakālam | na tu ciraṃ svakāryavirodhād iti bhāvaḥ || "muhūrtam alpakāle syād ghaṭikādvitaye 'pi ca" iti śabdārṇave || sthitvā viśramya | toyotsargeṇa "tvām āsāra-" ity uktavarṣeṇena drutataragatir lāghavād dhetor atikṣipragamanaḥ san | tasmād āmrakūṭāt param anantaraṃ tatparaṃ vartma mārgaṃ tīrṇo 'tikrāntaḥ | upalaiḥ pāṣāṇair viṣame vindhyasyādreḥ pāde prasyantaparvate || "pādāḥ pratyantaparvatāḥ" ity amaraḥ || viśīrṇāṃ samantato visṛmarām || etena kasyāścit kāmukyā priyatamacaraṇapāto 'pi dhvanyate || revāṃ narmadām || "revā tu narmadā somodbhavā mekhalakanyakā" ity amaraḥ || gajasyāṅge śarīre bhaktayo racanāḥ | revā iti yāvat || "bhaktir niṣevaṇe bhāge racanāyām" iti śabdārṇave || tāsāṃ chedair bhaṅgibhir bhābhir viracitāṃ bhūtiṃ śṛṅgāram iva bhasitam iva vā || "bhūtir mātaṅgaśṛṅgāre jātau bhasmani saṃpadi" iti viśvaḥ || drakṣyasi | ayam api mahāṃs te nayana kautukalābha iti bhāvaḥ ||

śunnasahāva vigoia karahi tu mea sama ghiṭṭi || īrṣyāvajryāḥ || 4.30 ||
commentary: yauvanayuktām mām upekṣya niṣphalaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ | ayam abhiprāyaḥ | śūnyatākaruṇābhinnaṃ hi mahāsukhajñānaṃ nirmāṇasaṃbhogakāyadvayavyatirekeṇopalabhyate | nirmāṇasaṃbhogakāyau tu bhujamukhasaṃsthānamayau strīpuruṣarūpau tau ca bhāvanālabhyau | bhāvanā ca yuvativyatirekeṇa na bhavati | anyathā vikṣiptacittatvād iti yata evaṃ tasmāc chūnyasvabhāvaṃ viśeṣeṇa garhitvā nindatvā kuru tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ ghṛṣṭim āliṅganacumbanādikam ity arthaḥ |

root:
yovanavuṇttim upekhia niṣphala śunnae ditti |
śunnasahāva vigoia karahi tu mea sama ghiṭṭi || īrṣyāvajryāḥ || 4.30 ||
commentary:
anupametyādi. kamalaṃ padmaṃ pāṇau yasya sa kamalapāṇir avalokiteśvaro bhagavāñ jayatīti sambandhaḥ. kiṃviśiṣṭaḥ? anupamam ity atipraṇītatvamahattvāsaṃsārasthāyitvalakṣaṇair dharmair yuktasyānyasyābhāvād upamārahitaṃ sukham eva rūpaṃ svabhāvo yasya sa tathoktaḥ. punar api kiṃviśiṣṭaḥ? śrīḥ puṇyajñānasambhāralakṣaṇā, tasyā nivāsa āśrayo yaḥ sa tathā. dharmakāyarūpatvena sarvagatatvāt pratiniyatanivāsābhāvād anivāsaḥ.

punaḥ kīdṛśaḥ? nirupamāḥ paramarūpayauvanaśṛṅgārādirasamahākaruṇādiyuktatvenopamātikrāntā rūpavajrāditārāparyantadaśadevīrūpā vidyāḥ parivārakatvena yasya sa tathā. saha svābhārūpayā vidyayā vartata iti savidyaḥ. tribhuvanasya tribhuvanavartino janasya yad dhitam āyatipathyaṃ buddhatvādikaṃ, saukhyaṃ tadātve pathyaṃ cakravartitvādikam, tayor yā prāptiḥ sākṣātkriyā, tasyāḥ karaṇaṃ kāro yasya sa tathā. aparinirvāṇadharmakatvenāpratiṣṭhitanirvāṇarūpatvenānyathātvalakṣaṇasya vikārasyābhāvād avikāraḥ. evaṃviśiṣṭo bhagavāñ jayati.

kiyantaṃ kālam ity āha—yāvad āśāvikāśāḥ. āśā daśa diśo gaganasvarūpāḥ. yadvā āśāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ bhavabhogatṛṣṇāḥ. tāsāṃ vikāśā avakāśāḥ pravartanāni, prādurbhāvā iti yāvat. te yāvat tāvad bhagavāñ jayati, sarvebhyo hariharahiraṇyagarbhādibhyaḥ prakṛṣṭo bhavatīty arthaḥ.

atrānupamasukharūpīty anena svārthasaṃpattiḥ kathitā. śrīnivāsa ity anena tadupāyaḥ, puṇyajñānasambhārayoḥ śrīśabdenābhihitatvāt. tribhuvanahitasaukhyaprāptikāra ity anena parārthasaṃpattir uktā. nirupamadaśadevīrūpavidyaḥ savidya ity anena tadupāyaḥ, tathābhūtadaśadevīdvātriṃśallakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanakāyākāraśūnyena sarvākāraparārthasaṃpatteḥ kartum aśakyatvād iti.

tṛtīye bhāvayen muditām upekṣāṃ sarvaśeṣataḥ || 4.3 ||
commentary: maitrī sarvasattveṣv ātmasnehabhāvanā | karuṇā sarvasattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhair dharaṇābhilāṣabhāvanā | muditā sarvasattvānām aiśvaryādiṣu harṣacittabhāvanā | upekṣā viheṭhakāviheṭhakasattveṣu pratighānunayaparahitacittabhāvanā ||

commentary: nanv anumānābhāsasaṅkareṇa pramāṇam apramāṇībhavati | na hi pratyakṣābhāsasaṅkarāt pratyakṣam apramāṇaṃ bhavati | atha tatra kāraṇadoṣasadasadbhāvanibandhanaḥ pramāṇatadābhāsavivekaḥ so 'trāpy aviśiṣṭaḥ | atrāpi smṛtikārair vivekopāyo darśita eva | ācāraś caiva sādhūnām ityādinā | sādhavaś cāryāḥ | svābhāvikakṛṣṇamṛgacaraṇopalakṣitāryāvartanivāsinaś cāryaśabdavācyāḥ | atas tadācāro dharmo 'nyo 'dharma iti viveko bhaviṣyati ata āha na ceti | śāstrasadasadbhāvanibandhano hy āryamlecchavibhāgaḥ tadanāśrayeṇa tv āryamlecchavibhāgo durbhaṇaḥ | ata eva śāstrasthā vā tannimittatvāt iti vakṣyatīti | astu tarhi śāstramūlārthaprasiddhiḥ pramāṇam ata āha tanmūleti | na svatantrāyāḥ prasiddher eva prāmāṇyaṃ sidhyatīty abhiprāyaḥ ||

commentary: triśaraṇagamanam buddhadharmasaṃghānām āśrayaṇīyatvena cetobhajanam | yācanā buddhānām aparinirvāṇena saṃsārāvasthanārthaṃ vacanaviśeṣaḥ | adhyeṣaṇā buddhānām anavaratavad dharmadeśanārthaṃ cākṣaviśeṣodīraṇam | ātmaniryātanaṃ sarvabuddhabodhisattvebhya ātmadehaniryātanam | puṇyapariṇāmam | etat kriyākalāpaprasūtasya puṇyasya sarvasattvānāṃ buddhatvāya niryātanam ||

root:

commentary: santaptānām iti || he payoda, tvaṃ santaptānām ātapena vā pravāsaviraheṇa vā saṃjvaritānām || "santāpaḥ sañjvaraḥ samau" ity amaraḥ || śaraṇaṃ payodānenātapakhinnānāṃ proṣitānāṃ svasthānapreraṇayā ca rakṣako 'si || "śaraṇaṃ gṛharakṣitroḥ" ity amaraḥ || tat tasmāt kāraṇād dhanapateḥ kuberasya krodhena viśleṣitasya priyayā viyojitasya me mama sandeśaṃ vārtā priyāyā hara | priyāṃ prati nayety arthaḥ | sambandhasāmānye ṣaṣṭhī || sandeśaharaṇenāvayoḥ santāpaṃ nudety arthaḥ | kutra sthāne sā sthitā tatsthānasya vā kiṃ vyāvartakaṃ tatrāha—gantavyeti || bahir bhavaṃ bāhyam || "bahirdevapañcajanebhyaś ca" iti yañ || bāhya udyāne sthitasya harasya śirasi yā candrikā tayā dhautāni nirmalāni harmyāṇi dhanikabhavanāni yasyāṃ sā tathoktā || "harmyādi dhanināṃ vāsaḥ" ity amaraḥ || anena vyāvartakam uktam || alakā nāmālaketi prasiddhā yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ vasatiḥ sthānaṃ te tava gantavyā | tvayā gantavyety arthaḥ || "kṛtyānāṃ kartari vā" iti ṣaṣṭhī ||

commentary: praṇidhānaṃ saṃsārikasukhasaṃgam | bodhicittaṃ pāralaukikasukhāya cittaniyojanam | buddho bhaveyaṃ jagato hitāyeti kṛtvā namaskāram iti trividhaṃ kāyikaṃ vācanikaṃ mānasikaṃ ceti | tadraśmibhir iti svahṛdayasthitahūṃkāradīptibhiḥ ||

commentary:
ekayādvitīyayānyastriyā. gṛhipravrajitayor idam iha sādhāraṇam ity anyagrahaṇam. na kuryād yānādi. saṃkṣepeṇa saṃkalayya darśayann āha. lokānāṃ yat prasādajanakaṃ na bhavati, tat sarva dṛṣṭvā śāstre vyavahāre vā. pṛṣṭvā vijñān. varjayet. anenaitad darśitaṃ bhavati—dṛṣṭe 'pi yadbādhākaram evaṃvidhaṃ tadvarjayet āpattir bhavatīti. yaduktam—

tatra | evam iti yathā saṃgāsyāmi | mayety anena viparītaśrutaparaṃparāśrutayor nirāsaḥ | etenātmanaḥ sākṣāt śrutam aviparītaṃ ca pratipādayati | śrutam iti śrotajñānenādhigatam | ekasmin samaya iti | ekasmin kāle | anyasmin kāle tv anyad api śrutam ity arthaḥ | etenātmano bāhuśrutyam etattantrasya daurlabhyaṃ ca pratipādayati | bhagavān iti | bhagā aiśvaryādayaḥ | tathā ca | aiśvaryasya samagrasya jñānasya yaḥ yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ rūpasyātha prayatnasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhagasya iti śrutiḥ || tāni vidyante 'syeti rāgādikleśabhañjanād vā |

nanu lokaprasiddhibādhāyā abādhakatvāt katham "ālocanaṃ vimardaś cet" ityādinā bādhā darśitā | tad etad api bhavato 'asmadabhiprāyāparijñānaphalam | yato "viramānandaṃ jagac caiva" iti vimardasya jagadrūpatayā prastutabādhanena yathoktasarvāgamavighaṭanāt | ālocanam ityādigrantho 'pi vighaṭata evety ata ālocanam ityādinā bādhā darśitā | ata evāryanāgārjunapādair api caturmudrānvaye—

	paramaviramayor madhye lakṣyam vīkṣya dṛḍhīkuru |

iti bādhā darśitā | tarhi tvanmate

	ānandena sukhaṃ kiñcit paramānandaṃ tato 'dhikam |
	viramānandair virāgaḥ syāt sahajānandas tu śeṣataḥ || 

iti katham | tad apy evaṃ jñeyam | ānandaparamaviramaiḥ kiñcitsukhatadadhikavirāgāṇāṃ grahaṇāc cheṣataḥ pāriśeṣyatas tribhyo anyatayā sahajānando boddhavyaḥ | yadvānandaparamaviramasahaja ity anukramavaśād evam uktam | boddhavyas tu tṛtīya eva sahajaḥ |

yady evaṃ kuto bhagavatā suṣeka eva na darśitaḥ | kim ity āyāsabahulahaṭhasekaśaṅkāspadam ānandaparamaviramasahaja iti kramo darśitaḥ | tan na | pustakapāṇḍityanirāsakalyāṇamitrādhīnārthatvād eva kramadarśanasya | tad uktam—"kalyāṇamitrādhīnā hi bodhiḥ" | tathānyatra—"guruṇā tuṣṭena labhyate" iti | kiṃ cettham āgamavirodhena haṭhasekaṃ duḥsekaṃ ca dūṣayatā nirākārādivyavsthā na dūṣitaiva | tasyā āyojanamātrasya viruddhatvāt | ato nikhilavyavastheyaṃ vajradharāśvāsarūpasuṣekasiddhānta eva veditavyā | svasiddhānte haṭhaduḥsekavādino 'py evaṃ varṇayantīty etadartham atra darśitā ||

raktaṃ dviṣṭaṃ vā svacittaṃ yadā paśyet, tadā hastapādādicalanamātram api na kartavyam, nāpi vacanodīraṇam. anyathā tadutthāpite kāyavāgvijñapty api saṃkliṣṭe syātām. ato bahirindriyavyāpāravikalpāv upasaṃhṛtya sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavat tadā. sarvavyāpāravirahān nirvyāpārāḥ sarvadharmā iti manasi nidhāya.

commentary: pataṃ prabandhaṃ jayadevakaviḥ karoti | kiṃbhūtaṃ prabandham | śrīvāsudevaratikelikathāsametam | śrīḥ lakṣmī rādhārūpiṇī | vasudevasyāpatyaṃ vāsudevaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kaṃsadaityavināśāya ādyaḥ ajanmā mānavāvatāre manujarūpī | ratiśca prītiḥ | keliḥ krīḍā ca anubhūta karma ālaye śrīśca vāsudevaśca tayoḥ ratikelikathāstābhiḥ sametaṃ saṃyuktam | kathaṃbhūto jayadevakaviḥ | padmāvatīcaraṇacāraṇacakravartī | padmāvatī lakṣmīḥ tasyāḥ caraṇau | tayoścāraṇaṃ śuśrūṣārādhanaṃ tatra cakravartī sevakādhirājaḥ | athavā padmāvatī tasya brāhmaṇī tasyāḥ nṛtyakalācakravartī | punaḥ kiṃbhūtaḥ | vāgdevatācaritacitritacitrasadmā | vāk cāsau devatā ceti | tasyāścaritaṃ tena citritaṃ vicitrīkṛtaṃ cittameva sadma gṛhaṃ yasya sa tathā | anena lakṣmī sarasvatyorjayadevo niṣṇātaḥ śṛṅgārī ca sūcitaḥ |

commentary: madhusūdanasya murāreḥ uro vakṣo vo yuṣmākaṃ priyam apekṣitam anupūrayatu | karotvityarthaḥ | kiṃbhūtam uraḥ | padmāpayodharataṭīparirambhalagnakāśmīramudritam | padmāyāḥ lakṣmyāḥ payodharau tayostaṭī parisaraḥ pārśvabhāgaḥ tasyāḥ parirambhaḥ upagūhanaṃ tena lagnaṃ ca tat kāśmīraṃ kuṅkumaṃ ca tena mudritam | tatstanākāramaṇḍalākṛticihnitam | mamedaṃ murāreruro na tvanyasyāḥ ityabhiprāyeṇa mudritaṃ cihnitam | anyo 'pi svavastuni dravye vā granthimudrāṅkalakṣaṃ karotītyarthaḥ | kiṃbhūtamiva | vyaktānurāgamiva | antaḥsthitaḥ san bahirniḥsṛtya vyaktaḥ āvirbhūtaḥ anurāgaḥ prema yasmin tattathā tadiva | punaḥ kiṃbhūtam | khelavanaṅgakhedasvedāmbupūram | khelat krīḍaṃścāsau anaṅgaśca tena khedaḥ prayāsaḥ tena svedāmbu svedarūpaṃ nīraṃ tasya pūraḥ pravāhaḥ samūho yatra tattathā tasmin tat | gītārthaṃ ślokena sūcayati |

root:

vyaktānurāgamiva kheladanaṅgakhedasvedāmbupūramanupūrayatu priyaṃ vaḥ ||
commentary:
sambhrāntetyādi. sambhrānto vibhrānto bodhaḥ prajñāviśeṣo yeṣāṃ tīrthikānāṃ te tathoktāḥ. sarva eva tīrthyā ātmātmīyagrahatimiropahatabuddhinayanāḥ. tattvam idam iti sādhyam cedam iti tattvasya sādhyasya yat svarūpam, tasya yā vittiḥ pratītiḥ, tasyāṃ bhrāntāḥ. śeṣaṃ subodham.

nanu tattvasādhyayor upādeyatvenaikarūpatvāt kathaṃ tattvasya sādhyasya ceti bhedena nirdeśa iti cet. asad etat. tattvaṃ hy upādeyatve 'pi sukhaduḥkhopekṣādisakalapratibhāsasaṃdohavyāpakam. sādhyaṃ cānabhimataparihāreṇecchālakṣaṇaṃ phalam upādeyatve 'pi sakalaprāṇibhir avaśyam evāsādhyavyāvṛttyā sādhayitavyatvenābhimatam ity adoṣaḥ.

tatra tāvad vedāntavādyabhimataṃ sādhyam āha—ānandarūpam ityādi.

commentary: punaḥ kiṃbhūte | sphuradatimuktalatāparirambhaṇamukulitapulakitacūte | sphurantī puṣpavantī cāsau atimuktalatā ca vāsantī | tasyāḥ parirambhaṇaṃ kartari ṣaṣṭhī | tena mukulitaḥ pulakitaḥ romodgamaśca cūta āmravṛkṣo yatra sa tathā tasmin | kasmin sthāne harirviharati | vṛndāvanavipine | vṛndāvanākhyaṃ yadvipinaṃ vanaṃ tattasmin | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | parisaraparigatayamunājalapūte | parisare samīpe parigataṃ samantādgataṃ tacca tadyamunājalaṃ ca tena pūte pavitrībhūte tasmin |

root:
śrījayadevabhaṇitamidamudayati haricaraṇasmṛtisāram |
sarasavasantasamayavanavarṇanamanugatamadanavikāram ||
commentary:
lobhacaritān adhikṛtyāha | mahāmahamahālobha iti || mahāmaheti pūrvavat | mahālobho ratnasaṃbhavaḥ || sarvalobhanisūdana iti | sarvalaukikalokottarasaṃpattipariśodhanārthatvāt || śūnyatādicaturvimokṣamukhānāṃ dharmadhātvāyatanamukhena sarvasamādhihetutvāt | tad eva cādhyātmaviparyāsapratikūlatayādhyātmaśūnyatākāraṃ | bāhyopalambhāpagamād bahirdhāśūnyatāsvabhāvaṃ | tadāśrayaśarīrānupalambhasvabhāvatayādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatātmakaṃ | bhājanalokādhyavasāyarahitatvena mahāśūnyatālakṣaṇaṃ || tata evādarśajñānāśrayavajrasattvādisamādhicatuṣṭayātmakam iti |

ata āha mahākāmo ityādi | tatra mahākāma iti vajrasattvaḥ | kāmyata iti kāmaḥ | abhilaṣaṇīya ity arthaḥ | mahāsaukhya iti vajrarājaḥ | mahāmoda iti vajrarāgaḥ | mahāratir iti vajrasādhuḥ || 

ata eva cakṣūrūpādivāsanāparāvṛttisvabhāvādarśajñānaniṣpatter adhyātmānupalambhādyadhiṣṭhānatvāt | yathāsvaṃ viparyāsavipakṣatayā bodhicittodayākarṣānurāgaṇasādhubhāvahetutvāc caiṣāṃ yathākramam ||

commentary: he rādhe | gandhavāhaḥ malayajo vāyuḥ iha vasante virahiṇīnāṃ ceto dahati | kiṃ kurvan | vāsayan sugandhayan | kāni | kānanāni | kaiḥ kṛtvā | daravidalitamallīvallicañcatparāgaprakaṭitapaṭavāsaiḥ | daravidalitā īṣadvikasitāśca tā mallīvallyaśca | tāsu cañcantaḥ itastato gacchantaḥ te ca te parāgāśca puṣpareṇavaśca sugandhivastucūrṇāni ca | athavā taiḥ parāgaiḥ prakaṭitapaṭuvāsāḥ prakaṭitāśca paṭavaḥ utkṛṣṭāśca te vāsāśca taiḥ | tanu virahiṇīnāṃ dahati | kimbhūtaḥ | prasaradasamabāṇaprāṇavat | prasaraṃścāsau asamabāṇaḥ kandarpaśceti tasya prāṇa iva samāna iva bhavatīti prāṇavat | punaḥ kimbhūtaḥ | ketakīgandhabandhuḥ | ketakīnāṃ gandhaḥ tasya bandhuḥ sahavāsī |

root:

commentary: asau sakhī rādhāṃ prati punarāha abravīt | kiṃ kurvatī satī | ārāt samīpe samakṣaṃ sakhīnāmagre pratyakṣaṃ yathā syāttathā murāriṃ śrīkṛṣṇam upadarśayantī | kiṃbhūtam | anekanārīparirambhasaṃbhramam anekāśca tāḥ nāryaśca tāsāṃ parirambhaḥ āśleṣaḥ tatra saṃbhramo yasya sa tathā | punaḥ kimbhūtam | sphuranmanohārivilāsalālasam mano hartuṃ śīlamasya sa tathā | vilāso hāsaḥ tatra lālasaḥ kāmo yasya sa tathā sphuraṃścāsau manohārī vilāsalālasaśca tam anekanārīparirambhasaṃbhramasphuranmanohārivilāsalālasam |

root:
anekanārīparirambhasaṃbhramasphuranmanohārivilāsalālasam |

commentary: prakāśayatu bhagavān ity āha | saṃbuddha iti śāśvatadvāreṇa || jagadanuśāsanāc chāstety akṣobhyadvāreṇa || jagatāṃ gurur jagadgurur iti ratnasaṃbhavadvāreṇa || samayo bhagavān śrīvajrasattvaḥ | mahāś cāsau samayaś ca mahāsamayaḥ | tasya tattvaṃ mahāsamayatattvaṃ | taj jānātīti mahāsamayatattvajña iti | amitābhadvāreṇa || indriyāṇi mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇi | teṣām āśayo 'bhiprāyaḥ | taṃ vettīti indriyāśayavid ity amoghasiddhidvāreṇa || evaṃ pañcatathāgatāmako bhagavān para utkṛṣṭaḥ prakāśayatv ity arthaḥ ||

root:

kelicalanmaṇikuṇḍalamaṇḍitagaṇḍayugasmitaśālī ||
commentary: iha mugdhavadhūnikare hariḥ kṛṣṇo vilasati krīḍati | mugdhāḥ manohāriṇyaśca tāḥ vadhvaśceti tāsāṃ nikaraḥ kadambakastasmin | kimbhūte | vilāsini | vilāsaḥ śṛṅgārajanito vikāro 'syāstīti tathā tasmin | kimbhūto hariḥ | candanacarcitanīlakalevarapītavasanavanamālī | nīlaṃ ca tat kalevaraṃ śarīraṃ ceti | candanena carcitamanuliptaṃ yasya sa tathā | pītaṃ vasanaṃ dukūlaṃ yasya sa tathā | vanamālāsyāstīti vanamālī | punaḥ kathambhūtaḥ | kelicalanmaṇikuṇḍalamaṇḍitagaṇḍayugasmitaśālī | kelyā calatī vyālole ca te maṇikuṇḍale ratnairyuktakuṇḍale ca tābhyāṃ maṇḍitaṃ gaṇḍayugaṃ yasya sa tathā | sa cāsau smitaśālī ca īṣaddhāsyayuktaḥ |

root:
candanacarcitanīlakalevarapītavasanavanamālī |
kelicalanmaṇikuṇḍalamaṇḍitagaṇḍayugasmitaśālī ||
commentary:
tad eva prajñāpariśuddhimātrāpekṣayā yathoktaśūnyatāprabhedamukhena maitreyādiṣoḍaśasamādhyātmakam ity ata āha ||

tatra mahāmaitrīmayo 'meya iti maitreyaḥ | mitram asyāstīti maitraṃ | paścān ṅibantaṃ | tataḥ sarvasattveṣu maitrīmayo maitrīsvabhāvaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau maitrīmayaś ca mahāmaitrīmayaḥ | ata evāmeyaḥ sakalasattvadhātāv ekaputraprematvāt || mahākāruṇiko 'gradhīr iti mañjuśrīḥ | mahākaruṇā anālambanātmikā | sā yasyāsti sa mahākāruṇikaḥ | agradhīr iti suviśuddhadharmadhātujñānam | tataś caitad uktaṃ bhavati | audāryagāmbhīryātmako 'sau bhagavān iti || mahāprājño mahādhīmān iti gandhahastī | mahatī prajñā dharmapravicayalakṣaṇātmikā sā yasyāsti sa prājñaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau prājñaś ca mahāprājñaḥ | ata eva mahādhīmān || mahopāyo mahākṛtīti jñānaketuḥ | mahān upāyo yasyāsau mahopāyaḥ | tataś ca mahākṛtī mahāpaṇḍitaḥ sarvasattvāśayānuśayajñatayā saddharmaprakāśakatvāt ||

root:
vācaḥ pallavayatyumāpatidharaḥ saṃdarbhaśuddhiṃ girāṃ jānīte jayadeva eva śaraṇaḥ ślāghyo durūhadrute |
śṛṅgārottarasatprameyaracanairācāryagovardhanaspardhī ko 'pi na viśrutaḥ śrutidharo dhoyī kavikṣmāpatiḥ ||
commentary: umāpatidharo vācaḥ pallavayati kevalaṃ komalāṃ vācaṃ vistārayatītyarthaḥ | na tu girāṃ vāṇīnāṃ saṃdarbhaśuddhiṃ jānīte | tathā śaraṇaḥ kaviḥ ślāghyaḥ praśastaḥ | kasmin viṣaye | durūhadrute | duḥkhena apyūhituṃ śakyata iti durūhaḥ | durūhaṃ ca drutaṃ ca taṃ tasmin | atiśīghraṃ vaktuṃ samartha ityarthaḥ | tathā ācāryo govardhanaḥ ślāghyaḥ | kaiḥ śṛṅgārottarasatprameyaracanaiḥ | śṛṅgārottarāṇi śṛṅgārapradhānāni ca satprameyāni utkṛṣṭaprameyāni ca teṣāṃ racanāni | śṛṅgārottarasatprameyaracanāni taiḥ | tathā dhoyī nāma kavikṣmāpatiḥ kavirājaḥ śrutidharaḥ śrutyā śravaṇena dhārayatītyarthaḥ | asya ślokasya kaviḥ kṣmāpatiḥ rājā lakṣmaṇasenaḥ |

root:

śṛṅgārottarasatprameyaracanairācāryagovardhanaspardhī ko 'pi na viśrutaḥ śrutidharo dhoyī kavikṣmāpatiḥ ||
commentary: kiṃviśiṣṭāṃ nāmasaṃgītiṃ śrotum udyata iti | pavitrām iti māñgalyāṃ | aghanāśanīm iti pāpanāśanīṃ ||

commentary: tathā kācidgopavadhūḥ anugāyati | udañcitapañcamarāgam | udañcitaḥ ūrdhvaṃ gacchan sa cāsau pañcamaḥ pañcamākhyaḥ rāgo yatra tam | kiṃ kṛtvā | sarāgaṃ yathā syāttathā hariṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ preyāṃsaṃ parirabhya gāḍhāmāliṅgya | kena kṛtvā | pīnapayodharabhārabhareṇa | pīnau pṛthulau tau ca payodharau ca tāveva bhārau guruvastunī |

root:
pīnapayodharabhārabhareṇa hariṃ parirabhya sarāgam |
gopavadhūranugāyati kācidudañcitapañcamarāgam ||
commentary:
evaṃ tāvad anayor anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ guṇadoṣāv abhidhāya, anarthavivarjanārthaṃ niṣphalaspandavarjanam āha.

prathamaṃ tāvad idaṃ cittam ity adhyātmani cintayati. sarvakālam īdṛśam uktakramayuktam upasthāpayitavyam. tataḥ paraṃ niṣphalaspandavarjanārtham apagatakaraṇagrāmeṇeva niṣphalarūpādiviṣayagrahaṇasarvavikalpopasaṃhārān mayā sthātavyam. kim iva? kāṣṭhavat, cakṣurādivyāpāraśūnyatvāt.

commentary: kāpi prauḍhagopī adhikaṃ yathā syāttathā dhyāyati | kim | madhusūdanavadanasarojam | madhudaityaṃ sūditavān marditavāniti madhusūdanaḥ tasya vadanameva sarojaṃ mukhakamalam | kiṃviśiṣṭam | vilāsavilolavilocanakhelanajanitamanojam | vilāsena līlayā vilole ca te vilocane nayane ca tābhyāṃ kṛtvā khelanaṃ tathā saha krīḍā tasmājjanito manojaḥ kandarpo yena sa tathā tat |

dhyāyati mugdhavadhūradhikaṃ madhusūdanavadanasarojam ||
commentary: atra cārthe 'nupalabdha ity ucyate | tad ayuktam | upalabdhārthaviṣayam api pramāṇaṃ bhavaty eva | anubhūtir hi pramāṇaṃ pratyutpannendriyaliṅgādijanitā ca saṃvidanubhūtiḥ | ata evonmīlitākṣasyaikabhāvagocarāṇāṃ dhārāvāhikasaṃvidāṃ prāmāṇyam upapannaṃ bhavati | anyathā tan na syāt | na hi tatrānavagataṃ kiñcid anubhūyate | deśakālāntarasambandho 'nubhūyata iti ced na | ekadeśasthe 'pi bhāvāt | kālas tu parokṣaḥ | na ca parokṣāparokṣasambandho 'parokṣo bhavati tarumarutsaṃyogavat | ato 'vagatārtham anadhikārtham api grahaṇaṃ pramāṇam iti vācyam | na caivaṃ smṛtitvāpātaḥ | smṛtir hi pūrvānubhavaprabhāvitabhāvanāvaśalabdhasiddhir nādhikam apekṣate grahaṇatva nendriyasāpekṣam ity uktam | ata eva gṛhītam api punargṛhyamāṇaṃ dṛśyata iti laukikā vyapadiśanti na tu smaryata iti | ato na vidmaḥ kimarthe 'nupalabdha ity anena nirasyata iti ata āha sarvasyeti | ayam arthaḥ anupalabdhārthaviṣayam eva sarvaṃ pramāṇam | anyathā smṛtitvāpātāt | na hi grahaṇasmaraṇayor gṛhītāgṛhītagocarayor gṛhītāgṛhītagocaragato viśeṣa upalabhyate | yat tu kāraṇabhedād bheda ity uktam satyam | svarūpabhedaupayikaḥ kāraṇabhedaḥ | svarūpaṃ tu gṛhītāgṛhītaviṣayatvād eva bhinnam | anubhūtir grahaṇam iti ced yady api so 'nubhūtiḥ anumānādiṣu smṛtitvaprasaṅgaḥ | ato 'vaśyaṃ gṛhītāgṛhītāgocaratvam eva grahaṇasmaraṇayor bhedaḥ | kim idānīṃ dhārāvāhikasaṃvido na pramāṇam | na hi kā ....... ktam | atrocyate | tatrāpy uttarottarakālākalitabhāvapratyākalanād upapannam evādhikagantṛtayā prāmāṇyam | na ca vaiśeṣikādivat parokṣaṃ kālam ācakṣmahe | pratyakṣam eva hi ..... vartamānakālasambandhān bhāvānupalabhāmahe | katham arūpaṃ pratyakṣam iti cet | ākāśavad bhaviṣyati | na hi rūpi pratyakṣam iti naḥ pratyakṣalakṣaṇam api tarhi saṃvid eva parokṣāparokṣanirbhāsodīyamānedaṃ pratyakṣam idam apratyakṣam iti vibhajate | tad evaṃ visphāritākṣasya vyaktānupalakṣitottarottarasūkṣmakṣaṇabhedabhinnaikabhāvavi....kāparokṣanirbhāsāvabhāsodayāt upapannā pratyakṣatā pramāṇatā ca | ataḥ pramāṇāntarānupalabdhasvagocarapratyākalanād upapannam upadeśaprāmāṇyam iti sūktam arthe 'nupalabdha iti | atra bhāṣyam upadeśa iti viśiṣṭasya śabdasyoccāraṇam iti | tatra codanā vidhipadaparyāyaḥ śabdaviśeṣo bhāṣyakārasyābhimataḥ ity āha codaneti | etad uktaṃ bhavati vidhāyakaśabda upadeśa iti ||

commentary: tathā kācidaṅganā amuṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ kareṇa dukūle vicakarṣa ākṛṣṭavatī | kasmin sthāne | yamunājalakūle | yamunāyāḥ jalakūlaṃ tīraṃ tasmin | kena nimittena | kelikalākutukena | kelau kāmakrīḍāyāṃ kalāstāsu kutukaṃ vinodastena | kimbhūtam | mañjulavañjulakuñjagatam | mañjulaḥ sundaro yo vañjulaḥ tasya kuñje sthitam |

commentary:
idam api bodhisattvenābhyasanīyam ity āha.

dakṣaḥ sarvatra paṭupracāraḥ. utthānasaṃpannaḥ kausīdyāpanayanād vīryasamanvāgataḥ. ata eva svayam eva sarvaṃ karaṇīyam, na parāpekṣā kvacid api karmaṇi kāryā. idam eva nāvakāśa ityādinā darśayati.

karatalatālataralavalayāvalikalitakalasvanavaṃśe |
rāsarase saha nṛtyaparā hariṇā yuvatī praśaśaṃse ||
commentary: na ca tasyā nāśādvrataskhalanādvā nirarthakastvatprayāsa ity āha-tāṃ ceti || he megha, divasānām avaśiṣṭadinānāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ saṅkhyāne tatparām āsaktām || "tatpare pratitāsaktau" ity amaraḥ || ata evāvyāpannām amṛtām | śāpāvasāne madāmanamatyāśayā jīvantīm ity arthaḥ | ekaḥ patir yasyāḥ saikapatnī tām | pativratām ity arthaḥ || "nityaṃ sapatnyādiṣu" iti ṅīp nakāraś ca || bhrātur me jāyāṃ bhrātṛjāyām | mātṛrvan niḥśaṅkadarśanīyām ity āśayaḥ | tāṃ matpriyām avihatagatir avicchinnagatiḥ sann avaśyaṃ drakṣyasi cālokayiṣyasa eva || tathā hi | āśātitṛṣṇā || "āśā digatitṛṣṇayoḥ" iti yādavaḥ || badhyate 'neneti bandho bandhanam | vṛntam iti yāvat | āśaiva bandha āśābandhaḥ kartā || praṇayi premayuktam ata eva kusumasadṛśam sukumāram ity arthaḥ | ata eva viprayoge virahe sadyaḥpāti sadyobhraṃśanaśīlam aṅganānāṃ hṛdayaṃ jīvitam || "hṛdayaṃ jīvite citte vakṣasyākūtayoḥ" iti śabdārṇave || prāyaśaḥ prāyeṇa ruṇaddhi pratibadhnāti || arthāntaranyāsaḥ ||

root:
śliṣyati kāmapi cumbati kāmapi kāmapi ramayati rāmām |
paśyati sasmitacārutarāmaparāmanugacchati vāmām ||
commentary: tathā kāmapi bālāṃ śliṣyati upagūhati | kāmapi bālāṃ cumbati | kāmapi rāmāṃ ramayati krīḍayati | sasmitacāru hasitaṃ cāru yathā syāttathā aparām anyāṃ paśyati prekṣate | aparām anugacchati | gacchantīmanusarati |

root:
śliṣyati kāmapi cumbati kāmapi kāmapi ramayati rāmām |
paśyati sasmitacārutarāmaparāmanugacchati vāmām ||
commentary:
kutaḥ | āha—vajretyādi | neṣṭaṃ yataḥ | aniṣṭir eva kutaḥ | āha—vajragarbhe tadagre ca sātarūpākṣobhyāstitvena vajrasattvamudrāviyogāt | antarāle kapāle ca, āstāṃ tāvad vajrasattvamudrāviyogo 'dhyavasitasātasaṃvedanabhāvād grāhyādibhāvenākṣobhyamudrāyā api viyogāt | etac ca pūrvoktavajrasattvamudrāviyogata ity anuvṛtter labhyate |

tarhi tattvaṃ kutra jñeyam | tattvaṃ vittau guror mukhād iti | anena ṣoḍaśārdhārdhabindudhṛgbhagavato yatrāvasthānaṃ tad āmnāyate | tad āhuḥ—

	beṇṇi vi galle beṇṇi vi tulle |
	vājja paḍante paṃmu acchüante ||
	vājja paḍantā akhobbhaḍā paṃmu acchüantā vājja |
	kājje kāraṇa muddïa ehu so mahāsuharājja || 

etayor vajrarūpasattvarūpayor vajrasattvaśūnyatākaruṇāprajñopāyanirvāṇabhavādivyapadeśo boddhavyaḥ | ayam eva cārtha utpattikrame mahārāgād drutāpattau candrārkamadhyasthabindudvayarūpeṇordhvādhovartinā tatra tatra bhagavatā darśitaḥ | utpannas tu yathoktaḥ sekārthaḥ | pariniṣpannas tu dravād bolarūpasūryasthaḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ śūnyatākaruṇārūpo dharmadhātusvabhāva utthito bhagavān | ekapādāṅguṣṭhāsanalagnatā tu skhaladavasthākālākalitatāṃ sūcayitum ||

nanv evam—

	vajravaraṭakamadhyasthaṃ hūṃtattvaṃ vibhāvayet punaḥ ||

iti katham | atra hi vajravaraṭakasya madhyastham ity asyārthasya vighaṭanāt | na | anyārthatvād asya | tathā hi vajravaraṭakayoḥ prajñopāyavarāṅgayor madhyasthaṃ hūṃtattvam iti ha iti hetuśūnyam u ity ūhāpagatam aṃ ity apratiṣṭhitaṃ bhāvayed iti vivakṣitatvāt |

tarhi maṇer antargatam iti katham | ucyate | atrāpy anya evārthaḥ | tathā hi maṇyoḥ paṅkajakuliśayor antargatam itīdam api sustham | 

nanv etat katham avagamyate yad ubhayatrāyam artho vivakṣita iti | ucyate—

	kamalākāśe maṇivaraṭakayoḥ pīḍanasthāne |
	vajraparyaṅkataś cittaṃ maṇyantargatam īkṣayan |
	yat tad utpadyate jñānaṃ jñānaṃ tadrūpam ity alam ||

iti paramādye pravacanāt | atrāyam arthaḥ | kamalasyākāśe kamalamadhyaśūnyadeśe maṇivaraṭakayoḥ pañkajakuliśayoḥ pīḍanasthāne saṅghaṭṭanasthāne | vajraparyaṅkata iti vajrasya pari sarvato 'ṅkataḥ kroḍata iti pañcamyā vajrād bahir lagnamātraṃ vivakṣitam | cittaṃ maṇyor antargatam īkṣamāṇasya yad vijñānam utpadyate tad vijñānasvarūpam ity arthaḥ | tathā ca vajāmṛte—

	nābhimadhye sthitaṃ devi karṇikāgūḍhagocare |
	sravate śukrarūpeṇa bhagaliṅgāntare sthitam ||

iti | uktaṃ ca hevajre—

	candrāli kālimārtaṇḍa bījaṃ madhyagataṃ bhavet |

iti | tathā ca |

	yāvan no patati prabhāsvaramayaḥ śītāṃśudhārādravo 
		devīpadmadalodare samarasībhūto jinānāṃ gaṇaiḥ |
	sphūrjadvajraśikhāgrataḥ karuṇayābhinnaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ 
		tāvac chrīkaruṇābalasya sahajaṃ jānīhi rūpaṃ vibhoḥ || (1)

	yāvad vajramaṇes trivajradahane bhraśyan vidhur vāyunā 
		tiṣṭhaty abjapuṭe sukoṭarakuṭīlīnecchur asmin kṣaṇe |
	yad bhūtaṃ svaparādikalparahitaṃ vyāpārahīnaṃ mano
		jānīmaḥ sahajaṃ tad eva hi punar yuktyāgamena sphuṭam | (2) 

	prajñāpaṅkajavajrayogaparamānandāvaśeṣe sthite
		sthānasrāvaviśuddhabindur acalo yāvan mṛgāṅko mataḥ |
	tāvac cittam acañcalaṃ calamarutsrotaś ca vidhvaṃsyate 
		na śrotraṃ śṛṇute 'kṣi neṅgati mahāmudreti sā ceṣyate || (3) 

tarhi—

	nānyena kathyate sahajaṃ na kasminn api labhyate |
	ātmanā jñāyate puṇyād guruparvopasevayā ||

ity uktaṃ katham | atra guruparva vajraparva | sevākāla ity arthasaṅgatyabhāvād upasevābhāvāt | na | upaśabdena sāmīpyavācakatvena vajrād bahiḥ samīpe sevety uktam | 

tarhi—

	bolasaukhyaṃ mahāmudrā vajrāyatanam upāyakam |

iti katham | atrāpi yad bolasaukhyaṃ sā mahāmudrā | vajram eva āyatanaṃ sthānam upāyakam ity arthāsaṅgateḥ | na | bolasaukhyaṃ mahāmudrā ca vajrāyatanasthaṃ yat sa paramānandaḥ | tad upāyakam iti darśitam | kiṃ cāsmanmate—

	athāto rahasyaṃ vakṣye samāsān na tu vistarāt |
	rahasye parame 

ityādi sustham | tathā hi rahasye rahasyaṃ vakṣya iti sambandhaḥ | rahasya iti rahau vajraṃ padmamṃ ca tayor antarāle | seti sarvākāreṇa | yeti yathātathyam | ety advayam | ītīdantātītam | 

tathā coktam—

	repho vajram iti prokto hakāraḥ padmam ucyate |

iti ||

root:
śrījayadevabhaṇitamidamadbhutakeśavakelirahasyam |
vṛndāvanavipine lalitaṃ vitanotu śubhāni yaśasyam ||
commentary: śrījayadevabhaṇitamidam udayati śobhate | idamiti kim | adbhutakeśavakelirahasyam | adbhutāḥ keśavasya kelayaḥ krīḍāstāsāṃ rahasyam | kimbhūtam | yaśasyaṃ yaśaskaram | śubhāni vitanotu vistārayatu | gītāpekṣitārthaṃ ślokābhyāṃ sūcayati |

root:
śrījayadevabhaṇitamidamadbhutakeśavakelirahasyam |
vṛndāvanavipine lalitaṃ vitanotu śubhāni yaśasyam ||
commentary: maṇḍala ityādi | etat tantroktamaṇḍala iti bhāvaḥ | samāhito ’nuddhatakāyavāṅmanovyāpārāt | śraddhā abhisampratyayaḥ | yatna udyogaḥ ||

root:
yadi harismaraṇe sarasaṃ mano yadi vilāsakalāsu kutūhalam |
madhurakomalakāntapadāvalīṃ śṛṇu tadā jayadevasarasvatīm || 1.4 ||
commentary: harismaraṇe śrikṛṣṇānucintane yadi mano hṛdayaṃ sarasaṃ sarāgaṃ tavāsti | yadi ca vilāsakalāsu tava kutūhalamasti | vipūrvo las kāntau dhātuḥ | vilāsānāṃ kalāḥ tāsu | kautūhalaṃ kautukaṃ ca kutukaṃ ca kutūhalam ityamaraḥ | tadā he budhajana jayadevasya kaveḥ sarasvatīṃ vāṇīṃ gṛṇu ākarṇaya | kathaṃbhūtāṃ sarasvatīm | madhurakomalakāntapadāvalīm | madhuraṃ svādu karṇayeyam | komalaṃ snigdham | kāntaṃ kamanīyam | etairguṇairupetā padāvalī padapaṅktiryasyāḥ sā tathā tām |

root:
yadi harismaraṇe sarasaṃ mano yadi vilāsakalāsu kutūhalam |
madhurakomalakāntapadāvalīṃ śṛṇu tadā jayadevasarasvatīm || 1.4 ||
commentary:
tasmāt sarvakalmaṣaparityāgena iyam ucitā karmakāritā śikṣaṇīyety āha.

sarvāvadyavinirmuktatvād viśvastam. ānupūrvyā vyavasthitapadam. asaṃdigdhārtham. manaḥprahlādanakaram. śravaṇāpy āyakam. karuṇārasaniṣyandabhūtaṃ na rāgādinidānam. mṛdusvaramakarkaśavacanam. mandasvaraṃ yāvatā dhvaninā pratipādyasya pratītiḥ syāt, na tato nyūnaṃ nātiriktam udīrayan.

root:
pralayapayodhijale dhṛtavānasi vedaṃ
vihitavahitracaritramakhedam |
keśava dhṛtamīnaśarīra jaya jagadīśa hare ||
commentary: he keśava dhṛtamīnaśarīra | dhṛtaṃ mīnasya śarīraṃ yena sa tathā | tasya saṃbodhanam | he dhṛtamīnaśarīra | akhedaṃ yathā syāttathā tvaṃ vedaṃ dhṛtavānasi | kasmin | pralayapayodhijale | pralaye saṃvartakāle payodhirarṇavastasya jalaṃ tasmin | mahāpralayakāle parameśvaro vedaṃ svīkṛtya brahmāṇamutpādya tasmai prayacchati | yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrva yo 'sau vedāṃśca prahiṇoti tasmai | iti śrutiḥ | kiṃbhūtaṃ vedam | vihitavahitracaritram | vihitaṃ kṛtaṃ vahitrasyapotasya caritraṃ ācaritaṃ yena sa tathā | vahitraṃ sāgaratārakaṃ bhavati | vedo 'pi nityanaimittikakarmapratipādanadvāreṇa saṃsārasāgaratārako bhavatītyarthaḥ | jaganti īṣṭe niyamayatīti jagadīśaḥ | tasya saṃbodhanaṃ he jagadīśa | he hare smṛtaḥ san harati saṃsārakleśamiti hariḥ tasya saṃbodhanaṃ | he hare | tvaṃ jaya | svamāyayā śatrusaṃharaṇadvāreṇa svabhaktaparipālanena sarvotkṛṣṭo bhava |

root:
pralayapayodhijale dhṛtavānasi vedaṃ
vihitavahitracaritramakhedam |
keśava dhṛtamīnaśarīra jaya jagadīśa hare ||
commentary: he rādhe purato 'grataḥ | dṛśyase avalokyase | kasya | mama | kiṃ nu gatāgataṃ gamanāgamanam | vidadhāsi karoṣi | kimiti pureva pūrvānubhūtamiva | parirambhaṇamāliṅganaṃ na dadāsi | kimbhūtam | sasaṃbhramaṃ saha saṃbhrameṇa vartata iti |

root:
kṣitirativipulatare tava tiṣṭhati pṛṣṭhe 
dharaṇidharaṇakiṇacakragariṣṭhe |
keśava dhṛtakacchaparūpa jaya jagadīśa hare || 1.6 ||
commentary: he keśava dhṛtakacchaparūpa | dhṛtaṃ kacchapasya rūpaṃ yena sa tathā saṃbuddhiḥ | tava pṛṣṭhe kṣitiḥ pṛthvī tiṣṭhati | kiṃbhūte | ativipulatare | atiśayena vipulaṃ vistīrṇaṃ tasmin | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | dharaṇidharaṇakiṇacakragariṣṭhe | dharaṇyāḥ bhūmerdharaṇaṃ tena kiṇaḥ mṛtaraktagranthiḥ | sa eva cakraṃ cakrākāraḥ tena gariṣṭhaṃ gurutaram | tasmin | jagadīśa hare iti sarvatra yojyam |

root:
kṣitirativipulatare tava tiṣṭhati pṛṣṭhe 
dharaṇidharaṇakiṇacakragariṣṭhe |
keśava dhṛtakacchaparūpa jaya jagadīśa hare || 1.6 ||
commentary: rādhāṃ prati sahacarī sakhī sarasaṃ yathā syāttathā yadagre gītena vakṣyamāṇaṃ idameva ūce uvāca | rasena saha vartata iti sarasam | tatkriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ dvitīyāntaṃ napuṃsakameva | kiṃbhūtām rādhām | valadbādhāṃ valantī vardhamānā bādhā vyathā yasyāstām | kasmin kāle | vasante | kiṃbhūtām bhramantīṃ calantīm | kasmin | kāntāre durge pathi mārge | kairavayavaiḥ | caraṇādibhiḥ | kiṃbhūtaiḥ | vāsantīkusumasukumāraiḥ | vāsantī mādhavīlatā | tasyāḥ kusumāni | tadvat sukumārā mṛdulāḥ taiḥ | punaḥ kiṃbhūtām | bahuvihitakṛṣṇānusaraṇām | bahudhā anekaprakāreṇa athavā bahuvāraṃ vihitaṃ kṛtaṃ kṛṣṇānusaraṇaṃ kṛṣṇānveṣaṇaṃ yayā sā tathā tām| kayā hetubhūtayā| amandaṃ atyarthaṃ yathā syāttathā kandarpajvarajanitacintākulatayā | dāhahetutvāt kandarpa eva jvaraḥ athavā kandarpeṇa jvarastena janitā prādurbhūtā jīvanacintā tayā ākulā vyākulā tasyāḥ bhāvastayā |

root:
vasati daśanaśikhare dharaṇī tava lagnā 
śaśini kalaṅkakaleva nimagnā |
keśava dhṛtaśūkararūpa jaya jagadīśa hare || 1.7 ||
commentary: tava daśanaśikhare dantasyāgre lagnā dharaṇī pṛthvī vasati tiṣṭhati | daśanasya śikharaṃ tasmin | kasmin keva | śaśini candre nimagnā kalaṅkakaleva | kalaṅkasya kalā kalaṅkakalā |

root:
vasati daśanaśikhare dharaṇī tava lagnā 
śaśini kalaṅkakaleva nimagnā |
keśava dhṛtaśūkararūpa jaya jagadīśa hare || 1.7 ||
commentary: hariṇadvayaveṣṭitāṃ kuryāt | tadadhaḥ kramaśīrṣapaṭṭikāṃ dadyāt | toraṇapārśvadvaye tu yathāśobhaṃ vajrāradvayaṃ dadyāt | cihnadvayaṃ koṇacchatraṃ ca | evaṃ yathāśobhaṃ darpaṇacāmarādikaṃ likhet | maṇḍalasya catuḥkoṇebhyo niḥśaṅka nānārūpān kalpavṛkṣān saṃlikhet ||

root:
tava karakamalavare nakham adbhutaśṛṅgaṃ 
dalitahiraṇyakaśiputanubhṛṅgam |
keśava dhṛtanaraharirūpa jaya jagadīśa hare || 1.8 ||
commentary: he keśava | dhṛtanaraharirūpa | naraharinṛsiṃhaḥ | dhṛtaṃ narahareḥ rūpaṃ yena sa tathā | tava karakamalavare nakhaṃ tiṣṭhati | kara eva kamalavaraṃ padmaśreṣṭhaṃ tasmin | kiṃbhūtaṃ nakham | adbhutaśṛṅgam | adbhutamāścaryajanakaṃ śṛṅgaṃ agrabhāgo yasya tat | adṛṣṭapūrvamityarthaḥ | punaḥ kiṃbhūtam | dalitahiraṇyakaśiputanubhṛṅgam | hiraṇyakaśipostanuḥ śarīraṃ saiva śyāmatvād bhṛṅgaḥ | dalito vidārito hiraṇyakaśipostanubhṛṅgo yena sa tathā tat |

root:
tava karakamalavare nakham adbhutaśṛṅgaṃ 
dalitahiraṇyakaśiputanubhṛṅgam |
keśava dhṛtanaraharirūpa jaya jagadīśa hare || 1.8 ||
commentary: kiṃ kṛtvā | smitam ityādi | lokānāṃ sattvānām apāyatrayaśodhanaṃ narakatiryakpretasaṃśodhanaṃ smitaṃ darśayitvā vajrapāṇiṃ pratyabhāṣateti saṃbandhaḥ || tathāgatānāṃ dharmadeśanāyās triliṅgāni | tad yathā | smitaṃ vyavalokitaṃ raśmisaṃcodanaṃ ca | kvacid ekaṃ kvacid dve kvacit trīṇi vā yugapad bhavanti | tad yathā śrīmāyājālatantre dvayaṃ paṭhyate | smitaṃ vyavalokitaṃ ca | kvacit trīṇi yathā pañcaviṃśatisāhasryāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ maitreyavyavalokanaṃ smitaṃ mukhena raśmispharaṇaṃ ceti | kvacid ekaṃ yathātraiva nāmasaṃgītau smitaṃ saṃdarśya lokānām iti || tac ca smitaṃ caturvidhaṃ | aṅgapratyaṅgaspharaṇena romakūpaspharaṇena prakṛtiprabhāvispharaṇena jihvendriyaraśmispharaṇena ca | tad atra jihvāprātihāryaṃ | deśanāyāḥ pūrvaliṅgaṃ || trailokyābhāsakaraṇam ityādinā darśayati bhūr bhuvaḥ svar iti trayāṇāṃ lokānām ābhāsakaraṇaṃ prakāśanakaraṇaṃ smitaṃ darśayitvā vajrapāṇiṃ pratyabhāṣateti saṃbandhaḥ || punar api kiṃviśiṣṭaṃ smitam ity āha caturmārāriśāsanam iti | catvāro mārāḥ skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputrāḥ | ta evārayas teṣāṃ śāsanam anuśāsanaṃ nigrahaḥ ||

root:
chalayasi vikramaṇe balimadbhutavāmana 
padanakhanīrajanitajanapāvana |
keśava dhṛtavāmanarūpa jaya jagadīśa hare ||
commentary: he keśava | dhṛtavāmanarūpa | dhṛtaṃ vāmanaṃ rūpaṃ yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhanam | he adbhutavāmana | tvaṃ baliṃ chalayasi pravañcayasi | kasmin viṣaye | vikramaṇe | viḥ pakṣī viruddhaḥ tasyākramaṇaṃ tasmin iti dhvaniḥ | vikramaṇaviṣaye he padanakhanīrajanitajanapāvana | padasya nakhāḥ padanakhāḥ teṣāṃ nīraṃ jalaṃ tena janitaṃ utpāditaṃ janāya pāvanaṃ pavitrībhāvo yenaṃ sa tathā tasya saṃbodhanam |

root:
chalayasi vikramaṇe balimadbhutavāmana 
padanakhanīrajanitajanapāvana |
keśava dhṛtavāmanarūpa jaya jagadīśa hare ||
commentary: mahābhavetyādi | tatra mahābhavādrisaṃbhetteti mahāsthāmaprāptaḥ | bhavaḥ paṇcopādānaskandhāḥ | ta evādrir ajñānaśailatvāt | tasya samyagaviparītajñānalābhād bhañjanaśīlaḥ saṃbhettā | mahāṃś cāsau bhavādrisaṃbhettā ca mahābhavādrisaṃbhettā || mahāvajradharo ghana iti sarvāpāyañjahaḥ | mahāvajraṃ samantabhadrajñānaṃ tad dhārayatīti mahāvajradharaḥ | nibiḍatvān mūrtimattvāc ca ghanaḥ || mahākrūro mahāraudra iti sarvaśokatamonirghātamatiḥ | mahāṃś cāsau krūraś ca mahākrūraḥ | durdāntānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahākrodharūpasaṃdarśanāt | mahāraudra iti | śānto 'py asau bhagavān mañjuśrīḥ sattvavinayavaśād raudratām api darśayatīti || mahābhayabhayaṃkara iti jālinīprabhaḥ | mahābhayo mahābhairavarūpadhārī śaṃkara iti | tasyāpi bhayaṃ karotīti mahābhayabhayaṃkaraḥ ||

root:
gaṇayati guṇagrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ bhrāmādapi nehate vahati ca parītoṣaṃ doṣaṃ vimuñcati dūrataḥ |
yuvatiṣu calattṛṣṇe kṛṣṇe vihāriṇi māṃ vinā punarapi mano vāmaṃ kāmaṃ karoti karomi kim ||
commentary: he sakhi mamedaṃ mano vāmameva kāmaṃ karoti kimahaṃ karomi | kutaḥ | yataḥ kṛṣṇe kāmābhilāṣaṃ karoti | kimbhūte | māṃ vinā vihāriṇi krīḍati | punaḥ kimbhūte | calattṛṣṇe calantī vardhamānā tṛṣṇā yasya sa tathā tasmin | kāsu | yuvatiṣu | na kevalaṃ kāmaṃ karoti | tasya kṛṣṇasya guṇagrāmaṃ gaṇayati | kiñca | kṛṣṇāt bhrāmaṃ calanaṃ bhramādapi bhrāntivaśādapi nehate | na kurute | tasminneva tiṣṭhatītyarthaḥ | tasmin kṛṣṇe parītoṣaṃ vahati | sadā doṣaṃ ca dūrataḥ pravimuñcati parityajatītyarthaḥ |

root:
gaṇayati guṇagrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ bhrāmādapi nehate vahati ca parītoṣaṃ doṣaṃ vimuñcati dūrataḥ |
yuvatiṣu calattṛṣṇe kṛṣṇe vihāriṇi māṃ vinā punarapi mano vāmaṃ kāmaṃ karoti karomi kim ||
commentary: nīpam iti || sāraṅgā mataṅgajāḥ kuraṅgā bhṛṅgā vā || "sāraṅgaś cātake bhṛṅge kuraṅge ca mataṅgaje" iti viśvaḥ || ardharūḍhair ekadeśodgataiḥ kesaraiḥ kiñjalkair haritaṃ pālāśavarṇa kapiśaṃ kṛṣṇapītaṃ ca || "pālāśo harito harit" iti | "śyāvaḥ syāt kapiśo dhūmradhūmalau kṛṣṇalohite" iti cāmaraḥ || śyāmavarṇam iti yāvat || "varṇo varṇena" iti samāsaḥ || nīpaṃ sthalakadambakusumam || "atha sthakadambake | nīpaḥ syāt pulake" iti śabdārṇave || dṛṣṭvā saṃprekṣya | viditveti yāvat | tathā kacchev anukaccham ||  || "avyayaṃ vibhakti-" ityādinā vibhaktyarthe 'vyayībhāvaḥ || "jalapāyam anūpaṃ syāt puṃsi kacchas tathāvidhaḥ" ity amaraḥ || āvirbhūtāḥ prathamāḥ prathamotpannā mukulā yāsāṃ tāḥ kandalīr bhūmikadalīḥ || "droṇaparṇī snigdhakandā kandalī bhūkadaly api iti śabdārṇave || jagdhvā bhakṣayitvā || "ado jagdhiḥ-" iti jagdhyādeśaḥ || araṇyeṣv adhikasurabhim atighrāṇatarpaṇaṃ "dagdhāraṇyeṣu" iti pāṭhe "dagdham" ity adhikaviśeṣaṇam || arthavaśāt kandalīś ca dṛṣṭvaivety anvayo draṣṭavyaḥ || urvyā bhūmer gandham āghrāya jalalavamuco meghasya te tava mārgaṃ sūcayiṣyanty anumāpayiṣyanti | yatra yatra vṛṣṭikāryaṃ kandalīmukulanīpakusumādikaṃ dṛśyate tatra tatraḥ tvayā vṛṣṭam ity anumīyata iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:

mṛdumadhurasmitabhāṣitayā śithilīkṛtajaghanadukūlam ||
commentary: punaḥ kimbhūtayā | prathamasamāgamalajjitayā | prathamaḥ ādyaścāsau samāgamo milanaṃ tena lajjitā tayā | kathambhūtam | anukūlaṃ vaśavartinam | kaiḥ | paṭucāṭuśataiḥ | paṭūni caturāṇi cāṭūni vacanāni | teṣāṃ śatāni taiḥ | punaḥ kimbhūtayā | mṛdumadhurasmitabhāṣitayā | mṛdu komalaṃ madhuraṃ karṇapeyam | smitena hāsyena yuktaṃ bhāṣitaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathā tayā | punaḥ kimbhūtaṃ tam | śithilīkṛtajaghanadukūlam | śithilīkṛtaṃ śaithilyamāpāditaṃ nitambabhāgaparidhānaṃ vastraṃ yena | jaghanaṃ kaṭeradhobhāgaḥ | hārāvalīviśeṣaṇāni antaritāni  |

commentary: triṣu kāmarūpyārūpyadhātuṣu | durlabhaṃ dīpankarānantaraṃ vipaśyādibhir buddhair adeśitatvāt | aśrutam iti gurunirapekṣārthāvagateḥ | nanu yady evaṃ syāt ko doṣaḥ | buddhājñālaṅghanam eva | atha pratirūpo gurur na prāpyate | arthāvagatiś ca bhavati | tadāvaśyaṃ buddhabodhisattvādipratimāyā agrataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā yāvat parisamāptaṃ tāvad uddeśayet | etad api bhagavatā anujñātam | etat tvayābhāvād aśrutaṃ bhavati | adhogatiṃ narakagatim ||

root:

commentary: punaḥ kimbhūtayā | alasanimīlitalocanayā | alasaṃ yathā syāt tathā nimīlite locane yayā sā tathā tayā | punaḥ kimbhūtam | pulakāvalilalitakapolam | pulakānāṃ āvaliḥ paṅktiḥ tayā lalitau manojñau kapolau yasya tam | vīthyālirāvaliḥ paṅktiḥ śreṇī rekhāstu rājayaḥ ityamaraḥ | punaḥ kimbhūtayā | śramajalasakalakalevarayā | śramajalaṃ svedaḥ sa eva sakale kalevare sarvāṅge yasyāḥ sā tathā tayā | kathambhūtaṃ tam | atilolaṃ cañcalaṃ taralam | kasmāt | varamadanamadāt | madanena varaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ madanamadaśceti | tasmāt |

root:
alasanimīlitalocanayā pulakāvalilalitakapolam |

commentary: mahāṛddhītyādi | tatra mahāṛddhibalopeta iti bhadrapālaḥ | ṛddher balaṃ ṛddhibalaṃ tenopeta ṛddhibalopetaḥ | mahāṃś cāsāv ṛddhibalopetaś ca mahāṛddhibalopetaḥ || mahāvego mahājava iti sāgaramatiḥ | mahān vego gatir yasyāsau mahāvegaḥ | sarvatathāgatapūjopasthānahetutayānekalokadhātusaṃkramaṇāt | ata eva mahājava ity ucyate || maharddhiko maheśākhya iti akṣayamatiḥ | laukikaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ puṇyajñānasaṃbhāropetatvān maharddhikaḥ | sarvatathāgatapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāraparipūraṇatayāto maheśākhya iti || mahābalaparākrama iti pratibhānakūṭaḥ | mahānti ca tāni balāni ceti daśa tathāgatabalāni sthānāsthānajñānādīni vakṣyamāṇāni teṣu parākramo vīryārambho yasya sa mahābalaparākramaḥ ||

root:

commentary: punaḥ kimbhūtayā | caraṇaraṇitamaṇinūpurayā | caraṇayoḥ raṇitau śabditau maṇibhiryuktau nūpurau yasyāḥ sā tayā | punaḥ kimbhūtaṃ tam | paripūritasuratavitānam | pari sarvatobhāvena pūritaḥ suratasya vitānaḥ vistāro yena sa tathā tam | punaḥ kimbhūtayā | mukharaviśṛṅkhalamekhalayā | mukharāḥ śabdāyamānāḥ viśṛṅkhalā mekhalā kalāpakāñcī yasyāḥ sā tayā | kimbhūtaṃ tam | sakacagrahacumbanadānam | kacānāṃ keśānāṃ grahaḥ grahaṇaṃ sakacagrahaṇena vartata iti | kṛtaṃ sakacagrahacumbanadānaṃ yena sa tathā tam |

root:

mukharaviśṛṅkhalamekhalayā sakacagrahacumbanadānam ||
commentary: hanyād iti māmakyāṃ mātari kāmacittam adhiṣṭhāya pitur akṣobhyasya māraṇaṃ kṛtvā dvābhyāṃ bhakṣayet svadeha evāntar bhāvayet | etenaitad uktaṃ bhavati | krodhādveṣālape jātāmāraṇārthāndhacintakāḥ | na sidhyanti māraṇenaiva krodhabhāvanayā sthitāḥ | kāmayed iti akṣobhyasya sthāne sthitveti bhāvaḥ ||

commentary: śrījayadevabhaṇitamidaṃ vitanotu vistārayatu | kim | śrotṝṇāṃ sukham | idamiti kim | atiśayamadhuripunidhuvanaśīlam | vyavāyo grāmyadharmaḥ syānmaithunaṃ nidhuvanaṃ rataṃ ityamaraḥ | nidhuvane śīlaṃ svabhāvaḥ | atiśayena madhuripoḥ kṛṣṇasya nidhuvanaśīlam | kimbhūtam | salīlam saha līlayā vartata iti | punaḥ kimbhūtam | utkaṇṭhitagopavadhūkathitam | utkaṇṭhā āsaktiviśeṣaḥ | sā jātā yasyāṃ sā gopavadhū rādhā tayā kathitam |

root:

commentary: saṃpūryetyādi. dānādipāramitā eva guṇā, guṇyante 'bhyasyanta iti kṛtvā. tān saṃpūrya paripūrṇān kṛtvā, yat saṃbuddhānāṃ kṛtyaṃ sakalam avaśyakartavyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ tad api kṛtvā, bhūtakoṭeḥ śūnyatālakṣaṇāyāś cittacaittanirodhātmikāyā yat sākṣāt karaṇaṃ tad api sādhyam astīti pāramitānayasthā evaṃ bruvate caturthaṃ sādhyam iti.

commentary: he sakhi māṃ vyathayati | kaḥ | durālokastokastabakanavakāśokalatikā vikāśaḥ | navakāśca tāḥ aśokalatikāśceti | stokaḥ alpaḥ stabakaḥ guccho yasyāḥ sā tathā | tāsāṃ vikāśaḥ | duḥkhena āsamantāt avalokituṃ śakyate iti durālokaḥ sa ca stokastabakanavakāśokalatikāvikāśaśca | na kevalaṃ saḥ kāsāropavanapavano 'pi māṃ vyathayati | sarasīyuktamupavanam ārāmaḥ tasya pavanaḥ so 'pi | kiñcāyamapi na sukhayati | mukulaprasūtiḥ utpattiḥ | keṣām | cūtānām | kathambhūtā | bhrāmyantī bhṛṅgī bhramarī, raṇitena manoharā 'pi punaḥ | kīdṛśī | śikhariṇī | śikhare nivasituṃ śīlamasyā iti | chando 'pi śikhariṇī |

dhyānaṃ tu cittaikāgratālakṣaṇaṃ cittādanyathā vaktumaśakyamity āha-

mantrādyāvartanalakṣaṇā vacanavyāpārā japāḥ. tapāṃsi ca indriyadamanalakṣaṇāḥ kāyikāḥ. tāny atibahukālam abhyastāny apy anyatra saktacittena middhādyupahatacittena vā, samānapāṭavavikalenety arthaḥ, vṛthaiva niṣphalam eva, atyarthakṛśaphalatvāt, abhimatārthe 'nupayogād vā. putro 'py aputra eva, putrakāryākaraṇād yathā. ity āha bhagavān sarvajñaḥ. tasmād dhyānapāramitāpi cittam eva.

malayajarajo nedaṃ bhasma priyārahite mayi prahara na harabhrāntyānaṅga krudhā kimu dhāvasi ||
commentary: he anaṅga kandarpa | harabhrāntyā mahādevo 'yamiti bhrameṇa priyārahite kāntāviyukte mayi viṣaye na prahara prahāraṃ mā kuru | krudhā kopena | kimu dhāvasi śīghramāgacchasi | mama hṛdi biśalatāhāraḥ mṛṇālalatikāsrak | ayaṃ bhujaṅgamanāyako vāsukirna bhavati biśalatāyāḥ hāraḥ | kaṇṭhe kuvalayadalaśreṇī kuvalayānāṃ nīlotpalānāṃ dalāni kusumāni teṣāṃ śreṇī māletyarthaḥ | sā prasiddhā | garaladyutiviṣaśobhā na bhavati | mamāṅge malayajasya candanasya rajo reṇuridaṃ dṛśyate | bhasma na bhavati | etatkomalajalārdrabiśalatāhārādikaṃ sarvaṃ viraha tāpāpanodāya sarvāṅge nyastamāropitam | etadrādhāpriyārahite ekākini mayi na prahara |

commentary: yadi rādhikāyāṃ mānasaṃ manaḥ lagnasamādhi viṣayāsaṅge satyapi | hanteti harṣaviṣādayoḥ tarhi virahasya vyādhiḥ pīḍā | kathaṃ viṣayāsaṅgaḥ | iti anena prakāreṇa | adhunāpi | dṛśornetrayorvibhramāḥ vilāsāḥ svayameva tajjātīyā eva | kimbhūtāḥ | taralāḥ snigdhāḥ taralāśca te snigdhāśceti | yadatra svabhāvasaṃpratyayaḥ | vaktrāmbujasaurabhaṃ saugandhyaṃ yena sa ca | athāpi | girāṃ vācāṃ vakrimā vakrabhāvaḥ sa eva vartate | sudhāsyandī sudhāṃ syandituṃ śīlamasyeti sa tathā | yāsvāditā sapadi bimbādharamādhurī saiva tajjājīyaivāsvādyate | madhurasya bhāvaḥ mādhuryam | bimbādharasya mādhurī sā iti viśeṣā jñeyā |

commentary: iyaṃ rādhā māṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ vilokya dṛṣṭvā calitā nirgatā | kimbhūtam | vṛtaṃ parivṛtam | kena | vadhūnicayena | gopavadhūnāṃ nicayaḥ samūhastena | mayā na nivāritā atibhayena | kayā | sāparādhatayā | saha aparādhena vartata iti sāparādhastasya bhāvaḥ sāparādhatā tayā | sā rādhikā kupiteva kruddheva gatā yātā | kayā | hatādaratayā | hato vinaṣṭo ādaraḥ satkārastasya bhāvastayā | hari hari śiva śiva khede 'rthe dvau śabdau bhavataḥ |

root:
cintayāmi tadānanaṃ kuṭilabhru kopabhareṇa |
śonapadmamivopari bhramatākulaṃ bhramareṇa ||
commentary: tasminn iti || tasminn adrau citrakūṭādrau | abalāviprayuktaḥ kāntāvirahī | kanakasya valayaḥ kaṭakam || "kaṭakaṃ valayo 'striyām" ity amaraḥ || tasya bhraṃśena pātena riktaḥ śūnyaḥ prakoṣṭhaḥ kūrparādadhaḥ pradeśo yasya sa tathoktaḥ || "kakṣāntare prakoṣṭhaḥ syāt prakoṣṭhaḥ kūrparādadhaḥ" iti śāśvataḥ || virahaduḥkhāt kṛśa ity arthaḥ | kāmī kāmukaḥ sa yakṣaḥ | katicinmāsān | aṣṭau māsān ity arthaḥ | "śeṣān māsān gamaya caturaḥ" iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt || nītvā yāpayitvā | āṣāḍhānakṣatreṇa yuktā paurṇamāsyāṣāḍhī || "nakṣatreṇa yuktaḥ kālaḥ" ity aṇ | "ṭiḍḍhāṇañ-" ityādinā ṅīp || sāṣāḍhy asmin paurṇamāsīty āṣāḍho māsaḥ || "sāsmin paurṇamāsīti saṃjñāyām" ity aṇ || tasya prathamadivase āśliṣṭasānum ākrāntakūṭam | vaprakrīḍā utkhātakelayaḥ || "utkhātakeliḥ krīḍādyair vaprakrīḍā nigadyate" iti śabdārṇave || tāsu pariṇatas tiryag dantaprahāraḥ || "tiryagdantaprahāras tu gajaḥ pariṇato mataḥ" iti halāyudhaḥ || sa cāsau gajaś ca tam iva prekṣaṇīyaṃ darśanīyaṃ meghaṃ dadarśa || gajaprekṣaṇīyam ity atreva lopāluptopamā || kecit "āṣāḍhasya prathamadivase" ity atra "pratyāsanne nabhasi" iti vakṣyamāṇanabhomāsasya pratyāsasya "praśamadivase" iti pāṭhaṃ kalpayanti tad asaṅgatam | prathamātireke kāraṇābhāvāt | nabhomāsasya pratyāsatty artham ity uktam iti cen na | pratyāsattimātrasya māsapratyāsattyaiva prathamadivasasyāpy upapatteḥ | atyantapratyāsatter upayogābhāvenāvivakṣitatvāt | vivakṣitatve vā svapakṣe 'pi prathamadivasātikrameṇa meghadarśana kalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvena tadasambhavāt | pratyutāsmatpakṣa eva kuśala sandeśasya bhāvyanarthapratīkārārthasya purata evānumānamuktaṃ bhavatīty upayoga siddhiḥ || nanūnmattasya nāyaṃ viveka iti cen na | unmattasya nānarthasya pratīkārārthaṃ pravṛttir apīti sandeśa eva mā bhūt || tathā ca kāvyārambha evāprasiddhaḥ syād itv aho mūlacchedī pāṇḍityaprakarṣaḥ | kathaṃ tarhi "śāpānto" me bhujagaśayanād utthite śārṅgapāṇau" ityādinā bhagavatprabodhāv adhikasya śāpasya māsacatuṣṭayāvaśiṣṭasyoktiḥ | daśadivasādhikyād iti cet sapakṣe 'pi kathaṃ sā viṃśatidivasair nyūnatvād iti santoṣṭavyam | tasmād īṣadvaiṣamyam avivakṣitam iti suṣṭhūktaṃ "prathamadivase" iti ||

commentary: imāṃ dvādaśatathāgatabhūmyupalakṣitāṃ gāthāṃ girāṃ pater bhāṣate smeti saṃbandhaḥ || kiṃbhūtāṃ ṣaṇmantrarājānasaṃyuktām iti vakṣyamāṇaṣaṇmantropetām || kimātmikām advayodayām iti | dvayaṃ grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ ca | tan na vidyate yasya tad advayaṃ | udety asmād ity udayaḥ | advayasyodayo 'dvayodayaḥ | sa vidyate yasyā gāthāyāṃ sādvayodayā tāṃ bhāṣate sma || punar api kiṃviśiṣṭām | anutpādadharmiṇīṃ iti dharmadhātusvabhāvāṃ śūnyatāsvabhāvām ity arthaḥ ||

root:
stanavinihitamapi hāramudāram |
sa manute kṛśatanuratibhāram || 
rādhikā virahe tava keśava ||
commentary: katham ity āha—brahmetyādi. yata eva suviśuddhabodharūpatvād asau buddhas tad eva paraṃ brahma. tasmāt sa eva brahmā. nirvṛttita iti mokṣarūpatvād ity arthaḥ. nirvṛtir nirvāṇaṃ mokṣo niḥśreyasaṃ buddha iti paryāyāḥ. viṣaṇād iti tādātmyena praveśāt. kva? paramagambhīre dharmakāye. viśateḥ ktapratyayaḥ ṣatvaṇatve ca. sadā sukalyāṇād iti dhruvakalyāṇatvāt paramakalyāṇatvāc ca. sarvar ityādi. yasmād asau sarveṣām ātmani dharmadhātau vedakatvena sthitaḥ, tasmāt sarvaḥ.

root:

commentary: iha mugdhavadhūnikare hariḥ kṛṣṇo vilasati krīḍati | mugdhāḥ manohāriṇyaśca tāḥ vadhvaśceti tāsāṃ nikaraḥ kadambakastasmin | kimbhūte | vilāsini | vilāsaḥ śṛṅgārajanito vikāro 'syāstīti tathā tasmin | kimbhūto hariḥ | candanacarcitanīlakalevarapītavasanavanamālī | nīlaṃ ca tat kalevaraṃ śarīraṃ ceti | candanena carcitamanuliptaṃ yasya sa tathā | pītaṃ vasanaṃ dukūlaṃ yasya sa tathā | vanamālāsyāstīti vanamālī | punaḥ kathambhūtaḥ | kelicalanmaṇikuṇḍalamaṇḍitagaṇḍayugasmitaśālī | kelyā calatī vyālole ca te maṇikuṇḍale ratnairyuktakuṇḍale ca tābhyāṃ maṇḍitaṃ gaṇḍayugaṃ yasya sa tathā | sa cāsau smitaśālī ca īṣaddhāsyayuktaḥ |

commentary:

	sarvākāśāvakāśe śrīvajrasattvas tathāgataḥ |

iti | duḥkhena dāmyanta iti durdāntā īśvarādayas teṣāṃ damakaḥ śāsako vajradharavineyakatvāt teṣām īśvarādīnām | utkṛṣṭatvāṭ paro vajradharaḥ | bhūrlokabhuvarlokasvarlokā iti trayo lokāḥ | tān vijetuṃ śīlam asyeti trilokavijayī || atha vā jayakaramadhukarasarvārthasiddhikarās trayo bhrātaras trilokāḥ | tān vijetuṃ śīlam asyeti trilokavijayī | ata eva vīro bhagavān vajradharaḥ arair anabhibhavanīyatvāt || śrītattvasaṃgrahe pañca guhyāni paṭhyante | tathā hi |

	yathā yathā hi vinayaṃ yānti sattvāḥ svabhāvataḥ |
	tathā tathā hi sattvārthaṃ kuryād rāgādibhiḥ śuciḥ ||
	sarvasattvahitārthāya buddhaśāsanahetutaḥ |
	mārayan sarvasattvāṃs tu na sa pāpena lipyate ||
	sarvasattvahitārthāya buddhakāyaprayogataḥ |
	haraṃs tu paravittāni na sa pāpena lipyate ||
	rāgatulyaṃ sukhaṃ nāsti taj jinebhyaḥ samādadat |
	sattvārthāt paradārāṇi sevayan puṇyam āpnuyāt ||
	sarvasattvahitārthāya buddhaśāsanahetutaḥ |
	sarvakarmāṇi kurvaṃs tu bahu puṇyam avāpnuyāt ||

iti ||

teṣāṃ pañcānāṃ guhyānāṃ rājā guhyarāṭ | guhyair vā rājata iti guhyarāṭ || kuliśo vajras tasyeśvaraḥ kuliśeśvaraḥ || bhagavān vajradharo 'grataḥ sthito bhūtvā kṛtāñjalipuṭa idaṃ vakṣyamānam āheti kriyāpadaṃ sarvatra yojanīyam ||

commentary: sā rādhā nayananalinaṃ locanakamalaṃ diśi diśi kirati kṣipati | kimbhūtam | sajalakaṇajālam | saha jalakaṇajālena vartata iti sa tathā | nanu punaḥ kimbhūtam | vigalitaṃ nālaṃ yasya sa tathā | nanu pratidiśaṃ rudatī mṛgayatītyarthaḥ | anena kimuktam | bhavato lābhāya kajjalābhāvānnayanakamalasajalakusumairdigdevatāmarcayati | ayamāśayaḥ |

root:

commentary:
kutaḥ punar evam ity āha.

sarve hy ete karmākṣepavaśād aniṣṭadāyakā bhavanti. karma ca cittam eva, cetanā karmeti vacanāt. vākkāyakarmaṇor api cittam eva samutthāpakam. tadantareṇa tayor anutpatteḥ, cetayitvā karmeti vacanāt. tasmāt sarvam iha karmanirmitam eva. tac ca cittān nānyat. tad āha-

	karmajaṃ lokavaicitryaṃ cetanā tatkṛtaṃ ca tat |
	cetanā mānasaṃ karma tajje vākkāyakarmaṇī || iti || (Abhidharmakośa 4.1)

na ca anapakāracittasya kecid apakāriṇo nāma. yasmāt-

	nivṛttapāpacittasya nāsti loke bhayaṃ dviṣaḥ |
	sukhahānir na tasyāsti yasya cittaṃ vaśe sthitam ||

ata idam uktam-

	cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham | (Dhammapada 25)

iti. 

tattvavādī bhagavān, vastutattvakathanaśīlatvāt. tenedaṃ tattvaṃ kathitaṃ prakāśitam—sarvaṃ cittaprasūtam iti. ataḥ sarvatra cittam eva pradhānam.

commentary: sā rādhā kiśalayatalpaṃ hutāśanakalpaṃ agnimiva kalayati | manute | kiśalayaṃ navaṃ pallavam | tasya talpaṃ śayanaṃ tattathā | kimbhūtam | vihitaḥ kṛtaścāsau hutāśanavikalpaśceti karmadhārayasamāsaḥ | kiśalayatāmratvādagnisamamityarthaḥ | kimbhūtam | nayanaviṣayamapi | nayanayorviṣayaṃ gocaram | agre vartamānamapi | anena kimuktam | sukhābhāve śītalakomalasyāpyālokanaṃ na karotītyāśayaḥ |

yadi nāma bhṛtyakarmakaraṇaṃ tathāpi tatrānavasthāyisvabhāve vicakṣaṇo jñātvaiva pravartate, evaṃ prakṛte 'pi taddharmiṇi kenābhiprāyeṇa he manaḥ, tvaṃ kuruṣe vyayam upakaraṇopakṣayam?

prāha premabharodbhrāntaṃ mādhavaṃ rādhikāsakhī ||
commentary: rādhikāsakhī gītārthaṃ ślokena prāha | mādhavaṃ pratyāha | kā | rādhikāsakhī | rādhikāyāḥ sakhī | kimbhūtam | mandaṃ yathā syāttathā sthitam | kutra | yamunātīravānīranikuñje | vānīrasya vetasasya nikuñjaṃ yamunātīre vānīranikuñjaṃ tasmin | kimbhūtam | premodbhrāntam | prema prītiḥ tasya bharaḥ ādhikyam | tena u‌dbhrānto vihvalaḥ |

root:
