root:
smarāturaṃ daivata vaidyakṛtya tvadaṅgasaṅgāmṛtamātrasādhyam |
vimuktabādhāṃ kuruṣe na rādhāmupendra vajrādapi dāruṇo 'si ||
commentary: he daivata iṣṭadeva | he vaidyakṛtya vaidyānāṃ kṛtyaṃ kāryaṃ yasmin sa tathā tasya sambodhanam | athavā | daivataṃ devavaidyayoḥ | tasya saṃbodhanam, he dhanvantare he upendra śrīkṛṣṇa vajrādapi dāruṇo 'si | niṣṭhuro 'si | yato vimuktabādhāṃ rādhāṃ na kuruṣe | kimbhūtām | smarāturām | smareṇa kandarpeṇa āturāṃ pīḍitām | kimbhūtām | tvadaṅgasaṅgāmṛtamātrasādhyām | tava aṅgaṃ śarīraṃ tasya saṅgaḥ sa eva amṛtam | tanmātreṇa sādhyāṃ rakṣaṇīyām | vṛttamapi upendravajrā |

root:
smarāturaṃ daivata vaidyakṛtya tvadaṅgasaṅgāmṛtamātrasādhyam |
vimuktabādhāṃ kuruṣe na rādhāmupendra vajrādapi dāruṇo 'si ||
commentary:
catuḥkṣaṇakāraṇam iti namaskārahetur uktaḥ | tatra ke te catuḥkṣaṇāḥ | kīdṛśī ca tatparipāṭiḥ | ata āha—citram ityādi |

nanu tantroktakramam ullaṅghya kim iti tṛtīye vilakṣaṇam iṣyate | tadartham āha—haṭhayoganirākṛteḥ | tatrāyaṃ haṭhayogaḥ—vicitraṃ vividhaṃ grāhyagrāhakabhāvād āliṅganādau | vipākas tadviparīto 'vicitro grāhyābhāvāt sukho jñānabhogo ghṛṣṭau | vimardo nirvikalpaṃ darśanaṃ sukhaṃ ratnaṃ vyāpyāgraṃ yāvat | anyad vilakṣaṇaṃ rāgavarjitaṃ nirbharasukhābhāvāt | arāgavarjitaṃ sukhānubhavasmaraṇena virāgābhāvāt pāte | yad uktam—

   vicitraṃ vividhaṃ khyātam āliṅganacumbanādikam |
   vipākaṃ tadviparyāsaṃ sukhaṃ jñānasya bhuñjanam ||
   vimardam ālocanaṃ proktaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti ca |
   vilakṣaṇaṃ tribhyo 'nyad rāgārāgavivarjitam || 

iti | idaṃ nirākāravādimatena ratnānubhūtaṃ śaradamalamadhyāhnagaganāyamānaṃ samatalaṃ sātasaṃvinmātraṃ sarvanīlādyākāracakrakalaṅkāpagamād avatiṣṭhate | ākārabādhakaṃ tv ekānekaviyogādipramāṇaṃ vistarabhayān na vipañcitam | yad āhuḥ—

   tasmān nārtheṣu na jñāne sthūlābhāsas tadātmanaḥ |
   ekatra pratiṣiddhatvād bahuṣv api na sambhavaḥ ||
   paricchedo 'ntaranyo 'yaṃ bhāgo bahir iva sthitaḥ |
   jñānasyābhedino bhedapratibhāso hy upaplavaḥ || 

iti | idam eva dharmakāyaḥ | tatpṛṣṭhe maṇḍalacakrādyākāraṃ jñānaṃ sambhogaḥ | bhūtabhautikaḥ śākyamunyādyākāro nirmāṇam | eṣām ekasvabhāvatā svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ | evaṃ vimardo dharmaḥ | vipākaḥ sambhogaḥ | vicitraṃ nirmāṇam | vilakṣaṇaḥ svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ | yad uktam—"rūpakāyau tu paścimau"  iti |

"tāvad bhāvayed yāvad anupalabdhikaṃ kuryād" ity ukte etad eva dṛṣṭāntalakṣitaṃ sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsena bhāvyamāno maṇḍalacakrādyākāro niṣpādayiṣyati, pūrvapraṇidhānavaśāt sambhoganirmāṇakāyāv iti |

yadvā sātam idam anubhūtaṃ sādarādibhāvanayā sphuṭatāṃ svayam eṣyati | yad āhuḥ—

   tasmād bhūtam abhūtaṃ vā yad yad evātibhāvyate |
   bhāvanābalaniṣpattau tat sphuṭākalpadhīphalam || 

iti | atrāpi pūrvapraṇidhānāvedhavaśād rūpakāyadvayam | ayam eva ca praveśopāyaḥ | yad uktam—

   maṇḍalacakrādyupāyena svādhiṣṭhānakrameṇa ca | 

iti | madhyamārthatayā cedam evodghuṣyate |

   anucchedāt svasaṃvitter nīlādīnām abhāsanāt |
   nimittānām anutpādān madhyamā pratipan matā || 

iti | atra nimittānutpādo 'bhiniveśābhāvo vivakṣitaḥ | tena sadasadādyabhiniveśābhāvāc catuḥkoṭirahitatvam | caturthatāpy atra "caturthaṃ tatpunas tathā" iti vacanāt | tat prajñājñāne 'nubhūtaṃ nirākāravedanaṃ punar iti nīlādyākāracakramalāpagame tatheti prajñājñānam iva boddhavyam ||

sākāravādinas tu nirākāraṃ jñānaṃ svapne 'pi nānubhūyata iti vadanti | tad āhuḥ—

   nākāracakram avadhūya dhiyo 'sti vṛttis
   tadbādhane balini madhyanaye jayaśrīḥ |
   no ced anindyam idam advayam eva citraṃ
   ceto nirākṛtimatasya tu ko 'vakāśaḥ || 

iti | na caivaṃ mantavyam—ākāraprakāśābhāvād ākāraḥ prāṅ nāstīti | tanniścayābhāve 'py aśakyāpahnavasyānubhūyamānasya pṛṣṭollekhaniścīyamānasya ca nīlādivedanasya bhāvāt | yad āhuḥ—
 
	yad yathā bhāsate jñānaṃ tat tathaivānubhūyate |
	iti nāmaikabhāvaḥ syāc citrākārasya cetasi || 

iti | tataś citrādvaitavedanam eva param asti | atrāpi ca granthavistarabhayāt sādhakabādhakapramāṇacintā na kṛtā | etad eva catuḥkoṭirahitatayā madhyamārthenāpi ghaṭayanti | tathā coktam—

	nāsat prakāśavapuṣā na ca sat tadanyair
		ekena na dvitayam advitayaṃ na tābhyām |
	ittathaṃ jagad yadi catuḥśikharīvimuktaṃ 
		ko bhāṣyakāramatamadhyamayor viśeṣaḥ || 

iti | vyāvṛttikṛtabhedena sambhogābhinno 'pi vimardo dharmaḥ | vipākaḥ sambhogaḥ | vicitraṃ nirmāṇam | vilakṣaṇaḥ svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ | lakṣaṇabhūtaṃ prajñājñānaṃ tathaivābhyasyamānaṃ punaḥśabdavācyaṃ sac caturthaṃ saptāṅgayuktaṃ sādhyaṃ syāt | tatra saptāṅgāni—sambhogaṃ vitteḥ | sampuṭaṃ samāpatteḥ | mahāsukhaṃ sātarūpatayā | niḥsvabhāvaṃ kalpitavirahāt | kāruṇyanirbharaṃ pūrvapraṇidhānāvedhavaśena sambhogādinā sattvārthakaraṇāt | nirantaraṃ madhye 'ntarābhāvāt | nirnirodhaṃ pravāhānucchedāt | tad uktam | 

	sambhogasampuṭamahāsukhaniḥsvabhāva-
		kāruṇyanirbharanirantaranirnirodhaiḥ | 
	aṅgair mameṣṭam iha saptabhir eva yuktaṃ
		sādhyaṃ pramāṇaparibhāvitabuddhiśastam || 

iti | yad vālam anena saptāṅgayoginā sādhanena | aniyama evātra | yato nairātmyāyoginīcakraṃ bhāvyamānaṃ buddhatvahetuḥ | atha cātra saptāṅgayogi sādhanaṃ na bhavati | sampuṭābhāvāt | tad uktam—

	sādhyaṃ saptāṅgasaṃyuktaṃ tad eva yadi sādhanam | 
	nairātmyāyoginīcakraṃ bodhaye kiṃ na sammatam || 

iti | athaivaṃ matir yat tatrāpi khaṭvāṅgopāyasampuṭatvam asti | yad uktam—

	khaṭvāṅgasampuṭā devī sambhogādisamānvitā |
	nairātmyāyoginī hanta bodhaye kiṃ na sādhanam || 

iti | tad apy asundaram | pāramitānaye 'pi vivakṣitasākṣāt sampuṭābhāve 'pi prajñopāyātmakabodhicittasampuṭasambhavena mantranayasyeva saptāṅgayuktasādhyasiddhiprasaṅgāt |

	viśiṣṭaṃ sampuṭaṃ hitvā anyathā yadi kalpyate |
	śūnyatetarasāmpuṭyāt prasaṅgaḥ syān nayāntare || 

athātra sādhane saptāṅgayuktāsty eva | yataḥ—

	stanau hṛtvā bhaved bolaṃ kakkolamadhyasaṃsthitam ||
	tīradvayaṃ bhaved ghaṇṭā kiñjalkaṃ bolakaṃ bhavet | 

iti | tad apy apeśalam | yataḥ siddhyavasthāyām idaṃ sarvaṃ na sādhanāvasthāyām | atas tathāvidhasādhanābhāve 'pi saptāṅgayuktasādhyasiddhiprasaṅgaḥ pāramitānaye 'pi durnivāraḥ |

	prāg asampuṭatā bhāvyā niṣpattau sā bhaviṣyati |
	etat sammatam asmākaṃ sādhanaṃ punar anyathā ||

iti | etad eva cānye māyopamādvaitam iti varṇayanti | yathā svapnānubhūtakāminīratisaṃvedanaṃ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvyaparasvapnasaṃvedanenānubhūyamānaṃ nātyantocchedena mṛṣānubhūteḥ | nāpi saj jāgraddaśopalabdhārthakriyākārisvaparavedyavastuvad avisaṃvādābhāvāt | tadāhuḥ—

	svapnāt svapnaṃ yadaiva syāc ciccitrālīkatā tadā |
	naiva satyam asadvitter na cocchedaḥ prakāśataḥ || 

iti | tathaitad api viśvaṃ nātyantocchedenālīkaṃ vitteḥ | nāpi paramārthasat "sadasator utpādāyogād" ityādinā pratītyasamutpannatvenādhyavasitasya paramārthato 'tyantājātatvenānutpannasya sattvāyogāt | yathoktam—

	yat pratītyasamutpannaṃ notpannaṃ tat svabhāvataḥ | 
	yat svabhāvena notpannam utpannaṃ nāma tat katham || 

atrāpi ca caturthatvadharmakāyādiyuktatvavyavasthā pūrvavad eva boddhavyā ||

root:
kandarpajvarasaṃjvarāturatanorāścaryamasyāściraṃ cetaścandanacandramaḥkamalinīcintāsu saṃtāmyati |
kintu klāntivaśena śītalatanuṃ tvāmekameva priyaṃ dhyāyantī rahasi sthitā kathamapi kṣīṇā kṣaṇaṃ prāṇiti ||
commentary: aho āścaryam | asyā rādhikāyāścetaḥ cittaṃ cirakālaṃ saṃbhrāmyati | samyak bhramati | kāsu | candanacandramaḥkamalinīcintāsu candanaṃ ca candramāśca kamalinī ca tāsāṃ cintā smaraṇaṃ satataṃ, tāsu | kimbhūtāyāḥ | kandarpajvarasaṃjvarākulatanoḥ kandarpasya jvaraḥ tena saṃjvarastāpaḥ tenākulā vyākulā tanuryasyāḥ sā tathā tasyāḥ | yadyevaṃ tahi kathaṃ na mriyata ityāha | kintu klāntivaśena glānivaśena kṣīṇā kathaṃ kathamapi atikaṣṭena prāṇiti jīvati | kiṃ kurvatī rahasi sthitā | ekaṃ tvāmeva prāṇavallabhaṃ dhyāyantī | kimbhūtam | śītalataram atiśayena śītalam |

root:
kandarpajvarasaṃjvarāturatanorāścaryamasyāściraṃ cetaścandanacandramaḥkamalinīcintāsu saṃtāmyati |
kintu klāntivaśena śītalatanuṃ tvāmekameva priyaṃ dhyāyantī rahasi sthitā kathamapi kṣīṇā kṣaṇaṃ prāṇiti ||
commentary: utpaśyāmīti || he sakhe megha, matpriyārthaṃ yathā tathā drutaṃ kṣipram || "laghu kṣipram araṃ drutam" ity amaraḥ || yiyāsor yātum icchor api || yāteḥ sann antād upratyayaḥ || te tava kakubhaiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ surabhau sugandhini || "kakubhaḥ kuje 'rjune" iti śabdārṇave || parvate parvate pratiparvatam || vīpsāyāṃ dviruktiḥ || kālakṣepaṃ kālavilambam || "kṣepo vilambe nindāyām" iti viśvaḥ || utpaśyāmy utprekṣe || vilambahetuṃ darśayan nāśugamanaṃ prārthayate—śukleti || sajalāni sānandabāṣpāṇi nayanāni yeṣāṃ taiḥ śuklāpāṅgair mayūraiḥ || "mayūro barhiṇo barhī śuklāpāṅgaḥ śikhāvalaḥ" iti yādavaḥ || kekāḥ svavāṇīḥ || kekā vāṇī mayūrasya" ity amaraḥ || svāgatīkṛtya svāgatavacanīkṛtya pratyudyātaḥ pratyudgataḥ | mayūravāṇīkṛtātithya ity arthaḥ | bhavān katham api yathākathañcid āśu gantuṃ vyavasyed udyuñjīta || prārthane liṅ | "śeṣe prathamaḥ" iti prathamapuruṣaḥ | śeṣaś cāyaṃ bhavacchabdo yuṣmadasmacchabdavyatirekāt || "svāgatīkṛtya kekāḥ" ity atra kekāsvāropyamāṇasya svāgatavañcanasya prakṛtapratyudgamanopayogāt pariṇāmālaṅkāraḥ | tad uktam alaṅkārasarvasve—"āropyamāṇasya prakṛtopayogitve pariṇāmaḥ" iti ||

root:

svahṛdayamarmaṇi varma karoti sajalanalinīdalajālam ||

root:
nāsti bhāvako na bhāvo 'sti mantraṃ nāsti na devatā |  
tiṣṭhetau mantradevau ca niṣprapañcasvabhāvataḥ || 11 ||
commentary:
satyadvayam adhikṛtyāha—nāsti ityādi. nāsti bhāvako na bhāvo 'stīti bhāvanaṃ bhāvaḥ. bhāvakaḥ kartā. bhāvanā kriyā. dvayam idaṃ bhāvanīyāt pṛthag naiva draṣṭavyam. devatāmantrābhyām anyo nāham. bhāvanāpi tayoḥ prakāśarūpataiva, nānyety eṣa tattvādhimokṣaḥ kartavya ity arthaḥ. tattvaṃ satyaṃ bhūtam iti paryāyāḥ. atas tattvapaṭale satyadvayaṃ vaktavyam.

tatra sarva eṣa vistaraḥ saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramaudāryasādhanam adhikṛtyoktam. paramagāmbhīryasādhanaṃ paramārthasatyam adhikṛtyāha—mantram ityādi. tāv api devatāmantrau paramārthato na staḥ. kutaḥ? yathāpratibhāsam asattvād iti bhāvaḥ.

paramārthatas tarhi, kathaṃ tau sta ity āha—santiṣṭheta ityādi. prapañcair viparyāso bhrāntir ity eko 'rthaḥ. tatra sarvabhrāntīnām agocaratvād dharmadhātur aprapañcaḥ. tanaiva samyagjñānena sabījasaṃkleśakṣayāt pratiṣṭhādehabhoganirbhāsānāṃ ca vijñaptīnāṃ prahāṇād anāsravo dharmadhātur aprapañcaḥ. trayam idaṃ viśuddhākāśanibham anantam aprapañcam dharmakāyam ity arthaḥ. tad eva svabhāvaḥ tena svabhāvena sākṣātkarttavyāv iti bhāvaḥ.

commentary: tathā hi sa eva vairocanaḥ, prakāśamātratayā prakhyānāt. sa eva akṣobhyaḥ, nirābhāsatvāt. sa eva amoghaḥ, viśvārthakaraṇāt. sa eva ratnaḥ, sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhāt. sa eva ārolikaḥ, teṣām ātmani samyak paricchedāt. evaṃ pañcajñānamayatvāt sa eva sāttvikaḥ, vajrasattva ity arthaḥ. brahmetyādi. sa eva brahmādir ucyate.

commentary: katham ity āha—brahmetyādi. yata eva suviśuddhabodharūpatvād asau buddhas tad eva paraṃ brahma. tasmāt sa eva brahmā. nirvṛttita iti mokṣarūpatvād ity arthaḥ. nirvṛtir nirvāṇaṃ mokṣo niḥśreyasaṃ buddha iti paryāyāḥ. viṣaṇād iti tādātmyena praveśāt. kva? paramagambhīre dharmakāye. viśateḥ ktapratyayaḥ ṣatvaṇatve ca. sadā sukalyāṇād iti dhruvakalyāṇatvāt paramakalyāṇatvāc ca. sarvar ityādi. yasmād asau sarveṣām ātmani dharmadhātau vedakatvena sthitaḥ, tasmāt sarvaḥ.

commentary:
uktau dvau devatāyogau samāhitaḥ sandhyāsu, asamāhitaḥ sandhyāntarāleṣu. tattvayogo vaktavyaḥ, yatas tribhir vinā nāsti śīghrataraṃ bodhiḥ. ata āha—tattvetyādi. tattvasya dyotakaḥ paṭalas tattvapaṭalaḥ.

rūpaṃ nīlapītādi. tan nāsti na vidyate. kathaṃ nāsti? svarūpeana—yad asya svarūpaṃ bālaiḥ kalpyate darśanagrāhyaṃ[^1] [ms-a fol. 35r] vastubhūtam, tena nāsti, [ms-c fol. 25r] ekānekasvabhāvavirahāt. kevalaṃ bhrāntā buddhir bālānām asataiva tena tenākāreṇa khyāti svapnādāv iva. rūpābhāve na kaścid rūpaṃ paśyatīti draṣṭā 'pi nāsti. tenāha—na draṣṭā ceti. na draṣṭety arthaḥ. draṣṭā cakṣurdhātur draṣṭā puruṣo dvāv api svarūpeṇa na staḥ. yad anayoḥ svarūpaṃ vastugrāhakaṃ bālair vikalpyate tena na staḥ. evaṃ yāvan na sparśo nāpi spraṣṭā ca. iyatā daśāyatanāni rūpacakṣurādīni. draṣṭādirūpaś ca pudgalo nāstīty uktam.

na cittam iti vijñānalakṣaṇaṃ cittam. vijānātīti vijñānaṃ ṣaḍvijñānakāyāś cakṣurvijñānadhātur yāvan manovijñānadhātuḥ. etāny eva samanantarātītāni manodhātuḥ. saptaite vijñānadhātavo manaāyatanam. yaś ca ṣaḍbhir vijñānair vijñātā pudgalaḥ, so 'pi vijānātīti vijñānam. tataḥ so 'pi cittaśabdenoktaḥ. tad ubhayaṃ [ms-a, begins 35v, begin °sti] nāsti, tayor grāhakalakṣaṇatvāt, grāhyābhāve ca grāhakāyogāt.

kasmād grāhyaṃ nāsti? ekānekasvabhāvavirahāt. siddha eṣa hetuḥ sāvayaveṣu daśasvāyataneṣu niraṃśeṣu ca paramāṇuṣu. paramāṇumātre 'pi sthūlapratibhāsāyogāt.

dharmāyatane tu yāni dravyāṇi teṣu niraṃśeṣu pratibhāsamānarūpasyotpatter asiddho hetuḥ, tasmān na dharmāyatanaṃ nāstīty ata āha—na caittikam iti. cittasya viṣayaś caittikaṃ dharmāyatanam, tad api nāsti. akṣaṇikānām anyatra nirākṛtatvāt, kṣaṇikānām api grāhyatvāyogāt, atītānāgatānām asattvena vartamānānām akāraṇatvenāgrāhyalakṣaṇatvāc ca viṣayasya. yadi tarhi dvayarūpeṇa na santi, dvādaśāyatanāni pudgalaś ca kena rūpeṇa santi? dvayapratibhāsinā bhrāntirūpeṇa dravyataḥ santi, tena pratītyasamutpannatvāt. yat punar eṣāṃ rūpaṃ dvayaśūnyatā vijñaptimātratā prakāśamātratā sarvatra samarasā, tenaite paramārthataḥ santi. tad dhi paramārthaḥ paramasya lokottarajñānasyārtho viṣayaḥ. tatra dvayasaṃgṛhītaṃ rūpaṃ nāstīti parijñeyam, tadastitvābhiniveśasyaiva sarvānarthamūlatvāt. dvayapratibhāsi bhrāntirūpaṃ prahātavyam, bhrāntiprabhedatvāt sarvānarthānām. dvayaśūnyatārūpaṃ punar eṣāṃ pratyakṣīkartavyam, tatpratyakṣasyaiva samyagjñānarūpatvāt, tasya ca sarvabhrāntipratipakṣatvāt, krameṇa mahāsukhamahāmokṣasakalabuddhaguṇavaśitvasādhanatvāc ca. so 'pi mahāmokṣaḥ paramārthaḥ paramaphalatvāt tad api samyagjñānaṃ paramārthaḥ paramo 'rtho 'syeti kṛtvā. iyatā tathatātattvam uktam.

commentary:
atra punar ādaram utpādayituṃ śāstrakāra āha.

añjaliṃ kṛtvā prārthayāmi. kimartham? smṛtiṃ ca saṃprajanyaṃ ca. na kevalāṃ smṛtim, nāpi kevalaṃ saṃprajanyam iti parasparāpekṣayā cakāradvayam. tatra smṛtir āryaratnacūḍasūtre 'bhihitā-

	yayā smṛtyā sarvakleśānāṃ prādurbhāvo na bhavati. yayā smṛtyā sarvamārakarmaṇām avatāraṃ na dadāti. yayā smṛtyā utpathe kumārge vā na patati. yayā smṛtyā dauvārikabhūtayā sarveṣām akuśalānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ na dadāti. iyam ucyate samyaksmṛtir iti.

saṃkṣepataḥ punar iyaṃ smṛtir ucyate—vihitapratiṣiddhayor yathāyogaṃ smaraṇaṃ smṛtiḥ. yac cāha—smṛtir ālambanāsaṃpramoṣa iti.

saṃprajanyaṃ tu prajñāpāramitāyām uktam-

	caraṃś carāmīti prajānāti. sthitaḥ sthito 'smīti prajānāti. niṣaṇṇo niṣaṇṇo 'smīti prajānāti. śayānaḥ śayito 'smīti prajānāti. yathā yathāsya kāyaḥ sthito bhavati tathā tathainaṃ prajānāti. peyālam. so 'tikrāman vā pratikrāman vā saṃprajānacārī bhavati. ālokite vilokite saṃmiñjite prasārite saṃghāṭīpaṭapātracīvaradhāraṇe 'śite pīte khādite nidrāklamaprativinodana āgate gate sthite niṣaṇṇe supte jāgarite bhāṣite tūṣṇībhāve pratisaṃlayane saṃprajānacārī bhavatīti.

idam eva vakṣyati—

	etad eva samāsena saṃprajanyasya lakṣaṇam |
	yat kāyacittāvasthāyāḥ pratyavekṣā muhurmuhuḥ || (Bodhicaryāvatāra 5.108)

iti.

commentary: sphoṭo vikāśaḥ. moṭanaṃ saṅkocaḥ. te ubhe mudre, hevajreṇa kṛtatvād iti mahān saṃkṣepaḥ. tad dhyeyam ityādi. hevajrāhaṃkāriṇo yā kācit cintā tad eva dhyānam ity arthaḥ. yasmād iti dhyai cintāyām iti dhātupāṭhād ity abhiprāyaḥ. ukto mahāmokṣasukhalakṣaṇaḥ paramārtho yaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ, tasya sākṣātkaraṇaṃ bhāvanayā. bhāvanāpariniṣpattir mukhyaṃ dhyānam.

commentary: asahiṣṇv asahanaśīlam. alasaṃ kriyāsu akarmaṇyam, kusīdam ity arthaḥ. bhītaṃ kāyajīvitabhīru bhayahetubhyo vā. pragalbhaṃ dhṛṣṭam. mukharaṃ durvacaskam, yuktāyuktamanapekṣyābhidhāyakaṃ vā. svapakṣeḥ śiṣyāntevāsijñātisālohitādau abhiniviṣṭaṃ pakṣapātātiśayavat.

pitari prāptaṃ yat saukhyaṃ tat sukhaṃ bhujyate svayam |  
maraṇaṃ yena sukhena tat sukhaṃ dhyānam ucyate || 21 ||
commentary:
ato vaktavyaṃ kā tasya bhāvanā, kiṃ vā tasya dhyānam ity ata āha—pitari ityādi. pitā vajradharo guruś ca. pañcamyarthe saptamī. pituḥ sakāśāt prāptam. laukikasukhena dṛṣṭāntena pitrā yad upadiṣṭaṃ mahāmokṣasukham ity arthaḥ. anupadiṣṭānāṃ devamanuṣyādīnāṃ śrutir api tasya durlabhā, kiṃ punar anubhava iti bhāvaḥ.

tat sukhaṃ bhujyate svayam iti tad eva nirābhāsam anantaṃ niruttaram akṣayāvyayaṃ mahāmokṣasukhaṃ bhujyate. svayam iti sākṣād iva. kutaḥ? bhujyamāne laukikasukhe tad eva yathālakṣaṇam adhimucya, tathādhimokṣād ālambanīkṛte tasmin ālambanāntarasaṃcāraprasāraniṣedhena niścalasūkṣmīkṛtasya cetasas tathaiva nirantaram ādareṇa sābhogam anābhogaṃ ca vahanāt. iyatī yat tasya bhāvanā.

dhyānam ākhyātum āha—maraṇam ityādi. tathaiva ciraṃ bhāvyamānena mahāsukhena yena iti yadavastheneha maraṇaṃ bhavati, tad iti tadavasthaṃ tan mahāsukhadhyānam ucyate bhāvanāpariniṣpatteḥ.

iha maraṇam iti ko 'rthaḥ? iheti tato mahāsukhād anyasmin bahir adhyātmaṃ cālambane maraṇam apratisaṃvedanaṃ bhavati. ekadvaubahūn vā praharān divasān māsān varṣān vā daṃśamaśakādikṛtair api capeṭamuṣṭikaśābhighātair api paṭupaṭahaśaṃkhabherīmahāmeghasvanair api tāvantaṃ kālam apratibodhanād iti.

athavā na yuktā sahajā bhāvanā, dṛṣṭāntasahajasya pratyakṣatvena dārṣṭāntikasahajasya cānubhūtatvena dhyeyatvāyogāt. ata āha—pitarītyādi. pitari prāptaṃ dṛṣṭāntasahajaṃ bhujyate svayam iti sākṣādanubhūyate. maraṇaṃ mokṣaḥ. yena sukheneti dārṣṭāntikasahajena. iha tat sukhaṃ dhyānam iti dṛṣṭāntasukhe tādātmyena bhāvyamānaṃ dārṣṭāntikasukhaṃ dhyeyam ucyate. anubhūyamānetarayoḥ sādharmyasukhena ekarasībhāvagamanād iti bhāvaḥ.

commentary: nanu sarvabuddhāḥ pañcajñāninaḥ. tat kathaṃ kulabhedaḥ? gotrabhedāt. ādarśādīnām ekaikasya hi cchāyo gotram anādisiddhaṃ bodhisattvānām. anekasya tu cchāyā sattvagotraṃ ṣaṣṭham. ata evāha—kulāni ṣaḍvidhāny āhur iti. saṃkṣepeṇa tu pañcadhety anekacchāyasyāpy ekacchāyā balīyastvāt. trividham iti traividhyam. kāyavākcittabhedanair iti vacanāt svakāyavākcitteṣu sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittādhimokṣas tattvayoga iti gamyata eva.

root:
kulāni ṣaḍvidhāny āhuḥ saṃkṣepeṇa tu pañcadhā |  
paścāt trividhaṃ yānti kāyavākcittabhedanaiḥ || 9 ||
commentary: punaḥ kiṃbhūte | mādhavikāparimalalalite | mādhavikāyāḥ kusumitavāsantyāḥ parimalo gandhaḥ tena lalitaḥ ramaṇīyaḥ tasmin | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | navamālatijātisugandhau | navā nūtanāśca tā mālatyaśca tāsāṃ jātiḥ prādurbhāvaḥ | janī prādurbhave ityasya jādeśe atipratyayaḥ | tathā śobhano gandho yasmin sa tathā athavā navamālikayā kāraṇabhūtayā puṣpaviśeṣeṇa atisugandhau | navā ca mālikā ceti tayā | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | mohanakāriṇi | mohanaṃ vaicityaṃ kartuṃ śīlamasyeti sa tathā tasmin | keṣāṃ | munimanasāmapi | munayo jitendriyāḥ vanavāsino vikārahīnāḥ nityanaimittikādivratācāravantasteṣāmapi | punaḥ kiṃbhūte | taruṇākāraṇabandhau | taruṇānāṃ yuvajanānāṃ akāraṇena upakāraṃ vinaiva bandhuḥ hitakārī kuṭumbasahāyaḥ kāmoddīpanatvāt |

root:
tāṃ cāvaśyaṃ divasagaṇanātatparām ekapatnīm  
avyāpannām avihatagatir drakṣyasi bhrātṛjyāyām |  
āśābandhaḥ kusumasadṛśaṃ prāyaśo hy aṅganānāṃ  
sadyaḥpāti praṇayi hṛdayaṃ viprayoge ruṇaddhi ||
commentary: na ca tasyā nāśādvrataskhalanādvā nirarthakastvatprayāsa ity āha-tāṃ ceti || he megha, divasānām avaśiṣṭadinānāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ saṅkhyāne tatparām āsaktām || "tatpare pratitāsaktau" ity amaraḥ || ata evāvyāpannām amṛtām | śāpāvasāne madāmanamatyāśayā jīvantīm ity arthaḥ | ekaḥ patir yasyāḥ saikapatnī tām | pativratām ity arthaḥ || "nityaṃ sapatnyādiṣu" iti ṅīp nakāraś ca || bhrātur me jāyāṃ bhrātṛjāyām | mātṛrvan niḥśaṅkadarśanīyām ity āśayaḥ | tāṃ matpriyām avihatagatir avicchinnagatiḥ sann avaśyaṃ drakṣyasi cālokayiṣyasa eva || tathā hi | āśātitṛṣṇā || "āśā digatitṛṣṇayoḥ" iti yādavaḥ || badhyate 'neneti bandho bandhanam | vṛntam iti yāvat | āśaiva bandha āśābandhaḥ kartā || praṇayi premayuktam ata eva kusumasadṛśam sukumāram ity arthaḥ | ata eva viprayoge virahe sadyaḥpāti sadyobhraṃśanaśīlam aṅganānāṃ hṛdayaṃ jīvitam || "hṛdayaṃ jīvite citte vakṣasyākūtayoḥ" iti śabdārṇave || prāyaśaḥ prāyeṇa ruṇaddhi pratibadhnāti || arthāntaranyāsaḥ ||

sadyaḥpāti praṇayi hṛdayaṃ viprayoge ruṇaddhi ||
commentary: pataṃ prabandhaṃ jayadevakaviḥ karoti | kiṃbhūtaṃ prabandham | śrīvāsudevaratikelikathāsametam | śrīḥ lakṣmī rādhārūpiṇī | vasudevasyāpatyaṃ vāsudevaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kaṃsadaityavināśāya ādyaḥ ajanmā mānavāvatāre manujarūpī | ratiśca prītiḥ | keliḥ krīḍā ca anubhūta karma ālaye śrīśca vāsudevaśca tayoḥ ratikelikathāstābhiḥ sametaṃ saṃyuktam | kathaṃbhūto jayadevakaviḥ | padmāvatīcaraṇacāraṇacakravartī | padmāvatī lakṣmīḥ tasyāḥ caraṇau | tayoścāraṇaṃ śuśrūṣārādhanaṃ tatra cakravartī sevakādhirājaḥ | athavā padmāvatī tasya brāhmaṇī tasyāḥ nṛtyakalācakravartī | punaḥ kiṃbhūtaḥ | vāgdevatācaritacitritacitrasadmā | vāk cāsau devatā ceti | tasyāścaritaṃ tena citritaṃ vicitrīkṛtaṃ cittameva sadma gṛhaṃ yasya sa tathā | anena lakṣmī sarasvatyorjayadevo niṣṇātaḥ śṛṅgārī ca sūcitaḥ |

root:
kartuṃ yac ca prabhavati mahīm ucchilīndhrām avandhyaṃ  
tac chrutvā te śravaṇasubhagaṃ garjitaṃ mānasotkāḥ |  
ā kailāsād bisakisalayacchedapātheyavantaḥ  
saṃpatsyante nabhasi bhavato rājahaṃsāḥ sahāyāḥ ||
commentary: saṃprati sahāyasampattiś cāstīty āha-kartum iti || yad garjitaṃ kartṛ mahīm ucchilandhrām udbhūtakandalikām || "kandalyāṃ ca śilīndhrā syāt" iti śabdārṇave || ata evāvandhyāṃ saphalāṃ kartuṃ prabhavati śaknoti | śilīndhrāṇāṃ bhāvisasyasampattisūcakatvād iti bhāvaḥ | tad uktaṃ nimittanidāne—"kālābhrayogād uditāḥ śilīndhrāḥ sampannasasyāṃ kathayanti dhātrīm" iti || tac chravaṇasubhagaṃ śrotrasukham | lokasyeti śeṣaḥ | te tava garjitaṃ śrutvā mānasotkā mānase sarasy unmanasaḥ | utsukā iti yāvat || "utka unmanāḥ iti nipātanāt sādhu || kālāntare mānasasya himaduṣṭatvād dhimasya ca haṃsānāṃ rogahetutvād anyatra gatā haṃsāḥ punarvarṣāsu mānasam eva gacchantīti prasiddhiḥ || bisakisalayānāṃ mṛṇālāgrāṇāṃ chedaiḥ śakalaiḥ | pātheyavantaḥ pathi sādhu pātheyaṃ pathi bhojyam || "pathyatithivasatisvapater ḍhañ" taddantaḥ | mṛṇālāgraśakalasaṃbandhavanta ity arthaḥ | rājahaṃsāḥ haṃsaviśeṣāḥ || "rājahaṃsās tu te cañcucaraṇair lohitaiḥ sitāḥ" ity amaraḥ || nabhasi vyomni bhavatas tava | ākailāsāt kailāsaparyantam || padadvayaṃ caitam | sahāyāḥ sayātrāḥ "sahāyas tu sayātraḥ syāt" iti śabdārṇave || sampatsyante bhaviṣyanti ||

root:
āpṛcchasva priyasakham amuṃ tuṅgam āliṅgya śailam  
vandyaiḥ puṃsāṃ raghupatipadair aṅkitaṃ mekhalāsu |  
kāle kāle bhavati bhavato yasya saṃyogam etya  
snehavyaktiś ciravirahajaṃ muñcato bāṣpam uṣṇam ||
commentary: āpṛcchasveti | priyaṃ sakhāyaṃ priyasakham || "rājāhaḥsakhibhyaṣ ṭac" iti ṭac samāsāntaḥ || tuṅgam unnataṃ puṃsāṃ vandhair narārādhanīyai raghupatipadai rāmapādanyāsair mekhalāsu kaṭakeṣu || "atha mekhalā | śroṇisthāne 'drikaṭake kaṭibandhebhabandhane" iti yādavaḥ || aṅkitaṃ cihnitam | itthaṃ saṅkhitvān mahattvāt pavitratvāc ca sambhāvanārham | amuṃ śailaṃ citrakūṭādrim āliṅganyāpṛcchasva sādho yāmīty āmantraṇena sabhājaya || "āmantraṇasabhājane | āpracchannam" ity amaraḥ || "āṅi nupracchacor upasaṅkhyānam" ity ātmanepadam || sakhitvaṃ nirvāhayati—kāla iti || kāle kāle pratiprāvṛṭkālam | suhṛtsamāgamanakālaś ca kālaśabdenocyate | vīpsāyāṃ dviruktiḥ || bhavataḥ saṃyogaṃ samparkam etya ciravirahajam uṣṇaṃ bāṣpam ūṣmāṇaṃ netrajalaṃ ca || "bāṣpo netrajaloṣmaṇoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || muñcato yasya śalasyaḥ snehavyaktiḥ premāvirbhāvo bhavati | snigdhānāṃ hi ciravirahasaṅgatānāṃ bāṣpapāto bhavatīti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
mārgaṃ tāvac chṛṇu kathayatas tvatprayāṇānurūpam  
sandeśaṃ me tad anu jalada śroṣyasi śrotrapeyam |  
khinnaḥ khinnaḥ śikhariṣu padaṃ nyasya gantāsi yatra  
kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇaḥ parilaghu payaḥ srotasāṃ copabhujya ||
commentary: samprati tasya mārgaṃ kathayati—mārgam iti || he jalada, tāvad idānīṃ kathayataḥ | matta iti śeṣaḥ | tvatprayāṇasyānurūpam anukūlaṃ mārgam adhvānam || "mārgo mṛgapade māsi saumyarthe 'nveṣaṇe 'dhvani" iti yādavaḥ | śṛṇu | tad anu mārgaśravaṇānantaraṃ śrotrābhyāṃ peya pānārham | atitṛṣṇayā śrotavyam ity arthaḥ || peyagrahaṇāt sandeśasyāmṛtasāmyaṃ gamyate || me sandeśaṃ vācikam || "sandeśavāgvācikaṃ syāt" ity amaraḥ || śroṣyasi | yatra mārge khinnaḥ khinno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ kṣīṇabalaḥ san || "nityavīpsayoḥ" iti nityārthe dvirbhāvaḥ || śikhariṣu parvateṣu padaṃ nyasya nikṣipya | punarbalalābhārthaṃ kvacid viśramyety arthaḥ | kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇo 'bhīkṣṇaṃ kṛśāṅgaḥ san | atrāpi kṛdantatvāt pūrvavad dviruktiḥ || srotasāṃ parilaghu gurutvadoṣarahitam | upalāsphālanakheditatvāt pathyam ity arthaḥ | tathā ca vāgbhaṭaḥ—"upalāsphālanakṣepavicchedaiḥ kheditodakāḥ | himavan malayodbhūtāḥ pathyā nadyo bhavanty amūḥ ||" iti || payaḥ pānīyam upabhujya śarīrapoṣaṇārtham abhyavahṛtya ca gantāsi gamiṣyasi || gamer luṭ ||

root:
adreḥ śṛṅgaṃ harati pavanaḥ kiṃ svid ity unmukhībhir
dṛṣṭotsāhaś cakitacakitaṃ mugdhasiddhāṅganābhiḥ |
sthānād asmāt sarasaniculād utpatodaṅmukhaḥ khaṃ
diṅnāgānāṃ pathi pariharan sthūlahastāvalepān ||
commentary: adrer iti || pavano vāyur adreś citrakūṭasya śṛṅgaṃ harati kiṃsvit || kiṃsvicchabdo vikalpavitarkārthādiṣu paṭhitaḥ || iti śaṅkayonmukhībhir unnatamukhībhiḥ || "svāṅgāc copasarjanād asaṃyogopadhāt" iti ṅīṣ | mugdhābhir mūḍhābhiḥ "mugdhaḥ sundaramūḍhayoḥ" ity amaraḥ | siddhānāṃ devayoniviśeṣāṇām aṅganābhiś cakitacakitaṃ cakitaprakāraṃ yathā tathā || "prakāre guṇavacanasya" iti dvirbhāvaḥ | dṛṣṭotsāho dṛṣṭodyogaḥ san sarasā ārdrā niculāḥ sthalavetaso yasmiṃs tasmāt || "vānīre kavibhede syān niculaḥ sthalavetase" iti śabdārṇave || asmāt sthānād āśramāt pathi nabhomārge diṅgāgānāṃ diggajānāṃ sthūlā ye hastāḥ karās teṣām avalepānākṣepān pariharan | "hasto nakṣatrabhede syāt karebhakarayor api" iti | "avalepas tu garve syāt kṣepaṇe dūṣaṇe 'pi ca" iti ca viśvaḥ || udaṅmukhaḥ san | alakāyā udīcyatvād ity āśayaḥ || kham ākāśam utpatodgaccha || atredam apy arthāntaraṃ dhvanayati-rasiko niculo nāma mahākaviḥ kālidāsasya sahādhyāyī parāpāditānāṃ kālidāsamabandhadūṣaṇānāṃ parihartā yasmin sthāne tasmāt sthānād udaṅmukho nirdoṣatvād unnatamukhaḥ san pathi sārasvatamārge diṅnāgānām || pūjāyāṃ bahuvacanam || diṅnāgācāryasya kālidāsapratipakṣasya hastāvalepān hastavinyāsapūrvakāṇi dūṣaṇāni pariharan || "avalepas tu garve syāl lepane duṣaṇe 'pi ca" iti viśvaḥ || adrer adrikalpasya diṅnāgācāryasya śṛṅgaṃ prādhānyam || "śṛṅgaṃ prādhānyasānvoś ca" ity amaraḥ || harati kiṃsvid iti hetunā siddhaiḥ sārasvatasiddhair mahākavibhir aṅganābhiś ca dṛṣṭotsāhaḥ san kham utpatoccair bhaveti svaprabandham ātmānaṃ vā prati kaver uktir iti || "saṃsargato doṣaguṇā bhavantīty etan mṛṣā yena jalāśaye 'pi | sthitvānukūlaṃ niculaś calantam ātmānam ārakṣati sindhuvegāt || "ity etac chlokanirmāṇāt tasya kavir niculasaṃjñety āhuḥ ||

commentary: OṂ kṛṣṇetyādi | OṂkāro maṅgalārthaḥ | kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇaviśeṣataḥ | acalo ’calasaṃjñakaḥ | tasya saṃbodhanaṃ | puṣpam ity upalakṣaṇaṃ | dīpādikam api yathā prāpya | pratīccheti gṛhāṇa | HŪṂkāro dīpamānavastvāśaktīkaraṇārthaḥ | PHAṬkāraḥ tadvastvagrahaṇe nigrahārthaḥ | evaṃ sarvataḥ devānāṃ HŪṂkāro dīrghaḥ | devīnāṃ tu hrasvaḥ | dveṣavajraḥ kṛṣṇācalaḥ | tasyeyaṃ prajñā iti sānvayanāmnā sambodhayati | evaṃ mohavajraḥ śvetācalaḥ | piśunavajraḥ pītācalaḥ | rāgavajro raktācalaḥ | īrṣyāvajraḥ śyāmācalaḥ ||

ratnacchāyāvyatikara iva prekṣyam etat purastād   
valmīkāgrāt prabhavati dhanuṣkhaṇḍam ākhaṇḍalasya |  
yena śyāmaṃ vapur atitarāṃ kāntim āpatsyate te  
barheṇeva sphuritarucinā gopaveśasya viṣṇoḥ ||
commentary: ratneti || ratnacchāyānāṃ padmarāgādimaṇiprabhāṇāṃ vyatikaro miśraṇam iva prekṣyaṃ darśanīyam ākhaṇḍalasyendrasyaitad dhanuḥkhaṇḍam || etad iti hastena nirdeśo vivakṣitaḥ | purastād agre valmīkāgrād vāmalūravivarāt || "vāmalūraś ca nākuś ca valmīkaṃ puṃnapuṃsakam" ity amaraḥ || prabhavaty āvirbhavati | yena dhanuḥkhaṇḍena te tava śyāmaṃ vapuḥ | sphuritarucinojvalakāntinā barheṇa picchena || "picchabarhe napuṃsake" ity amaraḥ || gopaveṣasya viṣṇor gopālasya kṛṣṇasya śyāmaṃ vapur iva | atitarāṃ kāntiṃ śobhām āpatsyate prāpsyate ||

root:
ratnacchāyāvyatikara iva prekṣyam etat purastād   
valmīkāgrāt prabhavati dhanuṣkhaṇḍam ākhaṇḍalasya |  
yena śyāmaṃ vapur atitarāṃ kāntim āpatsyate te  
barheṇeva sphuritarucinā gopaveśasya viṣṇoḥ ||
commentary: "āśīrnamaskriyā vastunirdeśo vāpi tanmukham" iti śāstrāt kāvyādau vastunirdeśāt kathāṃ prastauti—kaścid iti || svādhikārāt svaniyogāt pramatto 'navahitaḥ || "pramādo 'navadhānatā" ity amaraḥ | "jugupsāvirāmapramādārthānām upasaṅkhyānam" ity apādānatvam | tasmāt pañcamī || ata evāparādhād dhetoḥ | kāntāviraheṇa guruṇā durbhareṇa | dustareṇety arthaḥ || "gurus tu gīṣpatau śreṣṭhe gurau pitari durbhara" iti śabdārṇave || varṣabhogyeṇa saṃvatsarabhogyeṇa || "kālādhvanoratyantasaṃyoge" iti dvitīyā | "atyantasaṃyoge ca" iti samāsaḥ | "kumati ca" iti ṇatvam | bhartuḥ svāminaḥ śāpena | astaṅgamito mahimā sāmarthyaṃ yasya so 'staṅgamitamahimā || astam iti makārāntam avyayam | tasya "dvitīyā-" iti yogavibhāgāt samāsaḥ | kaścid anirdiṣṭanāmā yakṣo devayoniviśeṣaḥ || "vidyādharāpsaroyakṣarakṣogandharvakinnarāḥ | piśāco guhyakaḥ siddho bhūto 'mī devayonayaḥ" ity amaraḥ || janakatanayāyāḥ sītāyāḥ snānaravagāhanaiḥ puṇyāni pavitrāṇy udakāni yeṣu teṣu | pāvaneṣv ity arthaḥ || chāyāpradhānās taravac chāyātaravaḥ || śākapārthivāditvāt samāsaḥ || snigdhāḥ sāndrāś chāyātaravo nameruvṛkṣā yeṣu teṣu | vasatiyogyeṣv ity arthaḥ || "snigdhaṃ tu masṛṇe sāndre" iti, "chāyāvṛkṣo nameruḥ syāt" iti ca śabdārṇave || rāmagireś citrakūṭasyāśrameṣu vasatim || "vahivasyartibhyaś ca" ity auṇādiko 'tipratyayaḥ || cakre kṛtavān || atra raso vipralambhākhyaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ | tatrāpy unmādāvasthā | ata evaikatrānavasthānaṃ sūcitam āśrameṣv iti bahuvacanena || sītāṃ prati rāmasya hanumatsandeśaṃ manasi nidhāya meghasandeśaṃ kaviḥ kṛtavān ity āhuḥ || atra kāvye sarvatra mandākrāntāvṛttam | tad uktam-"mandrākrāntā jaladhiṣaḍagairmbhau natau tādgurū cet" iti ||

prītisnigdhair janapadavadhūlocanaiḥ pīyamānaḥ |  
sadyaḥsīrotkaṣaṇasurabhi kṣetram āruhya mālaṃ  
kiṃcit paścād vaja laghugatir bhūya evottareṇa ||
commentary: tvayīti || kṛṣer halakarmaṇaḥ phalaṃ sasyaṃ tvayi || adhikaraṇavivakṣāyāṃ saptamī || āyattam adhīnam || "adhīno vighna āyattaḥ" ity amaraḥ || iti hetoḥ prītyā snigdhaiḥ | akṛtrimapremārdrair ity arthaḥ | bhrūvikārāṇāṃ bhrūvilāsānām anabhijñaiḥ | pāmaratvād iti śeṣaḥ | janapadavadhūnāṃ pallīyoṣitāṃ locanaiḥ pīyamānaḥ sādaraṃ vīkṣyamāṇaḥ san | mālaṃ mālākhyaṃ kṣetraṃ śailaprāyam unnatasthalam || "mālam unnatabhūtalam" ity utpalamālāyām || sadyas tatkālam eva sīrair halair utkaṣaṇena karṣaṇena surabhi ghrāṇatarpaṇaṃ yathā tathā āruhya || tatrābhivruṣyety arthaḥ || "surabhir ghāṇatarpaṇaḥ" ity amaraḥ || kiñcit paścāl laghugatis tatra nivṛṣṭatvāt kṣipragamanaḥ san "laghu kṣiprataraṃ drutam" ity amaraḥ || bhūyaḥ punar apy uttareṇaivottaramārgeṇaiva vraja gaccha || tṛtīyāvidhāne "prakṛtyādibhya upasaṃkhyānam" iti tṛtīyā || yathā kaścid bahuvallabhaḥ patiḥ kutracit kṣetre kalatre gūḍhaṃ vihṛtya || "kṣetraṃ śarīre kedāre siddhasthānakalatrayoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || dākṣiṇyabhaṅgabhayān nīcamārgeṇa nirgatya punaḥ sarvādhyakṣa iva sañcarati tad vaditi dhvaniḥ ||

root:
tvayy āyattaṃ kṛṣiphalam iti bhrūvikārānabhijñaiḥ  
prītisnigdhair janapadavadhūlocanaiḥ pīyamānaḥ |  
sadyaḥsīrotkaṣaṇasurabhi kṣetram āruhya mālaṃ  
kiṃcit paścād vaja laghugatir bhūya evottareṇa ||
commentary:
śikśāsamuccaye 'pi bodhisattvānāṃ karaṇīyam upadiṣṭam iti tad api nirūpaṇīyam ity āha.

śikśāsamuccayo 'pi svayam ebhir eva kṛtaḥ. avaśyaṃ niyamena. draṣṭavyaḥ punaḥpunar asakṛt, abhyasanīya iti bhāvaḥ. kutaḥ? yasmāt satāṃ bodhisattvānām ācaraṇam ācāra itikartavyatā. tatra śikṣāsamuccaye vistareṇa prabandhena pradarśitaḥ vispaṣṭīkṛtya prakāśitaḥ.

root:
tvām āsārapraśamitavanopaplavaṃ sādhu mūrdhnā  
vakṣyaty adhvaśramaparigataṃ sānumān āmrakūṭaḥ |  
na kṣudro 'pi prathamasukṛtāpekṣayā saṃśrayāya  
prāpte mitre bhavati vimukhaḥ kiṃ punar yas tathoccaiḥ ||
commentary: tvām iti || āmrāś cūtāḥ kūṭeṣu śikhareṣu yasya sa āmrakūṭo nāma sānumān parvataḥ || "āmraś cūto rasālo 'sau" iti | "kūṭo 'strī śikharaṃ śṛṅgam" iti cāmaraḥ || āsāro dhārāvṛṣṭiḥ || "dhārāsaṃpāta āsāraḥ" ity amaraḥ || tena praśamito vanopaplavo dāvāgnir yena tam | kṛtopakāram ity arthaḥ | adhvaśrameṇa parigataṃ vyāptaṃ tvāṃ sādhu samyak mūrdhnā vakṣyati voḍhā || baher ḷṛṭ || tathā hi kṣudraḥ kṛpaṇo 'pi || "kṣudro daridre kṛpaṇe nṛśaṃse" iti yādavaḥ || saṃśrayāya saṃśrayaṇāya mitre suhṛdi || "athaḥ mitraṃ sakhā suhṛt" ity amaraḥ || prāpta āgate sati | prathamasukṛtāpekṣayā pūrvopakāraparyālocanayā vimukho na bhavati | yas tathā tena prakāregoccair unnataḥ sa āmrakūṭaḥ kiṃ punarvimukho na bhavatīti kimu vaktavyam ity arthaḥ || etena prathamāvasathe saukhyalābhāt te kāryasiddhir astīti sūcitam | tad uktaṃ nimittanidāne—"prathamāvasathe yasya saukhyaṃ tasyākhile 'dhvani | śivaṃ bhavati yātrāyām anyathā tv aśubhaṃ dhruvam" || iti ||

commentary:
tad eva dauṣprajñavikṣepāsamyakpraṇidhivipakṣābhibhūtirahitatvenāha mahādhyānetyādi |

tatrāsyāṃ gāthāyāṃ dhyānaprajñayor vyatyayo draṣṭavyaḥ | tataś cāyam arthaḥ | mahāprajñāśarīradhṛg iti vajradhūpā | mahati prajñā mahāprajñā saiva śarīraṃ tad dhārayatīti mahāprajñāśarīradhṛk || mahādhyānasamādhistha iti vajrapuṣpā | samādhiś cittasyaikāgratālakṣaṇas tasmiṃs tiṣṭhatīti samādhisthaḥ | mahac ca tad dhyānaṃ ca mahādhyānaṃ mahattvaṃ caturdhyānātmakatvāt | teṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣu samādhisthaḥ || praṇidhir iti vajradīpā | praṇidhīyata iti praṇidhiḥ | bodhisattvānāṃ praṇidhānavaśād utpatteḥ || mahopāya iti vajragandhā | mahāṃś cāsāv upāyaś ca mahopāyaḥ | tata evopāyabalenāśeṣānavaśeṣasya sattvadhātor yathāśayābhiprāyaparipūraṇāt || 

ata eva prajñādhyānapraṇidhyupāyapāramitālakṣaṇatayā bāhyapūjācatuṣṭayātmakam iti ||

sāmbhogikamārgaprītihetubhāvena balajñānayor dharmadhātvavatārasvabhāvatvāt tayor eva balajñānayoḥ pravibhāgaḥ | tatra balaṃ śraddhādipañca | jñānaṃ darśanamārge bhāvanāmārge ca | tatra darśanamārge bodhyaṅgeṣu | bhāvanāmārga āryāṣtāṅgeṣu || 

tataś ca śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhirūpatayā dvārapālacatuṣṭayātmakaṃ mahāyānābhisampratyayapravṛttitannairantaryasantuṣṭikāraṇatvāt ||

root:
channopāntaḥ pariṇataphaladyotibhiḥ kānanāmrais  
tvayy ārūḍhe śikharam acalaḥ snigdhaveṇīsavarṇe |  
nūnaṃ yāsyaty amaramithunaprekṣaṇīyām avasthāṃ  
madhye śyāmaḥ stana iva bhuvaḥ śeṣavistārapāṇḍuḥ ||
commentary: channeti || he megha, pariṇataiḥ paripakvaiḥ phalair dyotanta iti tathoktaiḥ | āṣāḍhe vanacūtāḥ phalanti pacyanteḥ ca meghavātenety āśayaḥ | kānanāmrair vanacūtaiś channopānta āvṛtapārśve 'cala āmrakūṭādriḥ snigdhaveṇīsavarṇe masṛṇakeśabandhacchāye | śyāmavarṇaṃ ity arthaḥ || "veṇī tu keśabandhe jalasrutau" iti yādavaḥ | tvayi śikharaṃ śṛṅgam ārūḍhe sati || "yasya ca bhāvena bhāvalakṣaṇam" iti saptamī || madhye śyāmaḥ śeṣe madhyād anyatra vistāre paritaḥ pāṇḍur hariṇaḥ || "hariṇaḥ pāṇḍuraḥ pāṇḍuḥ" ity amaraḥ || bhuvaḥ stana iva | amaramithunānām | khecarāṇām iti bhāvaḥ | prekṣaṇīyāṃ darśanīyām avasthāṃ nūnaṃ yāsyati | mithunagrahaṇaṃ kāminām eva stanatvenotprekṣā sambhavatīti kṛtam | yathā pariśrāntaḥ kaścit kāmī kāminīnāṃ kucakalaśe viśrāntaḥ sansvapiti tadvad bhavān api bhuvo nāyikāyāḥ stana iti dhvaniḥ ||

root:
channopāntaḥ pariṇataphaladyotibhiḥ kānanāmrais  
tvayy ārūḍhe śikharam acalaḥ snigdhaveṇīsavarṇe |  
nūnaṃ yāsyaty amaramithunaprekṣaṇīyām avasthāṃ  
madhye śyāmaḥ stana iva bhuvaḥ śeṣavistārapāṇḍuḥ ||
commentary:
parāgamasāmyam uktvā svāgamavirodham āha—kiṃ cetyādi | iha hi madhyamakādivicārito 'rtho mantranaye phalena devatāyogena khyāpyate | tataś ca yad yena mudryate tat tatsvabhāvaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā grāhyasya rūpādiskandhacatuṣṭayasvabhāvasya grāhyatvahānaye vairocanādayaś catvāro grāhakāḥ paratantrarūpāḥ kathyante | teṣāṃ ca mudrārthaṃ pariniṣpannarūpo grāhyagrāhakaśūnyo 'kṣobhyaś ced ucyate tad āgamoktā vajrasattvamudrā virudhyate | ratnagarbhādisthabodhicitte pariniṣpannarūpākṣobhyasadbhāvāt | vajrasattvamudrāṃ ca vinā na bauddhakṛtānto bhavatīti kathaṃ bāhyasiddhāntena na sāmyam | tathā ca kambalāmbarapādāḥ—

	sarvaḥ samānaḥ pravibhajyamānaḥ 
		sukṣmekṣikākṣāmadhiyā kṛtāntaḥ |
	bauddhasya bāhyasya vibhāgakartrī
		na syād ihaikā yadi śūnyatoktiḥ ||

	mā bhūt saṃvitpratiṣṭhānam ata eva munir bhayāt |
	bhinatti deśanādharmam uktvoktvā śūnyatātmanā ||

iti pravacanam api | 

	samastavedasiddhānāṃ kṛtānām īśvarādibhiḥ |
	bauddhānāṃ tantramantrāṇāṃ viśeṣaḥ śunyatāṃ prati ||

iti | paraparikalpitaśūnyatoktibhyas tathāgataśūnyatoktīnām abhisandhikṛto viśeṣaḥ sphuṭa iti na pratanyate ||

root:
sthitvā tasmin vanacaravadhūbhuktakuñje muhūrtam  
toyotsargadrutataragatis tatparaṃ vartma tīrṇaḥ |  
revāṃ drakṣyasy upalaviṣame vindhyapāde viśīrṇāṃ  
bhakticchedair iva viracitāṃ bhūtim aṅge gajasya ||
commentary: sthitveti || he megha, vane caranti te vanacarāḥ || tatpuruṣe kṛti bahulam" iti bahulagrahaṇād lug bhavati || teṣāṃ vadhūbhir muktāḥ kuñjā latāgṛhā yatra tasmin || nikuñjakuñjau vā klībe latādipihitodare ity amaraḥ || tatra te nayanavinodo 'stīty arthaḥ | tasmin āmrakūṭe muhūrtam alpakālam | na tu ciraṃ svakāryavirodhād iti bhāvaḥ || "muhūrtam alpakāle syād ghaṭikādvitaye 'pi ca" iti śabdārṇave || sthitvā viśramya | toyotsargeṇa "tvām āsāra-" ity uktavarṣeṇena drutataragatir lāghavād dhetor atikṣipragamanaḥ san | tasmād āmrakūṭāt param anantaraṃ tatparaṃ vartma mārgaṃ tīrṇo 'tikrāntaḥ | upalaiḥ pāṣāṇair viṣame vindhyasyādreḥ pāde prasyantaparvate || "pādāḥ pratyantaparvatāḥ" ity amaraḥ || viśīrṇāṃ samantato visṛmarām || etena kasyāścit kāmukyā priyatamacaraṇapāto 'pi dhvanyate || revāṃ narmadām || "revā tu narmadā somodbhavā mekhalakanyakā" ity amaraḥ || gajasyāṅge śarīre bhaktayo racanāḥ | revā iti yāvat || "bhaktir niṣevaṇe bhāge racanāyām" iti śabdārṇave || tāsāṃ chedair bhaṅgibhir bhābhir viracitāṃ bhūtiṃ śṛṅgāram iva bhasitam iva vā || "bhūtir mātaṅgaśṛṅgāre jātau bhasmani saṃpadi" iti viśvaḥ || drakṣyasi | ayam api mahāṃs te nayana kautukalābha iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:

toyotsargadrutataragatis tatparaṃ vartma tīrṇaḥ |  
revāṃ drakṣyasy upalaviṣame vindhyapāde viśīrṇāṃ  
bhakticchedair iva viracitāṃ bhūtim aṅge gajasya ||
commentary: suniścitaṃ saṃdehaviparyāsarahitam. suprasannaṃ sadā prītisaumanasyabahulam. dhīram acañcalam. ādaraḥ kathita eva. gauravaṃ ārādhyeṣu cittasya namratā. tābhyāṃ saha vartate. salajjaṃ pūrvavat. sabhayaṃ skhalitam ālokya bhītam. śāntaṃ saṃyatendriyam, sattvārādhanayatnavat.

root:
kaścit kāntāvirahaguruṇā svādhikārāt pramattaḥ  
śāpenāstaṅgamitamahimā varṣabhogyeṇa bhartuḥ |  
yakṣaś cakre janakatanayāsnānapuṇyodakeṣu  
snigdhacchāyātaruṣu vasatiṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣu ||
commentary: "āśīrnamaskriyā vastunirdeśo vāpi tanmukham" iti śāstrāt kāvyādau vastunirdeśāt kathāṃ prastauti—kaścid iti || svādhikārāt svaniyogāt pramatto 'navahitaḥ || "pramādo 'navadhānatā" ity amaraḥ | "jugupsāvirāmapramādārthānām upasaṅkhyānam" ity apādānatvam | tasmāt pañcamī || ata evāparādhād dhetoḥ | kāntāviraheṇa guruṇā durbhareṇa | dustareṇety arthaḥ || "gurus tu gīṣpatau śreṣṭhe gurau pitari durbhara" iti śabdārṇave || varṣabhogyeṇa saṃvatsarabhogyeṇa || "kālādhvanoratyantasaṃyoge" iti dvitīyā | "atyantasaṃyoge ca" iti samāsaḥ | "kumati ca" iti ṇatvam | bhartuḥ svāminaḥ śāpena | astaṅgamito mahimā sāmarthyaṃ yasya so 'staṅgamitamahimā || astam iti makārāntam avyayam | tasya "dvitīyā-" iti yogavibhāgāt samāsaḥ | kaścid anirdiṣṭanāmā yakṣo devayoniviśeṣaḥ || "vidyādharāpsaroyakṣarakṣogandharvakinnarāḥ | piśāco guhyakaḥ siddho bhūto 'mī devayonayaḥ" ity amaraḥ || janakatanayāyāḥ sītāyāḥ snānaravagāhanaiḥ puṇyāni pavitrāṇy udakāni yeṣu teṣu | pāvaneṣv ity arthaḥ || chāyāpradhānās taravac chāyātaravaḥ || śākapārthivāditvāt samāsaḥ || snigdhāḥ sāndrāś chāyātaravo nameruvṛkṣā yeṣu teṣu | vasatiyogyeṣv ity arthaḥ || "snigdhaṃ tu masṛṇe sāndre" iti, "chāyāvṛkṣo nameruḥ syāt" iti ca śabdārṇave || rāmagireś citrakūṭasyāśrameṣu vasatim || "vahivasyartibhyaś ca" ity auṇādiko 'tipratyayaḥ || cakre kṛtavān || atra raso vipralambhākhyaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ | tatrāpy unmādāvasthā | ata evaikatrānavasthānaṃ sūcitam āśrameṣv iti bahuvacanena || sītāṃ prati rāmasya hanumatsandeśaṃ manasi nidhāya meghasandeśaṃ kaviḥ kṛtavān ity āhuḥ || atra kāvye sarvatra mandākrāntāvṛttam | tad uktam-"mandrākrāntā jaladhiṣaḍagairmbhau natau tādgurū cet" iti ||

root:

yakṣaś cakre janakatanayāsnānapuṇyodakeṣu  
snigdhacchāyātaruṣu vasatiṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣu ||
commentary:
tad eva prajñāpariśuddhimātrāpekṣayā yathoktaśūnyatāprabhedamukhena maitreyādiṣoḍaśasamādhyātmakam ity ata āha ||

tatra mahāmaitrīmayo 'meya iti maitreyaḥ | mitram asyāstīti maitraṃ | paścān ṅibantaṃ | tataḥ sarvasattveṣu maitrīmayo maitrīsvabhāvaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau maitrīmayaś ca mahāmaitrīmayaḥ | ata evāmeyaḥ sakalasattvadhātāv ekaputraprematvāt || mahākāruṇiko 'gradhīr iti mañjuśrīḥ | mahākaruṇā anālambanātmikā | sā yasyāsti sa mahākāruṇikaḥ | agradhīr iti suviśuddhadharmadhātujñānam | tataś caitad uktaṃ bhavati | audāryagāmbhīryātmako 'sau bhagavān iti || mahāprājño mahādhīmān iti gandhahastī | mahatī prajñā dharmapravicayalakṣaṇātmikā sā yasyāsti sa prājñaḥ | mahāṃś cāsau prājñaś ca mahāprājñaḥ | ata eva mahādhīmān || mahopāyo mahākṛtīti jñānaketuḥ | mahān upāyo yasyāsau mahopāyaḥ | tataś ca mahākṛtī mahāpaṇḍitaḥ sarvasattvāśayānuśayajñatayā saddharmaprakāśakatvāt ||

root:
tasyās tiktair vanagajamadair vāsitaṃ vāntavṛṣṭir
jambūkuñjapratihatarayaṃ toyam ādāya gaccheḥ |
antaḥsāraṃ ghana tulayituṃ nānilaḥ śakṣyati tvāṃ
riktaḥ sarvo bhavati hi laghuḥ pūrṇatā gauravāya ||
commentary: tasyā iti || he megha vāntavṛṣṭir udgīrṇavarṣaḥ san | kṛtavamanaś ca vyajyate | tiktaiḥ sugandhibhis tiktarasavadbhiś ca || "tikto rase sugandhau ca" iti viśvaḥ || vanagajamadair vāsitaṃ surabhitaṃ bhāvitaṃ ca | himavad vindhyamalayā gajānāṃ prabhavā iti vindhyasya gajaprabhavatvād iti bhāvaḥ | jambūkuñjaiḥ pratihatarayaṃ pratibaddhavegam | sukhapeyam ity arthaḥ | anena laghutvaṃ kaṣāyabhāvanā ca vyajyate | tasyā revāyās toyam ādāya gaccher vraja | he ghana megha, antaḥ sāro balaṃ yasya taṃ tvām anila ākāśavāyuḥ | śarīrasthaś ca gamyate | tulayituṃ na śakṣyati śakto na bhaviṣyati | tathā hi rikto 'ntaḥsāraśūnyaḥ sarvo 'pi laghur bhavati | prakampyo bhavatīty arthaḥ | pūrṇatā sāravattā gauravāyāprakampyatvāya bhavatīty arthaḥ | ayam atra dhvaniḥ—ādau vamanaśodhitasya puṃsaḥ paścāc chleṣmaśoṣaṇāya laghutiktakaṣāyāmbupānāl labdhabalasya vātaprakampo na syād iti | tathāha vāgbhaṭaḥ—"kaṣāyāś cāhimās tasya viśuddhau śleṣmaṇo hitāḥ | kimu tiktakaṣāyā vā ye nisargāt kaphāpahāḥ || kṛtaśuddheḥ kramāt pītapeyādeḥ pathyabhojinaḥ | vātādibhir na bādhā syād indriyair iva yoginaḥ ||" iti ||

root:

jambūkuñjapratihatarayaṃ toyam ādāya gaccheḥ |
antaḥsāraṃ ghana tulayituṃ nānilaḥ śakṣyati tvāṃ
riktaḥ sarvo bhavati hi laghuḥ pūrṇatā gauravāya ||
commentary: na ca tasyā nāśādvrataskhalanādvā nirarthakastvatprayāsa ity āha-tāṃ ceti || he megha, divasānām avaśiṣṭadinānāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ saṅkhyāne tatparām āsaktām || "tatpare pratitāsaktau" ity amaraḥ || ata evāvyāpannām amṛtām | śāpāvasāne madāmanamatyāśayā jīvantīm ity arthaḥ | ekaḥ patir yasyāḥ saikapatnī tām | pativratām ity arthaḥ || "nityaṃ sapatnyādiṣu" iti ṅīp nakāraś ca || bhrātur me jāyāṃ bhrātṛjāyām | mātṛrvan niḥśaṅkadarśanīyām ity āśayaḥ | tāṃ matpriyām avihatagatir avicchinnagatiḥ sann avaśyaṃ drakṣyasi cālokayiṣyasa eva || tathā hi | āśātitṛṣṇā || "āśā digatitṛṣṇayoḥ" iti yādavaḥ || badhyate 'neneti bandho bandhanam | vṛntam iti yāvat | āśaiva bandha āśābandhaḥ kartā || praṇayi premayuktam ata eva kusumasadṛśam sukumāram ity arthaḥ | ata eva viprayoge virahe sadyaḥpāti sadyobhraṃśanaśīlam aṅganānāṃ hṛdayaṃ jīvitam || "hṛdayaṃ jīvite citte vakṣasyākūtayoḥ" iti śabdārṇave || prāyaśaḥ prāyeṇa ruṇaddhi pratibadhnāti || arthāntaranyāsaḥ ||

root:
nīpaṃ dṛṣṭvā haritakapiśaṃ kesarair ardharūḍhair  
āvirbhūtaprathamamukulāḥ kandalīś cānukaccham |  
jagdhāraṇyeṣv adhikasurabhiṃ gandham āghrāya corvyāḥ  
sāraṅgās te jalalavamucaḥ sūcayiṣyanti mārgam ||
commentary: nīpam iti || sāraṅgā mataṅgajāḥ kuraṅgā bhṛṅgā vā || "sāraṅgaś cātake bhṛṅge kuraṅge ca mataṅgaje" iti viśvaḥ || ardharūḍhair ekadeśodgataiḥ kesaraiḥ kiñjalkair haritaṃ pālāśavarṇa kapiśaṃ kṛṣṇapītaṃ ca || "pālāśo harito harit" iti | "śyāvaḥ syāt kapiśo dhūmradhūmalau kṛṣṇalohite" iti cāmaraḥ || śyāmavarṇam iti yāvat || "varṇo varṇena" iti samāsaḥ || nīpaṃ sthalakadambakusumam || "atha sthakadambake | nīpaḥ syāt pulake" iti śabdārṇave || dṛṣṭvā saṃprekṣya | viditveti yāvat | tathā kacchev anukaccham ||  || "avyayaṃ vibhakti-" ityādinā vibhaktyarthe 'vyayībhāvaḥ || "jalapāyam anūpaṃ syāt puṃsi kacchas tathāvidhaḥ" ity amaraḥ || āvirbhūtāḥ prathamāḥ prathamotpannā mukulā yāsāṃ tāḥ kandalīr bhūmikadalīḥ || "droṇaparṇī snigdhakandā kandalī bhūkadaly api iti śabdārṇave || jagdhvā bhakṣayitvā || "ado jagdhiḥ-" iti jagdhyādeśaḥ || araṇyeṣv adhikasurabhim atighrāṇatarpaṇaṃ "dagdhāraṇyeṣu" iti pāṭhe "dagdham" ity adhikaviśeṣaṇam || arthavaśāt kandalīś ca dṛṣṭvaivety anvayo draṣṭavyaḥ || urvyā bhūmer gandham āghrāya jalalavamuco meghasya te tava mārgaṃ sūcayiṣyanty anumāpayiṣyanti | yatra yatra vṛṣṭikāryaṃ kandalīmukulanīpakusumādikaṃ dṛśyate tatra tatraḥ tvayā vṛṣṭam ity anumīyata iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:

āvirbhūtaprathamamukulāḥ kandalīś cānukaccham |

sāraṅgās te jalalavamucaḥ sūcayiṣyanti mārgam ||
commentary:
tad eva sopaskāram āha—yāvān ityādi | yatas tatra madhyamārthe yāvān samāropo 'dhyavasāyaḥ sa sarvo nāsti | evaṃvidhaḥ samāropābhāvo vijñānanaye apīṣṭaḥ | ata āha—sarvatheti | tatra hi vijñānasya vastusattvasamāropāspadatvam asti | ato na tatra sarvathā samāropābhāvaḥ |

etena māyopamasiddhānto 'pi pratyuktaḥ | kutaḥ | āstāṃ tāvad atra sarvavikalpo 'dhyavasāyānām apohaviṣayatayā nirāropatvaṃ ca vijñānavāde 'pi nirāropasambhavāt | tato madhyamārtho nirāropo niṣprapañcaḥ | param ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ | vijñānavāde nirvikalpatve 'pi gāḍhataravijñānasadbhāvāvidyāvaśād āhatyollekhābhāve 'pi cetasi tadaiva svasaṃvidgrahāt pṛṣṭhe vedanagrahaḥ sphuṭa eva | 

nanu tavāpy etat samam | pṛṣṭhe sarvavikalpabhāvāt | na | apratiṣṭhānatvenānāstheyasattvānurodhāt saṃvṛtyā vyavahārāt | atas tatrāpohavidhī vidhiniṣedhau kutaḥ | naivety arthaḥ |

root:
ambhobindugrahaṇacaturāṃś cātakān vīkṣamāṇāḥ  
śreṇībhūtāḥ parigaṇanayā nirdiśanto balākāḥ |  
tvām āsādya stanitasamaye mānayiṣyanti siddhāḥ  
sotkampāni priyasahacarīsaṃbhramāliṅgitāni ||
commentary: prakṣiptam api vyākhyāyate—ambha iti || ambhobindūnāṃ varṣodabindūnāṃ grahaṇe | "sarvaṃ sahāpatitam ambu na cātakasya hitam" iti śāstrād bhūspṛṣṭodakasya teṣāṃ rogahetutvād antarāla eva svīkāre caturāṃś cātakān vīkṣyamāṇāḥ kautukāt paśyantaḥ śreṇībhūtā baddhapaṅktiḥ || abhūtatadbhāve cviḥ || balākā bakapaṅktīḥ parigaṇanayaikā dve tisra iti saṅkhyānena nirdiśanto hastena darśayantaḥ siddhāḥ stanitasamaye tvaṅgarjitakāle sotkampāny utkampapūrvakāṇi priyasahacarīṇāṃ saṃbhrameṇāliṅgitāny āsādya | svayaṃ grahaṇāśleṣasukham anubhūyety arthaḥ || tvāṃ mānāyaṣyanti | tvannimittatvāt sukhalābhasyeti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
utpaśyāmi drutam api sakhe matpriyārthaṃ yiyāsoḥ  
kālakṣepaṃ kakubhasurabhau parvate parvate te |  
śuklāpāṅgaiḥ sajalanayanaiḥ svāgatīkṛtya kekāḥ  
pratyudyātaḥ katham api bhavān gantum āśu vyavasyet ||
commentary: utpaśyāmīti || he sakhe megha, matpriyārthaṃ yathā tathā drutaṃ kṣipram || "laghu kṣipram araṃ drutam" ity amaraḥ || yiyāsor yātum icchor api || yāteḥ sann antād upratyayaḥ || te tava kakubhaiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ surabhau sugandhini || "kakubhaḥ kuje 'rjune" iti śabdārṇave || parvate parvate pratiparvatam || vīpsāyāṃ dviruktiḥ || kālakṣepaṃ kālavilambam || "kṣepo vilambe nindāyām" iti viśvaḥ || utpaśyāmy utprekṣe || vilambahetuṃ darśayan nāśugamanaṃ prārthayate—śukleti || sajalāni sānandabāṣpāṇi nayanāni yeṣāṃ taiḥ śuklāpāṅgair mayūraiḥ || "mayūro barhiṇo barhī śuklāpāṅgaḥ śikhāvalaḥ" iti yādavaḥ || kekāḥ svavāṇīḥ || kekā vāṇī mayūrasya" ity amaraḥ || svāgatīkṛtya svāgatavacanīkṛtya pratyudyātaḥ pratyudgataḥ | mayūravāṇīkṛtātithya ity arthaḥ | bhavān katham api yathākathañcid āśu gantuṃ vyavasyed udyuñjīta || prārthane liṅ | "śeṣe prathamaḥ" iti prathamapuruṣaḥ | śeṣaś cāyaṃ bhavacchabdo yuṣmadasmacchabdavyatirekāt || "svāgatīkṛtya kekāḥ" ity atra kekāsvāropyamāṇasya svāgatavañcanasya prakṛtapratyudgamanopayogāt pariṇāmālaṅkāraḥ | tad uktam alaṅkārasarvasve—"āropyamāṇasya prakṛtopayogitve pariṇāmaḥ" iti ||

mudrāṇāṃ bodhārthaṃ sveṣṭadevatāprabhāvaṃ darśayann āha—mudrās tāvad ityādi | śabareśasyeti siddhaśrīśabarapādasya | śeṣaṃ subodham ||

pāṇḍucchāyopavanavṛtayaḥ ketakaiḥ sūcibhinnair  
nīḍārambhair gṛhabalibhujām ākulagrāmacaityāḥ |  
tvayy āsanne pariṇataphalaśyāmajambūvanāntāḥ  
sampatsyante katipayadinasthāyihaṃsā daśārṇāḥ ||
commentary: pāṇḍv iti || he megha, tvayy āsanne sanikṛṣṭe sati daśārṇo nāma janapadāḥ sūcibhinnaiḥ sūciṣu mukulāgreṣu bhinnair vikasitaiḥ || "ketakīmukulāgreṣu sūciḥ syāt" iti śabdārṇave || ketakaiḥ ketakīkusumaiḥ pāṇḍucchāyā haritavarṇā upavanānāṃ vṛtayaḥ kaṇṭakaśākhāvaraṇā yeṣu te tathoktāḥ || "prākāro varaṇaḥ sālaḥ prācīraṃ prāntato vṛtiḥ" ity amaraḥ || tathā gṛhabalibhujāṃ kākādigrāmapakṣiṇāṃ nīḍārambhaiḥ kulāya nirmāṇaiḥ || "kulāyo nīḍam astriyām" ity amaraḥ || cityāyā imāni caityāni rathyāvṛkṣāḥ || "caityam āyatane buddhavandye codeśapādape" iti viśvaḥ || ākulāni saṅkīrṇāni grāmeṣu caityāni yeṣu te tathoktāḥ | tathā pariṇataiḥ pakvaiḥ phalaiḥ śyāmāni yāni jambūvanāni tair antā ramyāḥ || "mṛtāvavasite ramye samāptāvanta iṣyate" iti śabdārṇave || tathā katipayeṣv eva dineṣu sthāyino haṃsā yeṣu te tathoktā evaṃvidhāḥ sampatsyante bhaviṣyanti || "poṭāyuvatistokakatipaya-" ityādinā kavipayaśabdasyottarapadatve 'pi na tacchabdasyottaratvam asty asya śāstrasya prāyikatvāt ||

root:
pāṇḍucchāyopavanavṛtayaḥ ketakaiḥ sūcibhinnair  
nīḍārambhair gṛhabalibhujām ākulagrāmacaityāḥ |  
tvayy āsanne pariṇataphalaśyāmajambūvanāntāḥ  
sampatsyante katipayadinasthāyihaṃsā daśārṇāḥ ||
commentary:
smitaṃ saṃdarśyeti trilokam āpūrayantyā vajrapāṇiṃ girā vācā pratyabhāṣata | kiṃbhūtayā | madhurayā | mādhuryaṃ śrutisukhatvāt brāhmyeti brahmasvaropetatvāt | brahmasvara iti brahmaśabdo mahato mahāguṇasyādhivacanaṃ yathoktaṃ |

	brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasūyate 'nekasāhasraparṣadi ||

iti || sāhasraśabdena trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avagantavyaḥ | anekasāhasramayyāṃ parṣadīty arthaḥ || yathā coktaṃ |

	lokadhātuṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ śabdena spharatīti |
	yathābhyantarāḥ śṛṇvanti tathā bāhyā api ||

iti | tatrābhyāntarā ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre sthitāḥ | bāhyā iti ye lokadhātvantaritāḥ | tena mahattvād brahma | tasya svaro brahmasvaraḥ ||

atha vā brahmā bhagavān śākyamuniḥ | tasya brahmaṇa iyaṃ brāhmī vāk | tayā brāhmyā ekayaiva girā trilokam āpūrayantyā vyāpnuvantyā vajrapāṇiṃ pratyabhāṣata | tathā coktaṃ |

	ekāpi vāṇi bhavasūdanasya nānābhidhānaiḥ pratideśabhinnaiḥ |
	yathā tathā sarvajanaprabodhahetur bhavaty askhalitā vibhaktā ||

iti ||

root:
teṣāṃ dikṣu prathitavidiśālakṣaṇāṃ rājadhānīṃ  
gatvā sadyaḥ phalam avikalaṃ kāmukatvasya labdhā |  
tīropāntastanitasubhagaṃ pāsyasi svādu yasmāt  
sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ mukham iva payo vetravatyāś calormi ||
commentary: teṣām iti || dikṣu prathitaṃ prasiddhaṃ vidiśeti lakṣaṇaṃ nāmadheyaṃ yasyās tām || "lakṣaṇaṃ nāmni cinhe ca" iti viśvaḥ || teṣāṃ darśāṇānāṃ sambandhinīṃ | dhīyante 'syām iti dhānī || "karaṇādh ikaraṇayoś ca" iti lyuṭ || rājñāṃ dhānī rājadhānī || "kṛdyogalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī samasyate" iti vaktavyāt samāsaḥ || tāṃ pradhānanagarīm || "pradhānanagarī rājñāṃ rājadhānīti kathyate" iti śabdārṇave || gatvā prāpya sadyaḥ kāmukatvasya vilāsitāyāḥ || "vilāsī kāmukaḥ kāmī strīparo ratilampaṭaḥ" iti śabdārṇave || avikalaṃ samagraṃ phalaṃ prayojanaṃ labdhā lapsyate | tvayeti śeṣaḥ || karmaṇi luṭ || kutaḥ | yasmāt kāraṇāt svādu madhuram | calā ūrmayo yasya tac calormi taraṅgitaṃ vetravatyā nāma nadyāḥ payaḥ sabhrūbhaṅga bhrūkuṭiyuktam | daśanapīḍayeti bhāvaḥ | mukham ivādharam ivety arthaḥ | tīropānte taṭaprānte yat stanitaṃ garjitaṃ tena subhagaṃ yathā tathā stanitaśabdena bhaṇitam api vyapadiśyate | "ūrdhvam uccalitakaṇṭhanāsikaṃ huṅkṛtaṃ stanitam alpaghoṣavat" iti lakṣaṇāt || pāsyasi | pibater ḷṭ || "kāminām adharāsvādaḥ suratād atiricyate" iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:
tasminn adrau katicid abalāviprayuktaḥ sa kāmī  
nītvā māsān kanakavalayabhraṃśariktaprakoṣṭhaḥ |  
āṣāḍhasya prathamadivase megham āśliṣṭasānuṃ  
vaprakrīḍāpariṇatagajaprekṣaṇīyaṃ dadarśa ||
commentary: tasminn iti || tasminn adrau citrakūṭādrau | abalāviprayuktaḥ kāntāvirahī | kanakasya valayaḥ kaṭakam || "kaṭakaṃ valayo 'striyām" ity amaraḥ || tasya bhraṃśena pātena riktaḥ śūnyaḥ prakoṣṭhaḥ kūrparādadhaḥ pradeśo yasya sa tathoktaḥ || "kakṣāntare prakoṣṭhaḥ syāt prakoṣṭhaḥ kūrparādadhaḥ" iti śāśvataḥ || virahaduḥkhāt kṛśa ity arthaḥ | kāmī kāmukaḥ sa yakṣaḥ | katicinmāsān | aṣṭau māsān ity arthaḥ | "śeṣān māsān gamaya caturaḥ" iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt || nītvā yāpayitvā | āṣāḍhānakṣatreṇa yuktā paurṇamāsyāṣāḍhī || "nakṣatreṇa yuktaḥ kālaḥ" ity aṇ | "ṭiḍḍhāṇañ-" ityādinā ṅīp || sāṣāḍhy asmin paurṇamāsīty āṣāḍho māsaḥ || "sāsmin paurṇamāsīti saṃjñāyām" ity aṇ || tasya prathamadivase āśliṣṭasānum ākrāntakūṭam | vaprakrīḍā utkhātakelayaḥ || "utkhātakeliḥ krīḍādyair vaprakrīḍā nigadyate" iti śabdārṇave || tāsu pariṇatas tiryag dantaprahāraḥ || "tiryagdantaprahāras tu gajaḥ pariṇato mataḥ" iti halāyudhaḥ || sa cāsau gajaś ca tam iva prekṣaṇīyaṃ darśanīyaṃ meghaṃ dadarśa || gajaprekṣaṇīyam ity atreva lopāluptopamā || kecit "āṣāḍhasya prathamadivase" ity atra "pratyāsanne nabhasi" iti vakṣyamāṇanabhomāsasya pratyāsasya "praśamadivase" iti pāṭhaṃ kalpayanti tad asaṅgatam | prathamātireke kāraṇābhāvāt | nabhomāsasya pratyāsatty artham ity uktam iti cen na | pratyāsattimātrasya māsapratyāsattyaiva prathamadivasasyāpy upapatteḥ | atyantapratyāsatter upayogābhāvenāvivakṣitatvāt | vivakṣitatve vā svapakṣe 'pi prathamadivasātikrameṇa meghadarśana kalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvena tadasambhavāt | pratyutāsmatpakṣa eva kuśala sandeśasya bhāvyanarthapratīkārārthasya purata evānumānamuktaṃ bhavatīty upayoga siddhiḥ || nanūnmattasya nāyaṃ viveka iti cen na | unmattasya nānarthasya pratīkārārthaṃ pravṛttir apīti sandeśa eva mā bhūt || tathā ca kāvyārambha evāprasiddhaḥ syād itv aho mūlacchedī pāṇḍityaprakarṣaḥ | kathaṃ tarhi "śāpānto" me bhujagaśayanād utthite śārṅgapāṇau" ityādinā bhagavatprabodhāv adhikasya śāpasya māsacatuṣṭayāvaśiṣṭasyoktiḥ | daśadivasādhikyād iti cet sapakṣe 'pi kathaṃ sā viṃśatidivasair nyūnatvād iti santoṣṭavyam | tasmād īṣadvaiṣamyam avivakṣitam iti suṣṭhūktaṃ "prathamadivase" iti ||

commentary:
sāṃprataṃ pratikāranirdeśam āha.

upadarśitakrameṇa saṃkliṣṭaṃ saṃkleśasaṃprayuktaṃ niṣphalavyāpāraṃ vā jñātvā svacittaṃ sarvapravṛttinigedhena prabhāvamandatāṃ vidhāya nigṛhṇīyād abhibhavet. dṛḍhaṃ yathā punar api samudācāradharmakaṃ na bhavati. kleśādisaṃgrāme vijayāya kṛtaparikaraḥ śuro bodhisattvaḥ. pratipakṣeṇa yo yasmin pratipakṣa uktaḥ yathā rāgādāv aśubhādi, tena tadviparītavidhānenety arthaḥ. sadā sarvakālam, yadā yadā saṃkliṣṭaṃ pratīyate. ugraparipṛcchāyāṃ gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisattvamadhikṛtyoktam—

	tena surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānāt prativiratena bhavitavyam, amattena anunmattena acapalena acañcalena abhrāntena amukhareṇa anunnatena upasthitasmṛtināsasaṃprajanyena.

iti. atraiva ca—

	pravrajitaṃ bodhisattvam adhikṛtyoktam. smṛtisaṃprajanyasyāvikṣepaḥ.

iti. tathā āryatathāgataguhyasūtre darśitam—

	na khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisattvasya vāg raktā vā duṣṭā vā mūḍhā vā kliṣṭā vā kṣaṇavyākaraṇī vā svapakṣotkarṣaṇavacanā vā parapakṣanigrahavacanā vā ātmavarṇānunayavacanā vā paravarṇapratighātavacanā vā pratijñottāraṇavacanā vā ābhimānikavyākaraṇavacanā vā ||

iti. evaṃ niṣphalaspandavarjanenānarthād ātmabhāvasya rakṣā pratipāditā bhavati. tasmān mayā śīlasusthitenāprakampenāśithilena bhavitavyam iti.

etac ca samāhitacittasya sidhyati. ata idaṃ śamathamāhātmyam avagamya tātparyeṇa bhāvayitavyam. anena tīvra ādaro bhavati śikśāsu. tenāpi smṛtir upatiṣṭhate. upasthitasmṛtir niṣphalaṃ varjayati. tasyānarthā na saṃbhavanti. tasmād ātmabhāvaṃ rakṣitukāmena smṛtimūlam anviṣya nityam upasthitasmṛtinā bhavitavyam. etad evāha—

	tatrātmabhāve kā rakṣā yadanarthavivarjanam |
	kena tallabhyate sarve niṣphalaspandavarjanāt ||

	etatsidhyetsadā smṛtyā smṛtistīvrādarādbhavet |
	ādaraḥ śamamāhātmyaṃ jñātvātāpena jāyate || (Śikṣāsamuccaya 7–8)

iti |

śamathamāhātmyaṃ tu yathāvasaram ihaiva kathayiṣyate.

kaṇṭhāśleṣapraṇayini jane kiṃ punar dūrasaṃsthe ||
commentary: tasyeti || rājāno yakṣāḥ || "rājā prabhau nṛpe candre yakṣe kṣatriyaśakrayoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || rājñāṃ rājā rājarājaḥ kuberaḥ || "rājarājo dhanādhipaḥ" ity amaraḥ | "rājāhaḥ sakhibhyaṣ ṭac" iti ṭacpratyayaḥ || tasyānucaro yakṣaḥ | antarbāṣpo dhīrodāttatvād antaḥ stambhitāśruḥ san | kautukādhānahetor abhilāṣotpādakāraṇasya || "kautukaṃ cābhilāṣesyād utsave narmaharṣayoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || tasya meghasya puro 'gre katham api | garīyasā prayatnenety arthaḥ || "jñānahetuvivakṣāyām apy ādi katham avyayam | katham ādi tathāpy antaṃ yatnagauravabāḍhayoḥ" ity ujjvalaḥ || sthitvā ciraṃ dadhyau cintayām āsa || "dhyai cintāyām" iti dhātor liṭ || manovikāropaśamanaparyantam iti śeṣaḥ || vikārahetum āha meghāloka iti || meghāloke meghadarśane sati sukhino 'pi priyādijanasaṅgatasyāpi cetaś cittam anyathābhūtā vṛttir vyāpāro yasya tadanyathāvṛtti bhavati | vikṛtim āpadyata ity arthaḥ kaṇṭhāśleṣapraṇayini kaṇṭhāliṅganārthini jane | dūre saṃsthā sthitir yasya tasmin dūrasaṃsthe sati kiṃ punaḥ | virahiṇaḥ kim uta vaktavyam ity arthaḥ | virahiṇāṃ meghasandarśanam uddīpanaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ || arthāntaranyāso 'laṅkāraḥ | tad uktaṃ daṇḍinā - "jñeyaḥ so 'rthāntaranyāso vastu prastutya kiñcana | tatsādhanasamarthasya nyāso yo 'nyasya vastunaḥ" iti ||

sa pratyagraiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ kalpitārghāya tasmai  
prītaḥ prītipramukhavacanaṃ svāgataṃ vyājahāra ||
commentary: atha samāhitāntaḥkaraṇaḥ sankiṃ kṛtavānityata āha-pratyāsanna iti || sa yakṣaḥ | yaś ciraṃ dadhyau sa ity arthaḥ | nabhasi śrāvaṇe  "namaḥ khaṃ śrāvaṇo nabhāḥ" ity amaraḥ || pratyāsanne āṣāḍhasyānantaraṃ sannikṛṣṭe | prāpte satīty arthaḥ | dayitājīvitālambanārthī san | varṣākālasya virahaduḥkhajanakatvāt "utpannānarthapratīkārād anarthotpattipratibandha eva varam" iti nyāyena prāg eva priyāprāṇadhāraṇopāyaṃ cikīrṣur ity arthaḥ | jīvanasyodakasya mūtaḥ paṭabandho vastrabandho jīmūtaḥ || pṛṣodarāditvāt sādhuḥ | "mūtaḥ syāt paṭabandhe 'pi" iti rudraḥ || tena jīmūtena jaladhareṇa prayojyena svakuśalamayīṃ svakṣemapradhānāṃ pravṛttiṃ vārtām || "vārtā pravṛttir vṛttāntaḥ" ity amaraḥ || hārayiṣyan prāpayiṣyan | "ḷṭ śeṣe ca" iti cakārāt kriyārthakriyopapadāl ḷṛṭpratyayaḥ | jīvanārthaṃ karma jīvanapradenaiva kartavyam iti bhāvaḥ || "hṛkror anyatarasyām" iti karmasaṃjñāyā vikalpāt pakṣe kartari tṛtīyā || pratyagrair abhinavaiḥ kuṭajakusumair girimallikābhiḥ || "kuṭajo girimallikā" iti halāyudhaḥ || kalpitārghāya kalpito 'nuṣṭhitaḥ pūjāvidhir yasmai tasmai || "mūlye pūjāvidhāv arghaḥ" ity amaraḥ || tasmai jīmūtāya || "kriyāgrahaṇam api kartavyam" iti sampradānatvāc caturthī || prītipramukhāni prītipūrvakāṇi vacanāni yasmin karmaṇi tat prītipramukhavacanaṃ yathā tathā | śobhanam āgataṃ svāgataṃ svāgatavacanaṃ prītaḥ sanvyājahāra | kuśalāgamanaṃ papracchety arthaḥ || nāthena tv atra "pratyāsanne manasi" iti sādhīyān pāṭhaḥ kalpitaḥ | pratyāsanne prakṛtimāpanne satīty arthaḥ | yas tu tenaiva pūrvapāṭhavirodhaḥ pradarśitaḥ so 'smābhiḥ "āṣāḍhasya prathamadivase" ity etatpāṭhavikalpa samādhānenaiva samādhāya parihṛtaḥ ||

dhūmajyotiḥsalilamarutāṃ saṃnipātaḥ kva meghaḥ  
sandeśārthāḥ kva paṭukaraṇaiḥ prāṇibhiḥ prāpaṇīyāḥ |  
ity autsukyād aparigaṇayan guhyakas taṃ yayāce  
kāmārtā hi prakṛtikṛpaṇāś cetanācetaneṣu ||
commentary: nanu cetana sādhyam arthaṃ katham acetanena kārayituṃ pravṛtta ity apekṣāyāṃ kaviḥ samādhatte—dhūmeti || dhūmaś ca jyotiś ca salilaṃ ca marudvāyuś ca teṣāṃ sannipātaḥ saṅghāto meghaḥ kva | acetanatvāt sandeśānarha ity arthaḥ | paṭukaraṇaiḥ samarthendriyaiḥ || "karaṇaṃ sādhakatamaṃ kṣetragātrendriyeṣv api" ity amaraḥ || prāṇibhiś cetanaiḥ || "prāṇī tu cetano janmī" ity amaraḥ || prāpaṇīyāḥ prāpayitavyāḥ | sandiśyanta iti sandeśāsta evārthāḥ kva | ity evam autsukyād iṣṭārthodyuktatvāt || "iṣṭārthodyukta utsukaḥ" ity amaraḥ || sampradānatvāt kuśalapraśnenābhimukhīcakārety arthaḥ | aparigaṇayann avicārayan guhyako yakṣas taṃ meghaṃ yayāce yācitavān || "yācṛ yācñāyām" || tathā hi | kāmārtā madanāturāś cetanāścācetanāś ca teṣu viṣaye prakṛtikṛpaṇāḥ svabhāvadīnāḥ | kāmāndhānāṃ yuktāyuktavivekaśūnyatvād acetanayācñā na virudhyata ity arthaḥ || atra meghasandeśayor virūpayor ghaṭanād viṣamālaṅkāraḥ | tad uktaṃ—"viruddhakāryasyotpattir yatrānarthasya vā bhavet | virūpaghaṭanā cāsau viṣamālaṅkṛtis tridhā" || iti | sā cārthāntaranyāsānuprāṇitā tatsamarthakatvenaiva caturthapāde tasyopanyāsāt ||

paraguṇān sadbhūtān api parokṣaṃ brūyān na samakṣam. anyathā lapanāṃ kaścin manyeta. pareṇa tu tatsamakṣamanyasya guṇe bhāṣyamāṇe tadanuvādakatayā samakṣam api brūyāt. anyathā nāsya rūcir atreti matvā svacittaṃ pradūṣayet paraḥ. svaguṇe punaḥ kenacid guṇapakṣapātinā prasannena samakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ ca kīrtyamāne cittasyonnatiṃ nivārayaṃs tasyaiva guṇābhidhāyakasya guṇānurāgitāṃ manasi kuryāt.

jātaṃ vaṃśe bhuvanavidite puṣkarāvartakānāṃ  
jānāmi tvāṃ prakṛtipuruṣaṃ kāmarūpaṃ maghonaḥ |  
tenārthitvaṃ tvayi vidhivaśād dūrabandhur gato 'haṃ   
yācñā moghā varam adhiguṇe nādhame labdhakāmā ||
commentary:
samprati yācanāprakāram āha—jātam iti || he megha tvāṃ bhuvaneṣu vidite bhuvanavidite || "niṣṭhā" iti bhūtārthe ktaḥ | "matibuddhi-" ityādinā vartamānārthatve 'pi "ktasya ca vartamāne" iti bhuvanaśabdasya ṣaṣṭhyantatāniyamāt samāso na syāt | "tena ca pūjāyām" iti niṣedhāt || puṣkarāś cāvartakāś ca kecin meghānāṃ śreṣṭhās teṣāṃ vaṃśe jātam | mahākulaprasūtam ity arthaḥ | kāmarūpam icchādhīnavigraham | durgādisañcārakṣamam ity arthaḥ | maghona indrasya prakṛtipuruṣaṃ pradhānapuruṣaṃ jānāmi | tena mahākulaprasūtatvādiguṇayogitvena hetunā vidhivaśād daivāyattatvāt || "vidhir vidhāne daive ca" ity amaraḥ || vaśam āyatte || "vaśam icchāprabhutvayoḥ" iti viśvaḥ || dūre bandhur yasya sa dūrabandhur viyuktabhāryo 'haṃ tvayy arthitvaṃ gataḥ ||
nanu yācakasya yācñāyāṃ yācyaguṇotkarṣaḥ kutropayujyata ity āśaṅkya daivād yācñābhaṅge 'pi lāghavadoṣābhāva evopayoga ity āha-yācñeti | tathā hi | adhiguṇe 'dhikaguṇe puṃsi viṣaye yācñā moghā niṣphalāpi varam īṣatpriyam | dātur guṇāḍhyatvāt priyatvaṃ yācñāvaiphalyādīṣatpriyatvam iti bhāvaḥ || adhame nirguṇe yācñā labdhakāmāpi saphalāpi na varam | īṣatpriyam api na bhavatīty arthaḥ || "daivād vṛte varaḥ śreṣṭhe triṣu klībaṃ manāk priye" ity amaraḥ || arthāntaranyāsānuprāṇitaḥ preyo 'laṅkāraḥ | tad uktaṃ daṇḍinā-"preyaḥ priyatarākhyānam" iti || etad ādye pādatraye caturthapādasthenārthāntaranyāsenopajīvitam iti suvyaktam etat ||

commentary: santaptānām iti || he payoda, tvaṃ santaptānām ātapena vā pravāsaviraheṇa vā saṃjvaritānām || "santāpaḥ sañjvaraḥ samau" ity amaraḥ || śaraṇaṃ payodānenātapakhinnānāṃ proṣitānāṃ svasthānapreraṇayā ca rakṣako 'si || "śaraṇaṃ gṛharakṣitroḥ" ity amaraḥ || tat tasmāt kāraṇād dhanapateḥ kuberasya krodhena viśleṣitasya priyayā viyojitasya me mama sandeśaṃ vārtā priyāyā hara | priyāṃ prati nayety arthaḥ | sambandhasāmānye ṣaṣṭhī || sandeśaharaṇenāvayoḥ santāpaṃ nudety arthaḥ | kutra sthāne sā sthitā tatsthānasya vā kiṃ vyāvartakaṃ tatrāha—gantavyeti || bahir bhavaṃ bāhyam || "bahirdevapañcajanebhyaś ca" iti yañ || bāhya udyāne sthitasya harasya śirasi yā candrikā tayā dhautāni nirmalāni harmyāṇi dhanikabhavanāni yasyāṃ sā tathoktā || "harmyādi dhanināṃ vāsaḥ" ity amaraḥ || anena vyāvartakam uktam || alakā nāmālaketi prasiddhā yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ vasatiḥ sthānaṃ te tava gantavyā | tvayā gantavyety arthaḥ || "kṛtyānāṃ kartari vā" iti ṣaṣṭhī ||

tvām ārūḍhaṃ pavanapadavīm udgṛhītālakāntāḥ  
prekṣiṣyante pathikavanitāḥ pratyayād āśvasantyaḥ |  
kaḥ saṃnaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayy upekṣeta jāyāṃ  
na syād anyo 'py aham iva jano yaḥ parādhīnavṛttiḥ ||
commentary: madarthaṃ prasthitasya te pathikāṅganājanāśvāsam amānuṣaṅgikaṃ phalam ity āha—tvām iti || pavanapadavīm ākāśam ārūḍhaṃ tvām | panthānaṃ gacchanti te pathikāḥ || "pathaḥ ṣkan" iti ṣkanpratyayaḥ || teṣāṃ vanitāḥ proṣitabhartṛkāḥ| pratyayāt priyāgamanaviśvāsāt || "pratyayo 'dhīnaśapathajñānaviśvāsahetuṣu" ity amaraḥ || āśvasyatyāḥ viśvasitāḥ || śvasidhātoḥ śatrantāt "ugitaś ca" iti ṅīp | tathodgṛhītālakāntā dṛṣṭiprasārārtham unnamayya dhṛtālakāgrāḥ satyaḥ prekṣiṣyante | atyutkaṇṭhatayā drakṣyantīty arthaḥ || madāgamanena pathikāḥ katham āgamiṣyantīty atrāha—tathā hi | tvayi saṃnaddhe vyāpṛte sati viraheṇa vidhurāṃ vivaśāṃ jāyāṃ ka upekṣeta | na ko 'pīty arthaḥ | anyo 'pi madvyatirikto 'pi yo jano 'ham iva parādhīnavṛttiḥ parāyattajīvanako na syāt | svatantras tu na ko 'py upekṣeteti bhāvaḥ || atrārthāntaranyāso 'laṅkāraḥ | tad uktam—"kāryakāraṇasāmānyaviśeṣāṇāṃ parasparam | samarthanaṃ yatra so 'rthāntaragyāsa udāhṛtaḥ ||" iti lakṣaṇāt ||

commentary:
parāgamasāmyam uktvā svāgamavirodham āha—kiṃ cetyādi | iha hi madhyamakādivicārito 'rtho mantranaye phalena devatāyogena khyāpyate | tataś ca yad yena mudryate tat tatsvabhāvaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā grāhyasya rūpādiskandhacatuṣṭayasvabhāvasya grāhyatvahānaye vairocanādayaś catvāro grāhakāḥ paratantrarūpāḥ kathyante | teṣāṃ ca mudrārthaṃ pariniṣpannarūpo grāhyagrāhakaśūnyo 'kṣobhyaś ced ucyate tad āgamoktā vajrasattvamudrā virudhyate | ratnagarbhādisthabodhicitte pariniṣpannarūpākṣobhyasadbhāvāt | vajrasattvamudrāṃ ca vinā na bauddhakṛtānto bhavatīti kathaṃ bāhyasiddhāntena na sāmyam | tathā ca kambalāmbarapādāḥ—

	sarvaḥ samānaḥ pravibhajyamānaḥ 
		sukṣmekṣikākṣāmadhiyā kṛtāntaḥ |
	bauddhasya bāhyasya vibhāgakartrī
		na syād ihaikā yadi śūnyatoktiḥ ||

	mā bhūt saṃvitpratiṣṭhānam ata eva munir bhayāt |
	bhinatti deśanādharmam uktvoktvā śūnyatātmanā ||

iti pravacanam api | 

	samastavedasiddhānāṃ kṛtānām īśvarādibhiḥ |
	bauddhānāṃ tantramantrāṇāṃ viśeṣaḥ śunyatāṃ prati ||

iti | paraparikalpitaśūnyatoktibhyas tathāgataśūnyatoktīnām abhisandhikṛto viśeṣaḥ sphuṭa iti na pratanyate ||

seviṣyante nayanasubhagaṃ khe bhavantaṃ balākāḥ ||
commentary: nimittāny api te śubhāni dṛśyanta ity āha-mandaṃ mandam iti || anukūlaḥ pavano vāyustvāṃ manda mandam | atimandam ity arthaḥ || atra kathañcid vīpsāyām eva dviruktir nirvāhyā | "prakāre guṇavacanasya" ity etad āśrayaṇe tu karmadhārayavad bhāve subluki mandamandam iti syāt | tad evāha vāmanaḥ-"mandamandam ity atra prakārārthe dvirbhāvaḥ" iti | yathā sadṛśam | bhāviphalānurūpam ity arthaḥ || "yathā | sādṛśyayogyatvavīpsārthānatikrame" iti yādavaḥ || nudati prerayati | ayaṃ sagandhaḥ sagarvaḥ | sambandhīti kecit || "gandho gandhaka āmode leśe sambandhagarvayoḥ" ity ubhayatrāpi viśvaḥ || te tava vāmo vāmabhāgasthaḥ || "vāmas tu vakre ramye syāt savye vāmagate 'pi ca" iti śabdārṇave || cātakaḥ pakṣiviśeṣaś ca madhuraṃ śrāvyaṃ nadati vyāharati || idaṃ nimittadvayaṃ vartate | vartiṣyate cāparaṃ nimittam ity āha—garbheti || garbhaḥ kukṣistho jantuḥ || "garbhopakārake hy agnau sukhe panasakaṇṭake | kukṣau kukṣisthajantau ca" iti yādavaḥ || tasyādhānam utpādanaṃ tad eva kṣaṇa utsavaḥ | sukhahetutvād iti bhāvaḥ || "nirvyāpārasthitau kālaviśeṣotsavayoḥ kṣaṇaḥ" ity amaraḥ || tasmin paricayād abhyāsād dhetoḥ khe vyomni | ābaddhamālāḥ || garbhādhānasukhārthaṃ tvatsamīpe baddhapaṅktaya ity arthaḥ || uktaṃ ca karṇodaye-"garbhaṃ balākā dadhate 'bhrayogān nāke nibaddhāvalayaḥ samantāt" iti || balākā balākāṅganā nayanasubhagaṃ dṛṣṭipriyaṃ bhavantaṃ nūnaṃ satyaṃ seviṣyante || anukūlamārutacātakaśabditabalākādarśanānāṃ śubhasūcakatvaṃ śakunaśāstre dṛṣṭaṃ tadvistarabhayān nālekhi ||

commentary: katham ity āha—brahmetyādi. yata eva suviśuddhabodharūpatvād asau buddhas tad eva paraṃ brahma. tasmāt sa eva brahmā. nirvṛttita iti mokṣarūpatvād ity arthaḥ. nirvṛtir nirvāṇaṃ mokṣo niḥśreyasaṃ buddha iti paryāyāḥ. viṣaṇād iti tādātmyena praveśāt. kva? paramagambhīre dharmakāye. viśateḥ ktapratyayaḥ ṣatvaṇatve ca. sadā sukalyāṇād iti dhruvakalyāṇatvāt paramakalyāṇatvāc ca. sarvar ityādi. yasmād asau sarveṣām ātmani dharmadhātau vedakatvena sthitaḥ, tasmāt sarvaḥ.

anantaroktam evaikaikamudrāyā ekaikānandatvaṃ sphuṭayati—vicitram ityādi | gatārtham ||

nanu caturmudrānvayānugato 'yaṃ granthaḥ | sa ca yoginītantrānusāreṇa na yogatantrānusāreṇeti cet | tan na | ucyate—

	āryanāgārjunair uktaṃ śrīsamājānusārataḥ |
	pañcabhiś ca kramair yat tac caturmudrāsu kathyate || (1)

	kramayor mantramūrtitvacinnidhyaptī yathākramam |
	te caikamudrayokte 'tra mantramūrtimanaḥsthiteḥ || (3)

	dharmamudrāsukhaṃ yasmāt saṃvṛteḥ satyadarśanam |
	satyasya bhūtakoṭitvaṃ mahāmudrārtha ucyate || (3)

	phalaṃ samayamudrāyā dvayor advayavedanam |
	kramāṇāṃ mīlanaṃ divyaṃ buddhatvaphaladāyakam || (4) 

tathā ca pradīpoddyotanaṣaṭkoṭivyākhyāyām ācāryacandrakīrtipādair uktam—

	utpattikrama ādau syān mantramūrtiprasādhakaḥ |
	cittanidhyaptimātraṃ tu dvitīyaḥ krama ucyate ||

	tṛtīyas tu kramo ramyaḥ saṃvṛteḥ satyadarśanam |
	satyasya saṃvṛteḥ śuddhiś caturthaḥ krama ucyate ||

	pañcamo yuganaddhākhyo yat satyadvayayojanam | 
	sādhanāṅgam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvatantrārthasaṅgrahaḥ ||

	eṣāṃ kramāṇāṃ bhedāṃs tu prastāravidhinā bahūn |
	sammīlanaṃ ca teṣāṃ vai yo vetti sa hi tantravit ||

tathā cāryadevapādair api sūtakamelāpake mantratattvamudrātattvātmatattvadharmatattvadevatātattvanāmabhiḥ pañcakramāṇām uddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ | tatra mantratattvam iti hūṃkārādimantrotthitā hevajrādimūrtiḥ | mudrātattvam iti saṅkhyāgaṇanākrameṇa neyārthatayā cittanidyaptimātraṃ nītārthatas tu karmamudrāyām | ātmatattvam iti jagataś ciccitraniḥsvabhāvatā | dharmatattvam iti dharmānutpādaḥ | devatātattvam ity ātmatattvadharmatattvayos tādāmīkaraṇam abhinnateti yāvat | 

	etāni pañca tattvāni gurūṇām upadeśataḥ |
	caturmudrāsu yojyāni pañcakrama iva kramāt ||

nanu—

	kramam utpattikaṃ caiva utpannakramam eva ca ||
	kramadvayaṃ samāśritya vajriṇāṃ dharmadeśanā |

iti tantre pāṭha | tat kathaṃ pañca kramāḥ | ucyate | utpattikrame piṇḍīkramavajrajāpau bāhyotpattigambhīrotpattyaparanāmakau | utpanne ca svādhiṣṭhānābhisambodhiyuganaddhakramā utpannapariniṣpannasvābhāvikakramāparanāmakā iti |

etāsāṃ caturmudrāṇāṃ sadbhāvaḥ svabhāvaś ca sarvarahasyatantrokto vijñeyaḥ | tad uktaṃ tatra—

	mānasikā mahāmudrā samayamudrā tu sarvagā |
	vācasī dharmamudrā tu karmamudrā tu kāyikī ||

śreyaḥprāptinimittāya namaḥ somārdhadhāriṇe || 1.1 ||
commentary: vārttikārambhe śiṣṭācāramanuvidadhāno maṅgalaṃ tāvat karoti viśuddheti | dṛṣṭā hi śiṣṭānāṃ pravṛttiḥ sarvakāryeṣu maṅgalācaraṇapūrvikā | maṅgalaṃ ca devatāstutinamaskārādi | asya ca niyogataḥ phalavatkāryāntarārambhasaṃyogāt sākṣād aphalatvāc ca phalavatsannidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgam iti nyāyena kāryāntaraśeṣatve 'vadhṛte satyārambhasya samāptiparyantatvād apekṣitāvighnaparisamāptiḥ phalam | apekṣitavidher anapekṣitavidhānaṃ durbalam iti nyāyena phalāntarakalpanāyā durbalatvāt | ato yathā sāmpradāyikam adhyāyānadhyāyādi svādhyāyāvighnārtham evam idam api | tad ayam arthaḥ viśuddhau jñānadehau yasya sa tathoktaḥ | viśuddhaṃ ca bhagavato jñānaṃ rāgādibhir jñānakāraṇānām adūṣitatvād dehaś cāyonijatvād vividhagarbhavedanāvirahāc ca | trivedī ca tasya cakṣur iti gauṇo vādaḥ asandigdhāviparītaspaṣṭavedārthaprakāśakatvāt | divyaṃ cātīndriyārthagocaratvāt | bhautikaṃ hi cakṣuḥ pratyutpannārthaviṣayam | idaṃ tv anāgatādiviṣayaṃ divyam iti | śreyasaś ca hitāhitaprāptiparihārātmano bhagavān nimittam | somārdhadhāriṇe somakalādhāriṇe | nama iti | yady api vigrahādipañcakaṃ devatādhikaraṇe nirākariṣyate tathāpyājyādistotravat pradhānakarmaṇa eva devatāstuter evaṅkṛtāyāḥ phalam ity adoṣa iti ||

root:
viśuddhajñānadehāya trivedīdivyacakṣuṣe |
śreyaḥprāptinimittāya namaḥ somārdhadhāriṇe || 1.1 ||
commentary:
atityāgaṃ niṣedhayan punar ātmarakṣām upadarśayann āha.

satāṃ satpuruṣāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaḥ. laukikalokottaraparahitasukhavidhānam | tatsevakaṃ kāyam alpārthanimittaṃ na pīḍayet. anyathā mahato 'rtharāśer hāniḥ syāt. ata eva pūrvasmin hetupadam etat. kutaḥ punar evam? yasmād anenaiva sukumāropakrameṇa saṃvardhamānaḥ śīghram eva sattvānāṃ hitasukhasaṃpādanasamartho bhavati.

-- 5.67

yata evaṃ tasmāt svaśarīraśirodānādi na kartavyam iti niṣiddham. kadā? aśuddhe mitrāmitretarasarvavyasanijanasādhāraṇapravṛtte kṛpācitte. atyārabdhena hi vīryeṇa svaparahitārthasya bādhā syāt. samapravṛtte punar āśaye svaparātmano 'tirikte vā na niṣidhyate. yaduktam—tathā svaparabodhipakṣaśrutādyantarāyakarau tyāgātyāgau na kāryau. adhikasattvārthaśaktes tulyaśakter vā bodhisattvasyādhikatulyakuśalāntarāyakarau tyāgātyāgau na kāryāv iti siddhaṃ bhavati.

idam eva ca saṃdhāya bodhisattvaprātimokṣe 'bhihitam—

	yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputra abhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisattvo bodhyaṅgair abhiyuktaḥ, tena kathaṃ dānaṃ dātavyam, kataraṃ dānaṃ dātavyam, kiyadrūpaṃ dānaṃ dātavyam? peyālaṃ. dharmadāyakena bhavitavyam. yaś ca śāriputra gṛhī bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saptaratnaparipūrṇāni tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt, yaś ca śāriputra pravrajyāparyāpanno bodhisattvaḥ ekāṃ catuṣpadikāṃ gāthāṃ prakāśayet, ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. na śāriputra tathāgatena pravrajitasyāmiṣadānamanujñātam. peyālaṃ. yasya punaḥ śāriputra pātrāgataḥ pātraparyāpanno lābho bhaved dhārmiko dharmalabdhaḥ, tena sādhāraṇabhājinā bhavitavyaṃ sārdhaṃ sabrahmacāribhiḥ

iti. tatraivāha-

	yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputra anabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisattvaḥ, tena dharma āsevitavyaḥ. tatra tenābhiyuktena bhavitavyam iti. anyathā hi ekasattvārthasaṃgrahārthaṃ mahataḥ sattvarāśes tasya ca sattvasya bodhisattvāśayaparikarmāntarāyān mahato 'rthasya hāniḥ kṛtā syād.

iti.

anenopāyakauśalena viharan na bodhimārgāt paribhraśyate. ayam abhiprāyaḥ—dattaḥ pūrvam evānenātmabhāvaḥ sarvasattvebhyaḥ. kevalam akālaparibhogāt parirakṣaṇīyaḥ. ato na mātsaryasyāvakāśaḥ. nāpi pratijñātārthahānir iti. yad uktam—

	bhaiṣajyavṛkṣasya sudarśanasya mūlādibhogyasya yathaiva bījam |
	datvāpi saṃrakṣyam akālabhogāt saṃbuddhabhaiṣajyataros tathaiva ||

iti.

commentary: api ca yadi nāma śuśrūṣavo mannibandhane doṣānupalabhante tathāpy aham anapavādyaḥ | nahyahaṃ svatantraḥ kiñcidabhidadhe | āgamānusāriṇas tu me yathāgamaṃ vartamānasya skhalitam api daivād avarjanīyatayāpannam ity upekṣaṇīyam eva | na hi kimapy abhimataṃ vastu nirdoṣaṃ bhavati | doṣāṃs tu samādhāya guṇā upajīvitavyā ity āha āgameti | satāṃ hi mārgo 'yam āgamānusāro nāma | tad iha bahulaṃ guṇā eva | doṣās tu kathañcit santo 'py alpatvād asatkalpā ity upekṣitavyā iti ||

commentary: kiṃ kṛtvā | smitam ityādi | lokānāṃ sattvānām apāyatrayaśodhanaṃ narakatiryakpretasaṃśodhanaṃ smitaṃ darśayitvā vajrapāṇiṃ pratyabhāṣateti saṃbandhaḥ || tathāgatānāṃ dharmadeśanāyās triliṅgāni | tad yathā | smitaṃ vyavalokitaṃ raśmisaṃcodanaṃ ca | kvacid ekaṃ kvacid dve kvacit trīṇi vā yugapad bhavanti | tad yathā śrīmāyājālatantre dvayaṃ paṭhyate | smitaṃ vyavalokitaṃ ca | kvacit trīṇi yathā pañcaviṃśatisāhasryāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ maitreyavyavalokanaṃ smitaṃ mukhena raśmispharaṇaṃ ceti | kvacid ekaṃ yathātraiva nāmasaṃgītau smitaṃ saṃdarśya lokānām iti || tac ca smitaṃ caturvidhaṃ | aṅgapratyaṅgaspharaṇena romakūpaspharaṇena prakṛtiprabhāvispharaṇena jihvendriyaraśmispharaṇena ca | tad atra jihvāprātihāryaṃ | deśanāyāḥ pūrvaliṅgaṃ || trailokyābhāsakaraṇam ityādinā darśayati bhūr bhuvaḥ svar iti trayāṇāṃ lokānām ābhāsakaraṇaṃ prakāśanakaraṇaṃ smitaṃ darśayitvā vajrapāṇiṃ pratyabhāṣateti saṃbandhaḥ || punar api kiṃviśiṣṭaṃ smitam ity āha caturmārāriśāsanam iti | catvāro mārāḥ skandhakleśamṛtyudevaputrāḥ | ta evārayas teṣāṃ śāsanam anuśāsanaṃ nigrahaḥ ||

commentary: kiñcāstu tāvad asmādṛśānāṃ kavipravīrāṇām āgamānusāriṇyo vācaḥ śobhanta iti | anyasyāpi śraddadhānasya trayīmārgānusāriṇī yathākathañcidārabdhā kliṣṭā alpasārāpi vāgvṛttiḥ śobhate | asmākaṃ tu bahusārā akleśanirmitā śobhatetarām ity āha yatheti ||

commentary: punar api saṃvṛtisatyam āśu sambhāropacayārtham āha—jananītyādi. jananyādiśabdaiḥ prajñāmātram uktam, nāvaśyaṃ bāhyā viśeṣā iti saṃkṣepaḥ. jagajjanam ity āryalokam, anyeṣāṃ niśceṣṭatvāt. vibhāgam iti jñeyanānātvam.

commentary: nanu kimaṅgabhūtāyāṃ mīmāṃsāyāṃ vārttikaṃ praṇīyate vedā eva sākṣād vyākhyāyantām ata āha mīmāṃseti | vedā eva saṃśayapūrvottarapakṣakrameṇa vyākhyāyamānā mano harantitarāṃ na tu mantrabrāhmaṇabhāṣyaprasthānena | mīmāṃsayaiva tu te tathāvyākhyāyanta iti tatraiva vārttikaṃ kartuṃ me tṛṣṇā vardhata iti ||

commentary: kathaṃ punar upadeśo dharme pramāṇam ata āha autpattiketi | bādhakāraṇadoṣādhīnaṃ hy aprāmāṇyam | tatra sambandhautpattikatvapratipādanena taddvārā puruṣānupraveśābhāvāt puruṣāśrayatvāc ca śabde doṣāṇāṃ kāraṇadoṣanivāraṇaṃ tāvat kṛtam | tannirākaraṇena sahāprāmāṇyam anapoditam ity avyatirekapadaprayojanam āha abādha iti | avyatirekapadenābādhaḥ pratipādyate na hi deśakālayor ubhayor api codanājanitaṃ jñānaṃ viparyetīti | tad evaṃ bādhakāraṇadoṣanirākaraṇe kṛte 'napoditam autsargikaṃ prāmāṇyam iti tat pramāṇam ity anenoktam iti darśayati svata iti ||

bhagavato mahānirvāṇaśayyām iva śayyāṃ parikalpayet. abhimatayā diśā śiro vidhāya, dakṣiṇena pārśvena, pādasyopari pādam ādhāya, dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum upadhānaṃ kṛtvā, vāmaṃ ca prasārya jaṅghopari niveśya, cīvaraiḥ susaṃvṛtakāyaḥ, smṛtaḥ, saṃprajānānaḥ, utthānasaṃjñī, ālokasaṃjñī, śayitaḥ, nācittakamiddhāvaṣṭabdhaḥ. na ca nidrāsukham ākhādayet, na ca pārśvasukham anyatra yāvad evaiṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai iti. laghutthānaḥ śīghram evottiṣṭhet. na tu jṛmbhikāṃ gātramoṭanaṃ kurvann ālasyopahitaś cireṇa. etebhya eva sarvebhyaḥ pūrvam eva.

root:
vākyāntare samarthe 'pi kimarthaṃ vidhir āśritaḥ |
sādhyasādhanasambandhaḥ sarvākhyāteṣu gamyate || 12 ||
sarvavākyeṣu cākhyātaṃ tenākāṅkṣānivartanāt |
pravṛttisiddhir icchātaḥ pratiṣedhāt tu varjanam || 13 ||
commentary: atra codayati vākyāntara iti dvayena | ayam arthaḥ yad idaṃ śabdaviśeṣasya vidher dharme pramāṇatvam āśritam anena vākyāntaram api hi vartamānopadeśakaṃ dharmapramitau pramāṇam eva | śreyas sādhanaṃ hi dharmaḥ | sa ca śreyasaḥ svargādeḥ sādhanena yāgādinā sādhyasādhanasambandhaḥ sarvākhyāteṣu sambhavati | svargakāmo yajetety ato 'pi hi yāgena svargaḥ sidhyatīti gamyata eva | yathā loke odanaṃ pacatīti pākaudanayoḥ sādhyasādhanasambandhabuddhiḥ | syād etat ākhyātam antareṇa sādhyasādhanasambandho na siddhyet tadartho vidhir iti | tan na | anākhyātavākyaprayogāsambhavāt | prayojanāya hi vākyam uccāryate | nirākāṅkṣaṃ ca vacaḥ prayojanakṣamam ākāṅkṣānivartanaṃ cākhyātādṛte na sambhavati | itarathā vidher apy asambhavāt | stutyāpi hy ākhyātam eva khādirādivākyeṣu vidhāyakaṃ parikalpyate | athocyeta anuṣṭhito yāgādir dharmaḥ na cānuṣṭhānaṃ pravartakādṛte sambhavati | na ca vidhim antareṇānyaḥ pravartayatīti | tan na | icchānibandhanatvāt pravṛtteḥ | aniṣṭeṣu vidhiśatenāpy apravṛtteḥ | ato 'nenedaṃ sidhyatīti saṃvidi vopāyārthī sa tatra pravartata iti | na cādharmavarjanārtho vidhiḥ | pratiṣedhād eva nañas tatsiddheḥ | rāgādiprāptakartavyatānuvādena nañ eva niṣedhādhikāre nivartakaḥ | eṣā hi tatra vacanavyaktiḥ yaddhanyāt tan neti | ato 'narthako vidhiprāmāṇyapratipādanaprayāsaḥ | apauruṣeyaḥ śabdaḥ dharme pramāṇam ity etāvad eva vacanīyam iti ||

commentary: punaḥ kiṃbhūta | abhinavajaladharasundara | abhinavo navīnaśvāsau jaladharaśceti tadvat sundaraḥ śyāmaḥ tasya saṃbodhanam | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | dhṛtamandra | amṛtonmathane dhṛtaḥ pṛṣṭhe mandarācalo yena sa tathā tasya saṃbodhanam | punaḥ kiṃbhūta | śrīmukhacandracakora | śriyo lakṣmyā mukhaṃ tadeva candraḥ tasya cakoraḥ tasya saṃbodhanam | cakoro hi candraraśmipānaṃ karoti | ayamapi śrīmukhādharapānaṃ karotītyarthābhiprāyaḥ |

dhārmikādhārmikatvābhyāṃ pīḍānugrahakāriṇau |
prasiddhau hi tathācāha pārāśaryo 'tra vastuni || 2 ||
idaṃ puṇya midaṃ pāpamityetasmin padadvaye |
ācaṇḍālaṃ manuṣyāṇāmalpaṃ śāstraprayojanam || 3 ||
commentary: prasiddhimeva darśayati dhārmiketi hyantena | anugrahakāriṇi hi laukikā dhārmikaśabdaṃ prayuñjānā dṛśyante | pīḍākāriṇi cādhārmikaśabdam | yaśca dharmam ācarati sa dhārmikaḥ | tad yady anugraho dharmaḥ tad evam upapadyate nānyatheti | etad eva bhagavato vyāsasyāpy abhimatam iti darśayati tatheti prayojanamantena | nirviṣayaprayogāsambhavāt tadviṣayam idamā pratinirdiśati | tad ayam arthaḥ viśiṣṭaviṣaye puṇyapāpapadadvaye ācaṇḍālaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ vidyamāne tenaiva dharmādharmapramitisiddher anarthakaṃ śāstram iti | nanv evaṃ puṇyapāpapramāṇakau dharmādharmāvuktau na lokapramāṇakau | naivam | tatprayogasyaiva lokāyattatvāt | tasmādayam anupālambha iti ||
