root:
śaktisaṅgamasaṅkṣobhāc chaktyāveśāvasānikam |
yat sukhaṃ brahmatattvasya tat sukhaṃ svākyam ucyate || Seni 13 ||
commentary:
bhagavatsiddhāntavedānte 'pi dṛṣṭāntopalakṣitaṃ prāg uktam āha—śaktītyādi | śaktir iti lalanā | tatsaṅgamaḥ samparkaḥ | tatsaṅkṣobhaḥ sañcālanaṃ tataḥ | śaktyāveśāvasānikam iti śaktyām aṅganāyām āveṣo 'bhiniveśa uttarottaro 'nutarāgas tadavasānikaṃ tatparyantajaṃ sukhaṃ yad brahmatattvasya jñānatattvasya tat sukhaṃ svākyaṃ svakīyam ucyate | anena bolagarbhatadagrāntarālakapālasthaiḥ sāmyam ācaṣṭe |

	sakalalalanāsamudgatasuratānandakṣaye kāle |
	nodeti saṃvid anyā tāvat kaulāgamābhyudayaḥ ||

iti vacanāt ||

root:
śaktisaṅgamasaṅkṣobhāc chaktyāveśāvasānikam |
yat sukhaṃ brahmatattvasya tat sukhaṃ svākyam ucyate || Seni 13 ||
commentary:
vīryapāramitā tu kuśalotsāhasvabhāvātivispaṣṭaṃ cittam evety āha.

vacanakāyasahitasyāpi cittasya kuśalapakṣe mandapracārasya na tādṛśaṃ phalamupajāyate, yādṛśaṃ dhyānādiviṣaye paṭupravṛtter ekākino 'pi cittasya phalaṃ brahmabhūyādikam. tasmāt sā cittam eva.

root:
duḥkhānām āgamo nāsti sukhaṃ tatra nirantaram |
ānando brahmaṇo rūpaṃ tac ca mokṣe 'bhhivyajyate || SeNi 14 ||
commentary: etatsvarūpadarśanārtham āha—duḥkhānām ityādi | subodham ||

root:
duḥkhānām āgamo nāsti sukhaṃ tatra nirantaram |
ānando brahmaṇo rūpaṃ tac ca mokṣe 'bhhivyajyate || SeNi 14 ||
commentary: mukhaṃ pūritaṃ kṛtvā mahatkavalagrahaṇāt. saśabdaṃ sukasunikādiśabdena. prasṛtānanaṃ dūraṃ vidāritamukham. pralambapādaṃ bhūmyādyalagnapādaṃ khaṭvādyārohaṇe sati nāsīta. dvāv api bāhū samamekasmin kāle na mardayet. kramamardane na doṣaḥ. sati pratyaye.

root:
yad yad vai dṛśyate kiñcit tat tad brahmeti kalpayet |
tato nānyagataṃ cittaṃ brahmaṇy evāvatiṣṭhate || SeNi 15 ||
commentary: anenaiva jagadekarūpatām āha—yad yad ityādi | sugamam ||

root:
yad yad vai dṛśyate kiñcit tat tad brahmeti kalpayet |
tato nānyagataṃ cittaṃ brahmaṇy evāvatiṣṭhate || SeNi 15 ||
commentary:
ataḥ idam api prātimokṣaniṣiddhaṃ nācaraṇīyam ity āha.

kheṭasya śleṣmaṇo visarjanam apāvṛtaṃ na kuryāt. jale sthale bhogya upabhogye mūtrapurīṣāder api kutsitam. atrāpi devatādyavadhyānād apuṇyaṃ prasavet.

root:
priyādarśanam evaikaṃ kim anyair darśanāntaraiḥ |
prāpyate yena nirvāṇaṃ sarāgeṇāpi cetasā || SeNi 16 ||
commentary: anantaram etajjñānakāraṇalalanāpraśaṃsām āha—priyetyādi | priyaiva darśanaṃ dṛśyate 'nayābhimato mokṣa iti kṛtvā | śeṣaṃ subodham | etena teṣām apy anyavyākhyāparihāreṇa lalanaiva drṣṭāntanidarśanārtham abhimatety uktaṃ bhavati |

root:
priyādarśanam evaikaṃ kim anyair darśanāntaraiḥ |
prāpyate yena nirvāṇaṃ sarāgeṇāpi cetasā || SeNi 16 ||
commentary:
kutaḥ | āha—vajretyādi | neṣṭaṃ yataḥ | aniṣṭir eva kutaḥ | āha—vajragarbhe tadagre ca sātarūpākṣobhyāstitvena vajrasattvamudrāviyogāt | antarāle kapāle ca, āstāṃ tāvad vajrasattvamudrāviyogo 'dhyavasitasātasaṃvedanabhāvād grāhyādibhāvenākṣobhyamudrāyā api viyogāt | etac ca pūrvoktavajrasattvamudrāviyogata ity anuvṛtter labhyate |

tarhi tattvaṃ kutra jñeyam | tattvaṃ vittau guror mukhād iti | anena ṣoḍaśārdhārdhabindudhṛgbhagavato yatrāvasthānaṃ tad āmnāyate | tad āhuḥ—

	beṇṇi vi galle beṇṇi vi tulle |
	vājja paḍante paṃmu acchüante ||
	vājja paḍantā akhobbhaḍā paṃmu acchüantā vājja |
	kājje kāraṇa muddïa ehu so mahāsuharājja || 

etayor vajrarūpasattvarūpayor vajrasattvaśūnyatākaruṇāprajñopāyanirvāṇabhavādivyapadeśo boddhavyaḥ | ayam eva cārtha utpattikrame mahārāgād drutāpattau candrārkamadhyasthabindudvayarūpeṇordhvādhovartinā tatra tatra bhagavatā darśitaḥ | utpannas tu yathoktaḥ sekārthaḥ | pariniṣpannas tu dravād bolarūpasūryasthaḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ śūnyatākaruṇārūpo dharmadhātusvabhāva utthito bhagavān | ekapādāṅguṣṭhāsanalagnatā tu skhaladavasthākālākalitatāṃ sūcayitum ||

nanv evam—

	vajravaraṭakamadhyasthaṃ hūṃtattvaṃ vibhāvayet punaḥ ||

iti katham | atra hi vajravaraṭakasya madhyastham ity asyārthasya vighaṭanāt | na | anyārthatvād asya | tathā hi vajravaraṭakayoḥ prajñopāyavarāṅgayor madhyasthaṃ hūṃtattvam iti ha iti hetuśūnyam u ity ūhāpagatam aṃ ity apratiṣṭhitaṃ bhāvayed iti vivakṣitatvāt |

tarhi maṇer antargatam iti katham | ucyate | atrāpy anya evārthaḥ | tathā hi maṇyoḥ paṅkajakuliśayor antargatam itīdam api sustham | 

nanv etat katham avagamyate yad ubhayatrāyam artho vivakṣita iti | ucyate—

	kamalākāśe maṇivaraṭakayoḥ pīḍanasthāne |
	vajraparyaṅkataś cittaṃ maṇyantargatam īkṣayan |
	yat tad utpadyate jñānaṃ jñānaṃ tadrūpam ity alam ||

iti paramādye pravacanāt | atrāyam arthaḥ | kamalasyākāśe kamalamadhyaśūnyadeśe maṇivaraṭakayoḥ pañkajakuliśayoḥ pīḍanasthāne saṅghaṭṭanasthāne | vajraparyaṅkata iti vajrasya pari sarvato 'ṅkataḥ kroḍata iti pañcamyā vajrād bahir lagnamātraṃ vivakṣitam | cittaṃ maṇyor antargatam īkṣamāṇasya yad vijñānam utpadyate tad vijñānasvarūpam ity arthaḥ | tathā ca vajāmṛte—

	nābhimadhye sthitaṃ devi karṇikāgūḍhagocare |
	sravate śukrarūpeṇa bhagaliṅgāntare sthitam ||

iti | uktaṃ ca hevajre—

	candrāli kālimārtaṇḍa bījaṃ madhyagataṃ bhavet |

iti | tathā ca |

	yāvan no patati prabhāsvaramayaḥ śītāṃśudhārādravo 
		devīpadmadalodare samarasībhūto jinānāṃ gaṇaiḥ |
	sphūrjadvajraśikhāgrataḥ karuṇayābhinnaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ 
		tāvac chrīkaruṇābalasya sahajaṃ jānīhi rūpaṃ vibhoḥ || (1)

	yāvad vajramaṇes trivajradahane bhraśyan vidhur vāyunā 
		tiṣṭhaty abjapuṭe sukoṭarakuṭīlīnecchur asmin kṣaṇe |
	yad bhūtaṃ svaparādikalparahitaṃ vyāpārahīnaṃ mano
		jānīmaḥ sahajaṃ tad eva hi punar yuktyāgamena sphuṭam | (2) 

	prajñāpaṅkajavajrayogaparamānandāvaśeṣe sthite
		sthānasrāvaviśuddhabindur acalo yāvan mṛgāṅko mataḥ |
	tāvac cittam acañcalaṃ calamarutsrotaś ca vidhvaṃsyate 
		na śrotraṃ śṛṇute 'kṣi neṅgati mahāmudreti sā ceṣyate || (3) 

tarhi—

	nānyena kathyate sahajaṃ na kasminn api labhyate |
	ātmanā jñāyate puṇyād guruparvopasevayā ||

ity uktaṃ katham | atra guruparva vajraparva | sevākāla ity arthasaṅgatyabhāvād upasevābhāvāt | na | upaśabdena sāmīpyavācakatvena vajrād bahiḥ samīpe sevety uktam | 

tarhi—

	bolasaukhyaṃ mahāmudrā vajrāyatanam upāyakam |

iti katham | atrāpi yad bolasaukhyaṃ sā mahāmudrā | vajram eva āyatanaṃ sthānam upāyakam ity arthāsaṅgateḥ | na | bolasaukhyaṃ mahāmudrā ca vajrāyatanasthaṃ yat sa paramānandaḥ | tad upāyakam iti darśitam | kiṃ cāsmanmate—

	athāto rahasyaṃ vakṣye samāsān na tu vistarāt |
	rahasye parame 

ityādi sustham | tathā hi rahasye rahasyaṃ vakṣya iti sambandhaḥ | rahasya iti rahau vajraṃ padmamṃ ca tayor antarāle | seti sarvākāreṇa | yeti yathātathyam | ety advayam | ītīdantātītam | 

tathā coktam—

	repho vajram iti prokto hakāraḥ padmam ucyate |

iti ||

root:
tyaja dharmam adharmaṃ ca ubhe satyānṛte tyaja |
ubhe styānṛte tyaktvā yena tyajasi tat tyaja || SeNi 17 ||
commentary: itthaṃ praviṣṭasyedānīṃ sarvābhiniveśatyāgam āha—tyajetyādi | subodham ||

root:
tyaja dharmam adharmaṃ ca ubhe satyānṛte tyaja |
ubhe styānṛte tyaktvā yena tyajasi tat tyaja || SeNi 17 ||
commentary:
mahāmudrām uktvā caturānandasvarūpāṃ sarvagāṃ samayamudrām āha—yathaivetyādi | vajrācāryaprasādata iti sadgurūpadeśata ity arthaḥ | tatrāyam upadeśaḥ | mahāmudrātas tatpuruṣakāraphalarūpe saprajñe bhagavati sambhogarūpeṇotthite ā ghṛṣṭer ānandaḥ | maṇeḥ puraḥ paramaḥ | mahārāgād drutāpattau prajñopāyarūpacandrārkasampuṭasaṃlagnamadhyasthordvādhobindudvayarūpeṇa bindudvayarūpatā sahajaḥ | tad uktam—

	āi anta na majjha tahiṃ naü bhava naü nivvāṇa |
	ehu so paramamahāsuha naü para naü appāṇa ||

asya ca neyanītatayā dvividho 'rthaḥ | tatra nītārthaḥ | tasmin tathāvidhe vilakṣaṇe nirvikalpaṃ vedanam | neyārthaś ca | ǟi na prathamo bindur na | anta na antyo na | majjha tahiṃ nirantaratvān madhyābhāve madhyas tatra na | naü bhava na bhavarūpaḥ | upāyārkasaṃlagno bindur bhavaḥ | sa na tattvam | naü nivvāṇa na nirvāṇarūpaḥ prajñācandrasaṃlagnaḥ | kas tarhi | ucyate—ubhaikarasasvabhāva eṣa eva sa paramamahāsukhaḥ | nātra parasyātmano vā vittiḥ | atra ca prāg uktaḥ karmamudrāsahajavyavasthāpita iva vajrasattvādivyapadeśo jñeyaḥ | 

tataḥ pukkasyādicaturdevīgītikācodanānantaraṃ svapnaprabuddhavat sambhogarūpeṇa bhagavadutthāne sattvārthāya śuddhalaukikavikalpāmukhībhāvena yad ālocanaṃ tad viramaḥ | atrāpi "caturthaṃ tat punas tathā" iti caturthatvam | tad iti sahajopalabdham | punar iti sarvākāram | tatheti sahajavad boddhavyam iti kṛtvā | "eka eva suratānandaś catuḥsaṅkhyāvacchinnaḥ" iti vacanāt | yadā sarvam eva sahajarūpaṃ tadā samayamudrā caturānandarūpā | eka eva viramānandaḥ |

nanv atra bindurūpatayā nirākāravedanaṃ sphuṭam eva darśitam | na | tadāpy avācyasukharūpatayā sakalajagadākārasphuraṇe nirākārapratihateḥ |

tarhi bindurūpotpattiḥ kimarthaṃ karmamudropalabdhasukhavad atrāpi bhujamukhādyākāraprajñopāyātmakatāyā eva yuktatvāt | ucyate | sātabindurūpatvena mṛdākārād ghaṭākāravad āśrayaparāvṛttyā sākārakhyātyartham | yad uktam—"bhagavān bindurūpeṇāvasthitaḥ" iti |

athaivaṃ vācyam—

	saṃvṛtaṃ kundasaṅkāśaṃ vivṛtaṃ sukharūpiṇam |

iti | karmamudropalabdhaṃ saṃvṛtam aparamārtham | vivṛtam anāvṛtaṃ nirvāṇam | itthaṃ sukhaṃ bhinnam eva | tad api na | "sukhaṃ hitvā bhaven na saḥ" iti bindusukhayos tādāmyena bhinnasukhābhāvāt | etac ca—

	tasmāt saukhyaṃ na tattvākhyaṃ mahābhūtaṃ yataḥ sukham |

iti vacanāj jñeyam |

athaivaṃ matiḥ | vicitrasya bindurūpāpattyā nirākāratvam eva | tad api na saṅgacchate | nirākārābhiprāyeṇa yadīttham abhidhīyate tadā nirākārabodhasandehakāraṇaṃ bindum apahāya sātamātram eva param abhihitaṃ syāt | kim anena yathoktaprayāsabahulena binduneti | tasmān nirākāraṃ nāsty eva ||

root:
bhagavadgītāyām api—
nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ |
ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'nto hy anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ || SeNi 18 ||
commentary: catuḥkoṭirahitatā cety āha—nāsata ityādi | subodham ||

root:
bhagavadgītāyām api—
nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ |
ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'nto hy anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ || SeNi 18 ||
commentary:
evaṃ sarvathānupayogini kāye sāpekṣatāṃ nirasyann āha.

he manaḥ, anātmakam eva ātmatvena svīkṛtya māṃsāsthipuñjaṃ kāyasaṃjñakaṃ kasmāt kāraṇāt tvaṃ rakṣasi? kim evam iti cet, bhavato yadi bhinna evāyaṃ kāyaḥ. tena asyāpacaye tava kim apacīyate?

root:
kiṃ ca grāhyādiśūnyaś cec cittam akṣobhya ucyate |
bādhā svāgamato vajrasattvamudrāviyogataḥ || SeNi 19 ||
commentary:
parāgamasāmyam uktvā svāgamavirodham āha—kiṃ cetyādi | iha hi madhyamakādivicārito 'rtho mantranaye phalena devatāyogena khyāpyate | tataś ca yad yena mudryate tat tatsvabhāvaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā grāhyasya rūpādiskandhacatuṣṭayasvabhāvasya grāhyatvahānaye vairocanādayaś catvāro grāhakāḥ paratantrarūpāḥ kathyante | teṣāṃ ca mudrārthaṃ pariniṣpannarūpo grāhyagrāhakaśūnyo 'kṣobhyaś ced ucyate tad āgamoktā vajrasattvamudrā virudhyate | ratnagarbhādisthabodhicitte pariniṣpannarūpākṣobhyasadbhāvāt | vajrasattvamudrāṃ ca vinā na bauddhakṛtānto bhavatīti kathaṃ bāhyasiddhāntena na sāmyam | tathā ca kambalāmbarapādāḥ—

	sarvaḥ samānaḥ pravibhajyamānaḥ 
		sukṣmekṣikākṣāmadhiyā kṛtāntaḥ |
	bauddhasya bāhyasya vibhāgakartrī
		na syād ihaikā yadi śūnyatoktiḥ ||

	mā bhūt saṃvitpratiṣṭhānam ata eva munir bhayāt |
	bhinatti deśanādharmam uktvoktvā śūnyatātmanā ||

iti pravacanam api | 

	samastavedasiddhānāṃ kṛtānām īśvarādibhiḥ |
	bauddhānāṃ tantramantrāṇāṃ viśeṣaḥ śunyatāṃ prati ||

iti | paraparikalpitaśūnyatoktibhyas tathāgataśūnyatoktīnām abhisandhikṛto viśeṣaḥ sphuṭa iti na pratanyate ||

root:
kiṃ ca grāhyādiśūnyaś cec cittam akṣobhya ucyate |
bādhā svāgamato vajrasattvamudrāviyogataḥ || SeNi 19 ||
commentary: etad anantaraṃ duḥsekam āha—cumbanetyādi | darśanam ārabhya ghṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ yāvad bāhyakriyā vicitram | bolakakkolayogāt prabhṛti śaśino maṇeḥ pūrvaṃ yāvad āgamanaṃ ghṛṣṭis tatra vipākaḥ | ratne ruddhvā vakṣyamāṇasthānaṃ yāvad vilakṣaṇam iti ya evam āmananti te duḥsekasaṃvida iti | saṃśabdena tān upahasati ||

root:
evaṃkāraṃ namaskurmo yaś catuḥkṣaṇakāraṇam |
ānandā yatra jāyante bhedato bodhisiddhaye || SeNi 1 ||
commentary:
ihāyaṃ mahāpaṇḍitāvadhūtaśrīmanmaitreyanāthaḥ kriyācaryāyogayogottarayoganiruttaratantreṣu anuttaragurur āryanāgārjunapādakṛtacaturmudrānvayānugataṃ sekanirdeśaṃ kartukāmaḥ prathamaṃ tāvad abhidheyaṃ prastuvan pravacanānāṃ nidānavākyasya piṇḍārthasya vādibhūtaṃ prajñopāyasvabhāvam eva evaṃkāraṃ praṇamati—evaṃkāram ityādi | ekāraṃ vaṃkāraṃ ca dhvanimayam akṣaradvayaṃ dharmamudrārūpaṃ namaskurmaḥ kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ praṇamāmaḥ | kim artham | bodhisiddhaye samyaksambuddhatvaprāptaya iti pareṇa saha sambandhaḥ | mahārtho mahānuśaṃsaś cāyam evaṃkāraḥ | yad uktaṃ bhagavatā devendraparipṛcchāyām—

   ādāv evam iti proktaṃ yadarthaṃ sarvadarṣinā |
   tac chṛṇu tvaṃ surapate yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ || (1)
   dharmaskandhasahasrāṇāṃ caturaśītisaṅkhyayā |
   sarvāśrayaḥ pitā mātā dvyakṣaraṃ kathitaṃ tathā || (2)
   ekāras tu bhaven mātā vakāras tu pitā smṛtaḥ |
   bindus tatra bhaved yogaḥ sa yogaḥ paramādbhutaḥ || (3)
   ekāraḥ padmam ity uktaṃ vakāro vajram eva ca |
   bindus tatra bhaved bījaṃ tatprabhūtaṃ jagattrayam || (4)
   ekāras tu bhavet prajñā vakāraḥ suratādhipaḥ |
   binduś cānāhataṃ tattvaṃ tajjātāny akṣarāṇi ca || (5)
   yo vijānāti tattvajño dharmamudrākṣaradvayam |
   sa bhavet sarvasattvānāṃ dharmacakrapravartakaḥ || (6)
   yo 'viditvā paṭhen nityam akṣaradvitayaṃ janaḥ |
   sa bāhyo buddhadharmāṇāṃ dhanivad bhogavarjitaḥ || (7) 
   evaṃ dvir akṣaraṃ māyā sarvajño 'tra vyavasthitaḥ |
   ādau saddharmaśāstrāṇāṃ tadarthaṃ pratigīyate || (8)
   tasmāt surādhipaḥ śakro yadīcchec chāśvataṃ padam |
   saddharmo gurukartavyaḥ smara māyādvir akṣaram || (9) 

iti | prastutam abhidheyaṃ tatkāraṇatayā viśinaṣṭi—yaś catuḥkṣaṇakāraṇam iti | caturṇāṃ vicitravipākavimardavilakṣaṇākhyānāṃ kṣaṇānāṃ yaḥ kāraṇaṃ hetuḥ | evaṃkāro hi dharmamudrāsvabhāvaḥ | dharmamudrā ca bhāvyamānā savāsanakleśān apanayati | tadapanayabhedanibandhanaś ca kṣaṇabhedaḥ | ataḥ kṣaṇānām evaṃkāraḥ kāraṇam | punas tathaiva viśinaṣṭi—ānandā yatra jāyante bhedata iti | yasmin saty eva prajñopāyātmake mārgajñāna ānandaparamaviramasahajākhyā ānandāḥ kṣaṇabhedena bhedato 'saṅkīrṇā jāyante | tato yaś catuḥkṣaṇakāraṇam, yasmin saty evānandā bhedato jāyante, tam evaṃkāraṃ bodhisiddhaye namaskurma iti samudāyārthaḥ | dhvanimayo vyākhyātaḥ ||

adhunā lipirūpo vyākhyāyate | gurūpadeśato likhitaivaṃkārākṣarasaṃsthānam evaṃkāraṃ dharmodayāsvabhāvaṃ namaskurmaḥ | yadvopasargakṣayād evamākāram evaṃkāraṃ sarvabuddhakaraṇḍakaṃ dharmodayāmudrāṃ namaskurmaḥ | evamākṛtir dharmodayeti bhagavataiva varṇitam—

   ekārākṛti yad divyaṃ madhye vaṃkārabhūṣitam |
   ālayaḥ sarvasaukhyānāṃ buddharatnakaraṇḍakam || 

iti | 
	
nanu kim anayā namaskṛtayā | ata āha—yaś catuḥkṣaṇakāraṇam iti | catuḥkṣaṇānāṃ vicitravipākavimardavilakṣaṇānāṃ kāraṇaṃ hetuḥ | hetutā ca vicitrasyāpi ghṛṣṭiparyantatvāt | tatra ca pravacanavistara iti vakṣyāmaḥ | hetau ca namaskriyā phalādhimokṣataḥ | tad uktam—

	hetutattvaṃ yathā dṛṣṭaṃ phalatattvaṃ tad eva hi | 

iti | aparaṃ ca namaskārakāraṇam āha—ānandā yatra jāyante bhedata iti | ānandaparamaviramasahajākhyā ānandā bhedataḥ parasparam asaṅkīrṇā yasmin jāyante | janikartuḥ prakṛtir iti pañcamīprāptau yatreti saptamīnirdeśād ādhāratvaṃ vivakṣitam | tato jāyante yatra pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti | tathā hi—

   kṣaṇajñānāt sukhaṃ jñānam evaṃkāre pratiṣṭhitam || 

tathā—

   saṃvaraṃ sarvabuddhānām evaṃkāre pratiṣṭhitam | 

tathā—

   oṃ padma sukhādhāra mahārāgasukhaṃdada |
   caturānandabhāg viśva hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ kāryaṃ kuruṣva me || 

iti | ādhāre ca namaskriyā—

   yatra sthitāś caṅkramitā niṣaṇṇāś ca tathāgatāḥ |
   kalpitāḥ siṃhaśayyāś ca tān deśān praṇamāmy aham || 

iti pravacanāt | kimarthaṃ namaskurmaḥ | bodhisiddhaye yathābhūtaparijñānasiddhaye samyaksambuddhatvāyeti yāvat ||

root:
evaṃkāraṃ namaskurmo yaś catuḥkṣaṇakāraṇam |
ānandā yatra jāyante bhedato bodhisiddhaye || SeNi 1 ||
commentary:
idam aparaṃ tadvayatireke dūṣaṇam āha.

bahavo 'pi bahuśrutāḥ tathā śraddhāvanto yatnaparāḥ śikṣāyām ādarakāriṇaḥ asaṃprajanyadoṣeṇa āpattikaluṣitā bhavanti kāyacittapracārāpratyavekṣaṇāt.

root:
kimarthaṃ niyamenaitad deśakair atha deśyate |
idaṃ tathāgatāśvāsadhiyā pūrvaṃ prakāsyate || SeNi 20 ||
commentary: yady evaṃ kimarthaṃ tarhīdaṃ deśyate | ata āha—kimartham ityādi | tathāgatasyāśvāsas tathāgatāśvāsaḥ | tathāgataś ca vairocanaḥ | tasyopalakṣaṇārthatvena ratnasambhavādigrahaṇād ratnasambhavāmitābhāmoghasiddhayo gṛhyante | teśām āśvāso 'kṣobhyamudritānāṃ vijñānīkaraṇam | taddhiyā tadbuddhyā ||

root:
kimarthaṃ niyamenaitad deśakair atha deśyate |
idaṃ tathāgatāśvāsadhiyā pūrvaṃ prakāsyate || SeNi 20 ||
commentary:
aparam api tadabhāve dūṣaṇam āha.

asaṃprajanyam eva saṃprajanyābhāvaḥ kleśasvabhāvaś cauraḥ, kuśaladhanāpaharaṇāt. tena smṛtimoṣānusāriṇā rakṣapālabhūtāyāḥ smṛteḥ pramoṣam abhāvam anusṛtya muṣitā viluptakuśaladhanāḥ santaḥ upacityāpi puṇyāni kuśaladhanānāṃ saṃcayaṃ kṛtvāpi durgatiparāyaṇā bhavanti.

root:
bolagarbhe ca sākāraṃ nirākāraṃ tadagrataḥ |
madhyamāṃ varṇayanty eke neti no gurudarśanam || SeNi 21 ||
commentary: idānīṃ yatra yatra sthāne yo yo vādī bhavati tad darśayati—boletyādi | bolagarbhe sākāraṃ tadagrato nirākāram | yadvā tadagrataḥ sākāraṃ tadgarbhe nirākāram | ittham eva ca yan madhyamāvarṇanaṃ tad asmadgurūṇāṃ na darśanam ||

root:
bolagarbhe ca sākāraṃ nirākāraṃ tadagrataḥ |
madhyamāṃ varṇayanty eke neti no gurudarśanam || SeNi 21 ||
commentary:
adhunā ye karmamudrāyāṃ tathāgatāśvāsaṃ vajradharāśvāsam eva vā jñātvā santuṣṭā bhavanti tan nirākaraṇārtham āha—mahāmudrām ityādi | āmnāyena guruparamparayā yat tattvaṃ tato dviṣṭāḥ karmamudraiva tattvaṃ na dharmamudrādikam ity anuttarasambuddhadharmapratikṣepād yogino rauravaṃ yānti | rauravaśabdasyopalakṣaṇenānye 'py avīcyādayo nirayā grāhyāḥ | rauravādinirayagamanaṃ ca saddharmapratikṣepasaṃvartanīyam āryāṣṭasahasrikādisūtrāntādiṣu sphuṭam iti na pratanyate || 

nanu karmamudraiva tattvaṃ na bhavati kutaḥ |

	karmudrāṃ śaṭhāṃ krūrāṃ pāpiyasīm atibhīṣaṇāṃ |
									dūrataḥ parivarjayet ||

iti | tathā—

	naśvarī mānuṣī prajñā sukhaṃ tasyā viniśvaram |

ityāditantrapāṭhāt | 

	adṛṣṭaparamānandaḥ strīsukhaṃ bahumanyate |

iti pāṭhāc ca | 

	yathā darpaṇārpitaṃ mukhasya pratibimbaṃ mukhaṃ na bhavati | na pūrvasiddhaṃ nāpy adhunā siddhim | tad eva mukhapratibimbaṃ sādṛśyamātram āpādayati | tathāpi lokāḥ svamukhaṃ dṛṣṭam iti kṛtvā bhrāntyā santuṣṭā bhavanti | tathaivācāryāḥ kumatayaḥ prajñājñānam āsādya sahajam anubhūtam iti kṛtvā santoṣam utpādayanti | santuṣṭāś ca santo dharmamudrāyā vārttām api na jānanti |

ityādi caturmudrānvaya āryanāgārjunapādokteś ca |

	kecid dvayendriyajaṃ saukhyaṃ tattvam āhur narādhamāḥ |
	tac cāpi mahāsukhaṃ naiva pravadanti jinottamāḥ ||

nanv evam anekatantroktāyāḥ karmamudrāyāḥ pratikṣepād bhavato 'pi nirayagamanam āgatya militam | na | tasyāḥ prādhānyena tattvarūpatāmātram āgamoktyā dūṣitam | tadupayogas tu "karmamudrāṃ samāsādya" ityādinā kāraṇarūpatāpradarśanena khyāpita iti | kutas tatra pratikṣepa ity alaṃ bahunā | śeṣaṃ subodham ||

root:
vajragarbhe tadagre vā patitaṃ vā kapālake |
na ceṣṭam antarāle 'pi tattvaṃ vittau guror mukhāt || SeNi 22 ||
commentary:
kutaḥ | āha—vajretyādi | neṣṭaṃ yataḥ | aniṣṭir eva kutaḥ | āha—vajragarbhe tadagre ca sātarūpākṣobhyāstitvena vajrasattvamudrāviyogāt | antarāle kapāle ca, āstāṃ tāvad vajrasattvamudrāviyogo 'dhyavasitasātasaṃvedanabhāvād grāhyādibhāvenākṣobhyamudrāyā api viyogāt | etac ca pūrvoktavajrasattvamudrāviyogata ity anuvṛtter labhyate |

tarhi tattvaṃ kutra jñeyam | tattvaṃ vittau guror mukhād iti | anena ṣoḍaśārdhārdhabindudhṛgbhagavato yatrāvasthānaṃ tad āmnāyate | tad āhuḥ—

	beṇṇi vi galle beṇṇi vi tulle |
	vājja paḍante paṃmu acchüante ||
	vājja paḍantā akhobbhaḍā paṃmu acchüantā vājja |
	kājje kāraṇa muddïa ehu so mahāsuharājja || 

etayor vajrarūpasattvarūpayor vajrasattvaśūnyatākaruṇāprajñopāyanirvāṇabhavādivyapadeśo boddhavyaḥ | ayam eva cārtha utpattikrame mahārāgād drutāpattau candrārkamadhyasthabindudvayarūpeṇordhvādhovartinā tatra tatra bhagavatā darśitaḥ | utpannas tu yathoktaḥ sekārthaḥ | pariniṣpannas tu dravād bolarūpasūryasthaḥ prajñopāyātmakaḥ śūnyatākaruṇārūpo dharmadhātusvabhāva utthito bhagavān | ekapādāṅguṣṭhāsanalagnatā tu skhaladavasthākālākalitatāṃ sūcayitum ||

nanv evam—

	vajravaraṭakamadhyasthaṃ hūṃtattvaṃ vibhāvayet punaḥ ||

iti katham | atra hi vajravaraṭakasya madhyastham ity asyārthasya vighaṭanāt | na | anyārthatvād asya | tathā hi vajravaraṭakayoḥ prajñopāyavarāṅgayor madhyasthaṃ hūṃtattvam iti ha iti hetuśūnyam u ity ūhāpagatam aṃ ity apratiṣṭhitaṃ bhāvayed iti vivakṣitatvāt |

tarhi maṇer antargatam iti katham | ucyate | atrāpy anya evārthaḥ | tathā hi maṇyoḥ paṅkajakuliśayor antargatam itīdam api sustham | 

nanv etat katham avagamyate yad ubhayatrāyam artho vivakṣita iti | ucyate—

	kamalākāśe maṇivaraṭakayoḥ pīḍanasthāne |
	vajraparyaṅkataś cittaṃ maṇyantargatam īkṣayan |
	yat tad utpadyate jñānaṃ jñānaṃ tadrūpam ity alam ||

iti paramādye pravacanāt | atrāyam arthaḥ | kamalasyākāśe kamalamadhyaśūnyadeśe maṇivaraṭakayoḥ pañkajakuliśayoḥ pīḍanasthāne saṅghaṭṭanasthāne | vajraparyaṅkata iti vajrasya pari sarvato 'ṅkataḥ kroḍata iti pañcamyā vajrād bahir lagnamātraṃ vivakṣitam | cittaṃ maṇyor antargatam īkṣamāṇasya yad vijñānam utpadyate tad vijñānasvarūpam ity arthaḥ | tathā ca vajāmṛte—

	nābhimadhye sthitaṃ devi karṇikāgūḍhagocare |
	sravate śukrarūpeṇa bhagaliṅgāntare sthitam ||

iti | uktaṃ ca hevajre—

	candrāli kālimārtaṇḍa bījaṃ madhyagataṃ bhavet |

iti | tathā ca |

	yāvan no patati prabhāsvaramayaḥ śītāṃśudhārādravo 
		devīpadmadalodare samarasībhūto jinānāṃ gaṇaiḥ |
	sphūrjadvajraśikhāgrataḥ karuṇayābhinnaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ 
		tāvac chrīkaruṇābalasya sahajaṃ jānīhi rūpaṃ vibhoḥ || (1)

	yāvad vajramaṇes trivajradahane bhraśyan vidhur vāyunā 
		tiṣṭhaty abjapuṭe sukoṭarakuṭīlīnecchur asmin kṣaṇe |
	yad bhūtaṃ svaparādikalparahitaṃ vyāpārahīnaṃ mano
		jānīmaḥ sahajaṃ tad eva hi punar yuktyāgamena sphuṭam | (2) 

	prajñāpaṅkajavajrayogaparamānandāvaśeṣe sthite
		sthānasrāvaviśuddhabindur acalo yāvan mṛgāṅko mataḥ |
	tāvac cittam acañcalaṃ calamarutsrotaś ca vidhvaṃsyate 
		na śrotraṃ śṛṇute 'kṣi neṅgati mahāmudreti sā ceṣyate || (3) 

tarhi—

	nānyena kathyate sahajaṃ na kasminn api labhyate |
	ātmanā jñāyate puṇyād guruparvopasevayā ||

ity uktaṃ katham | atra guruparva vajraparva | sevākāla ity arthasaṅgatyabhāvād upasevābhāvāt | na | upaśabdena sāmīpyavācakatvena vajrād bahiḥ samīpe sevety uktam | 

tarhi—

	bolasaukhyaṃ mahāmudrā vajrāyatanam upāyakam |

iti katham | atrāpi yad bolasaukhyaṃ sā mahāmudrā | vajram eva āyatanaṃ sthānam upāyakam ity arthāsaṅgateḥ | na | bolasaukhyaṃ mahāmudrā ca vajrāyatanasthaṃ yat sa paramānandaḥ | tad upāyakam iti darśitam | kiṃ cāsmanmate—

	athāto rahasyaṃ vakṣye samāsān na tu vistarāt |
	rahasye parame 

ityādi sustham | tathā hi rahasye rahasyaṃ vakṣya iti sambandhaḥ | rahasya iti rahau vajraṃ padmamṃ ca tayor antarāle | seti sarvākāreṇa | yeti yathātathyam | ety advayam | ītīdantātītam | 

tathā coktam—

	repho vajram iti prokto hakāraḥ padmam ucyate |

iti ||

root:
vajragarbhe tadagre vā patitaṃ vā kapālake |
na ceṣṭam antarāle 'pi tattvaṃ vittau guror mukhāt || SeNi 22 ||
commentary: evaṃ kathitanayena. sādhūktam iti cet, adhunā vada kasmāt tvam adyāpi sarvaguṇavikalam api kāyaṃ rakṣasi? evaṃ vidvān api.

root:
vicitraṃ vividhaṃ khyātam ityādi susthitaṃ katham |
maṇyantargatam ityādi sadguroḥ suṣṭhu saṅgatam || SeNi 23 ||
commentary:
idānīṃ vicitrasusthāpanārtham āha—vicitram ityādi | sadguror ityādinā

	vicitraṃ vividhaṃ khyātam āliṅganacumbanādikam || 

ity uddeśāt | atra hy ādigrahaṇād gṛṣṭiparyantaṃ vicitraṃ vivakṣitam |

nanu ghṛṣṭiparyantam iti katham gamyate |

	bāhubhyāṃ ca samāliṅgya prajñāṃ vai ṣoḍaśābdikām |
	ghaṇṭhāvajrasamāyogād ācāryasecanaṃ matam || 

iti nirdeśāt | atra ghaṇṭhāvajrasamāyogaḥ padmavajrasparśo vivakṣitaḥ | 

nanv ayam ācāryasekaḥ | ādāv ācāryaś ca vicitram iti kuto jñeyaḥ |

	ānandādyāḥ kramaśo jñeyāś catuḥsecanasaṅkhyayā || 

iti pratinirdeśāt | atrānandādyāś catvāraḥ—

	ācārya guhya prajñā ca caturthaṃ tat punas tathā | 

iti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ jñeyāḥ | ānandaś ca vicitra eva kṣaṇa iti ghṛṣṭiparyantaṃ vicitram |

	vipākaṃ tadviparyāsaṃ sukhaṃ jñānasya bhuñjanam || 

ity uddeśān maṇyagraṃ yāvat paramaḥ sukharūpatvāt paramasya | 

nanv etat katham | 

	paramānande tu samprāpte nānātvavarjite kṣaṇe |
	śāstā brūyān mahāsattva dhāraṇīyaṃ mahat sukham || 

iti nirdeśāt | atraiva nānātvavarjite kṣana ityādy arthasadbhāvād iti sarvasustham | maṇyantargatam ityādi ca gatārtham | 

yadi ghṛṣṭiparyantam ānandaḥ sa cācāryo maṇeḥ puraḥ paramaḥ sa ca guhyas tarhi—

	hasitaśuddhyā tv ācārya īkṣaṇe guhyakas tathā |
	prajñā pāṇyavāpatau tu tat punar dvandvatantrake || 

iti katham | bāhyotpattyā tan neyam | tarhy udakābhiṣekādīnām ācāryatoktā yā sā katham | sāpi bāhyotpattyā jñeyā | tathāgatāśvāsānande cācāryatā gambhīrotpattyā vajradharāśvāsānadne cotpannena | caturmudrāpakṣe ca pariniṣpannenācāryatvena karmudrā boddhavyā ||

root:
vicitraṃ vividhaṃ khyātam ityādi susthitaṃ katham |
maṇyantargatam ityādi sadguroḥ suṣṭhu saṅgatam || SeNi 23 ||
commentary:
tatprasaṅgena anyad api darśayann āha.

samādānena kriyamāṇam. abhiniveśotthaṃ tīvraprasādajanitam. pratipakṣotthaṃ kleśapratipakṣaśūnyatādibhāvanāprasūtam. guṇakṣetraṃ buddhabodhisattvādi. upakārikṣetraṃ mātāpitādi. duḥkhitā glānādayaḥ. eteṣu svalpamati kṛtam aprameyaśubhahetur upajāyate.

root:
hasitādiviśuddhyā yad ācāryādi samīhitam |
utpattyā tad vyavastheyaṃ na cotpannasvabhāvataḥ || SeNi 24 ||
commentary: nanu ṣaṇṇāṃ kalaśābhiṣekatāpy uktā sarvatra kalaśavyāpārāt | sā tarhi katham | kalaśaśabdasya payodharopalakṣaṇatvena payodharavyāpārād atrāpi sā ghaṭate | tad etat sarvaṃ darśayati—hastetyādi | gatārtham ||

root:
hasitādiviśuddhyā yad ācāryādi samīhitam |
utpattyā tad vyavastheyaṃ na cotpannasvabhāvataḥ || SeNi 24 ||
commentary:
idam aparaṃ tadvayatireke dūṣaṇam āha.

bahavo 'pi bahuśrutāḥ tathā śraddhāvanto yatnaparāḥ śikṣāyām ādarakāriṇaḥ asaṃprajanyadoṣeṇa āpattikaluṣitā bhavanti kāyacittapracārāpratyavekṣaṇāt.

root:
citratvāc citram ā ghṛṣṭeḥ sukhāt pāko maṇeḥ puraḥ |
guros tattvaṃ vijānīyād vimardād viratau ramaḥ || SeNi 25 ||
commentary:
idānīṃ ānandacatuṣṭayavyavasthām āha—citratvād ityādi | citratvād grāhyagrāhakasadbhāvāc citram ānanda ā ghṛṣṭer ghṛṣṭiparyantam | ghṛṣṭiś ca bodhicittasya maṇisamīpaṃ yāvat sparśaḥ | "etac ca maṇeḥ puraḥ parama" ity ukter labhyate | sukhān nirbharasukhasadbhāvāt pākaḥ paramo maṇeḥ puro ratnāgraṃ yāvat | guros tattvam iti ca gatārtham | ramo viramo viratau bodhicittapāte vimardāt sukhaṃ buktaṃ mayeti cālocanāt | ayaṃ ca viramaś caturthaṃ tat punas tatheti tat prajñājñānaṃ prakṛtisvabhāvam punar vikārarūpapratītyasmutpādātmakam | tathā tenaiva prakāreṇa pūrvavaj jñāyamānaṃ saccaturthaṃ bhavati |

ete ca bāhyāṅganāyāṃ karmamudrāyāṃ catvāraṃ ānandāś caturmudrāvyavasthitāv eka ānandas tātsthyāt karmamudrā bhaṇyate | atra ca nirākārādivyavasthā haṭhasekaprastāvokteva jñeyā ||

root:
citratvāc citram ā ghṛṣṭeḥ sukhāt pāko maṇeḥ puraḥ |
guros tattvaṃ vijānīyād vimardād viratau ramaḥ || SeNi 25 ||
commentary: tasmād evam upastambhamātraṃ datvā, kāye naubuddhiṃ kṛtvā, pravṛttinivṛttihetor icchāyattaṃ kāyaṃ kuru sattvārthānuṣṭhānāya niṣpattaye vā. he manaḥ iti prakṛtam abhisaṃbadhyate.

root:
karmamudrāṃ samāsādya dharmamudrāṃ vibhāvayet |
tasyā ūrdhvaṃ mahāmudrā yasyāḥ samayasambhavaḥ || SeNi 26 ||
commentary:
idānīṃ hetuphalavyavasthām āha—karmamudrām ityādi | karmaṇaḥ kāyavākcittavyāpārasya sahajarūpatayā mudrā aṅkaś cihnaṃ karmamudrā | tadādhāratayopacārād upalakṣaṇārthena lalanaivocyate | karmamudrāṃ ca prāpya yat prajñājñānaṃ prakṛtirūpam upavarṇitaṃ tad api vastuto vikṛtirūpam eva kevalaṃ sahajachāyānukārīti sahajam iti niṣyandaphalam ucyate | itthaṃ niṣyande vicitram ity ānanda eva |

tato dharmāṇāṃ nīlapītādīnāṃ pañcākārābhisambodhyā prathamaṃ devatāviśodhitānāṃ grāhyatvādir ahitatayā paramānandaikasundaropāyabhūtā dharmadhātusvabhāvā vicārāgatāpratiṣṭhānarūpā yā sā dharmamudrā | īyaṃ ca mahāmudrāyāḥ sannikṛṣṭakāraṇatvena mārgatayā viśiṣṭapākatvād vipākaphalam | tasmiṃś ca vipākakṣaṇe paramānandaḥ |

tato mudrātrayamudraṇān mahatī cāsau mudrā ceti vicārāgatāpratiṣṭhānarūpamārgajñānasya sādaranirantarābhyāsena sākṣātkṛtā niḥsvabhāvā jñeyādyāvaraṇavivarjitā sakalasampadādhārabhūtā bhavanirvāṇaikasvarūpā, anālambanamahākaruṇāśarīramahāsukhaikarūpā mahāmudrā | iyaṃ ca sarvāvaraṇāpagamād vaimalyaphalam | tasmiṃś ca vilakṣaṇakṣaṇe sahajānandaḥ | 

tato 'pi samayaḥ saṅketaḥ sattvārthāya sambhoganirmāṇasvabhāvaherukādyākāreṇa vajradharasya vikurvaṇaṃ yat sā samayamudrā | iyaṃ ca puruṣakāraphalam | tatra vimarde virmānandaḥ | 

tatra mudrāṇāṃ pūrvapūrvāpekṣayā hetutvam | uttarottarāpekṣayā ca phalatvam |

root:
karmamudrāṃ samāsādya dharmamudrāṃ vibhāvayet |
tasyā ūrdhvaṃ mahāmudrā yasyāḥ samayasambhavaḥ || SeNi 26 ||
commentary: etatsvarūpadarśanārtham āha—duḥkhānām ityādi | subodham ||

root:
ānandāḥ pratimudraṃ syur mahāmudrāṃ vinā punaḥ |
āgamāc ca svasaṃvitteḥ sadguror upadeśataḥ || SeNi 27 ||
commentary:
adhunā pratyekaṃ mudrāṇāṃ caturānandasvabhāvatām āha—ānandā ityādi | mudrāṃ mudrāṃ pratyānandāś catvāro mahāmudrāṃ vihāya jñeyāḥ | etadartham eva cāgamād ityādinā hetutrayam āha | tathā hy āgamaḥ—

	vicitre prathamānandaḥ paramānando vipākake |
	viramānando vimarde ca sahajānando vilakṣaṇe || 

ityādinā hevajrādiṣu vicitrādīnām ānandāditvam uktam | tataś ca yatraiva vicitrādisambhavas tatraivānandādivyavasthā | tatsambhavaś ca mudrātraya eva na mahāmudrāyām | ayaṃ cārthaḥ svasaṃvedanarūpaḥ sphuṭa eva | sadgurūpadeśaś ca vicitretyādivakṣyamāṇa iti ||

root:
ānandāḥ pratimudraṃ syur mahāmudrāṃ vinā punaḥ |
āgamāc ca svasaṃvitteḥ sadguror upadeśataḥ || SeNi 27 ||
commentary:
mārge 'pi tathādṛṣṭer gacchata upaghātaparihārārtham āha.

bhayahetucaurādipratipattyarthaṃ caturdiśam iti krameṇa. anyathātmabhāvasya rakṣā kṛtā na syāt. sarvadigvyavalokanaṃ tu kriyamāṇam auddhatyopaghātaparihārārthaṃ sthitvā kartavyam. pṛṣṭhato vyavalokanaṃ parāvṛtya paścān mukhībhūya.

root:
vicitraṃ karmamudrāto vipāko jagadātmatā |
sthairyaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ tatra vimardo jagadīkṣaṇam || SeNi 28 ||
commentary: caturānandasvabhāvā kāyikī karmamudroktaiva | vācasīṃ dharmamudrāṃ caturānandasvabhāvām āha—vicitram ityādi | karmamudrāto nimittāt sadgurūpadeśena vacasā pratīyamānā jagadātmatā citrollekhatvād vicitram | saiva ca bhāvanayā nirvedhābhimukhyā citrollekhāpagamād vipākaḥ | tatra jagadātmatāyāṃ bhāvanāprakarṣād yad anullekhasya sthairyaṃ tad vilakṣaṇam | itthaṃ sarvākāravaropetaśūnyatākhyajagadātmatāyāṃ sthairye 'pi bhāvakasya yogino 'pratiṣṭhānādhimokṣeṇa tathaiva vyavaharamāṇasya yaj jagadīkṣaṇam ālocanaṃ sa vimardaḥ | eṣu vicitrādiṣv ānandacatuṣṭayaṃ kramato yojyam | atrāpi "caturthaṃ tat punas tatheti" caturthaṃ pūrvavat | yadā "eka eva suratānandaś catuḥsaṅkhyāvicchinnaḥ" iti vacanāt sarvaṃ sahajarūpaṃ tadā dharmamudrā caturānandarūpaika eva paramānandaḥ ||

root:
vicitraṃ karmamudrāto vipāko jagadātmatā |
sthairyaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ tatra vimardo jagadīkṣaṇam || SeNi 28 ||
commentary:
parāgamasāmyam uktvā svāgamavirodham āha—kiṃ cetyādi | iha hi madhyamakādivicārito 'rtho mantranaye phalena devatāyogena khyāpyate | tataś ca yad yena mudryate tat tatsvabhāvaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā grāhyasya rūpādiskandhacatuṣṭayasvabhāvasya grāhyatvahānaye vairocanādayaś catvāro grāhakāḥ paratantrarūpāḥ kathyante | teṣāṃ ca mudrārthaṃ pariniṣpannarūpo grāhyagrāhakaśūnyo 'kṣobhyaś ced ucyate tad āgamoktā vajrasattvamudrā virudhyate | ratnagarbhādisthabodhicitte pariniṣpannarūpākṣobhyasadbhāvāt | vajrasattvamudrāṃ ca vinā na bauddhakṛtānto bhavatīti kathaṃ bāhyasiddhāntena na sāmyam | tathā ca kambalāmbarapādāḥ—

	sarvaḥ samānaḥ pravibhajyamānaḥ 
		sukṣmekṣikākṣāmadhiyā kṛtāntaḥ |
	bauddhasya bāhyasya vibhāgakartrī
		na syād ihaikā yadi śūnyatoktiḥ ||

	mā bhūt saṃvitpratiṣṭhānam ata eva munir bhayāt |
	bhinatti deśanādharmam uktvoktvā śūnyatātmanā ||

iti pravacanam api | 

	samastavedasiddhānāṃ kṛtānām īśvarādibhiḥ |
	bauddhānāṃ tantramantrāṇāṃ viśeṣaḥ śunyatāṃ prati ||

iti | paraparikalpitaśūnyatoktibhyas tathāgataśūnyatoktīnām abhisandhikṛto viśeṣaḥ sphuṭa iti na pratanyate ||

root:
sarvasminn apratiṣṭhānaṃ mahāmudreti kīrtyate |
vimalatvāt svasaṃvitter vicitrāder na sambhavaḥ || SeNi 29 ||
commentary:
dharmamudrām uktvā sahajānandaikasvabhāvāṃ mānasīṃ mahāmudrām āha—sarvasminn ityādi | sarvasminn iti pratītyasamputpannaskandhadhātvāyatanādau | apratiṣṭhānam amanasikāro 'nāropaḥ | tad uktaṃ pravacane—"amanasikārā dharmāḥ kuśalā manasikārā dharmā akuśalāḥ" | tathā—

		avikalpitasaṅkalpa apratiṣṭhitamānasa |
		asmṛty amanasikāra nirālamba namo 'stu te || 

iti | atra jvaraharatakṣakacūḍāratnālaṅkāropadeśavad aśakyānuṣṭhānatā ca na mantavyā | sadgurupādaprasādenāvaśyaṃ sarvākāravaropetalakṣaṇamahāmudrāyāḥ pratyakṣīkartuṃ śakyatvāt |

nanv atra kathaṃ na catuḥkṣaṇarūpatā | āha—vimalatvāt svasaṃvitter nirmalatayā vicitrādeḥ kṣaṇatrayasya samalasya nātra sambhavaḥ | tato nānandatrayasambhavaḥ |

root:
sarvasminn apratiṣṭhānaṃ mahāmudreti kīrtyate |
vimalatvāt svasaṃvitter vicitrāder na sambhavaḥ || SeNi 29 ||
commentary:
evam ātmabhāvādīnām utsargaṃ rakṣāṃ ca pratipādya punar vistareṇa rakṣāśodhanavardhanāni pratipādayitum upakramate. utpāditabodhicittena hi bodhisattvena utsṛṣṭasyāpi cātmabhāvasya rakṣāśodhanavardhanāni kāryāṇi. yasmāt-

	paribhogāya sattvānām ātmabhāvādi dīyate |
	arakṣite kuto bhogaḥ kiṃ dattaṃ yan na bhujyate ||

	tasmāt sattvopabhogārtham ātmabhāvādi pālayet |
	kalyāṇamitrānutsargāt sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadekṣaṇāt || (Sikṣāsamuccaya 5-6)

tac ca ātmabhāvādiparipālanādi śikṣārakṣaṇād eva syāt. anyathā narakādivinipātagamanāt tan na syāt. ata idam abhidhīyate.

śikṣyate upādīyate gṛhītasaṃvaraṇeneti vihiteṣu karaṇīyatā, pratiṣiddheṣv akaraṇaṃ śikṣā, tāṃ rakṣituṃ paripālayituṃ kāmena icchatā bodhisattvena ātmacittaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ prayatnata iti kathayiṣyamāṇāt. atha śikṣārakṣaṇādhikāre kim iti cittaṃ rakṣyata ity āha—na śikṣeti. anyathā śikṣaiva rakṣitumaśakyā calam anāyattaṃ cittam arakṣatā. cittasya calatāyāṃ śikṣāyāḥ sthairyāyogāt.

root:
citraṃ tato vipākaḥ syāt tṛtīye tu vilakṣaṇam |
vimardaś ca tato jñeyo haṭhayoganirākṛteḥ || SeNi 2 ||
commentary:
catuḥkṣaṇakāraṇam iti namaskārahetur uktaḥ | tatra ke te catuḥkṣaṇāḥ | kīdṛśī ca tatparipāṭiḥ | ata āha—citram ityādi |

nanu tantroktakramam ullaṅghya kim iti tṛtīye vilakṣaṇam iṣyate | tadartham āha—haṭhayoganirākṛteḥ | tatrāyaṃ haṭhayogaḥ—vicitraṃ vividhaṃ grāhyagrāhakabhāvād āliṅganādau | vipākas tadviparīto 'vicitro grāhyābhāvāt sukho jñānabhogo ghṛṣṭau | vimardo nirvikalpaṃ darśanaṃ sukhaṃ ratnaṃ vyāpyāgraṃ yāvat | anyad vilakṣaṇaṃ rāgavarjitaṃ nirbharasukhābhāvāt | arāgavarjitaṃ sukhānubhavasmaraṇena virāgābhāvāt pāte | yad uktam—

   vicitraṃ vividhaṃ khyātam āliṅganacumbanādikam |
   vipākaṃ tadviparyāsaṃ sukhaṃ jñānasya bhuñjanam ||
   vimardam ālocanaṃ proktaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti ca |
   vilakṣaṇaṃ tribhyo 'nyad rāgārāgavivarjitam || 

iti | idaṃ nirākāravādimatena ratnānubhūtaṃ śaradamalamadhyāhnagaganāyamānaṃ samatalaṃ sātasaṃvinmātraṃ sarvanīlādyākāracakrakalaṅkāpagamād avatiṣṭhate | ākārabādhakaṃ tv ekānekaviyogādipramāṇaṃ vistarabhayān na vipañcitam | yad āhuḥ—

   tasmān nārtheṣu na jñāne sthūlābhāsas tadātmanaḥ |
   ekatra pratiṣiddhatvād bahuṣv api na sambhavaḥ ||
   paricchedo 'ntaranyo 'yaṃ bhāgo bahir iva sthitaḥ |
   jñānasyābhedino bhedapratibhāso hy upaplavaḥ || 

iti | idam eva dharmakāyaḥ | tatpṛṣṭhe maṇḍalacakrādyākāraṃ jñānaṃ sambhogaḥ | bhūtabhautikaḥ śākyamunyādyākāro nirmāṇam | eṣām ekasvabhāvatā svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ | evaṃ vimardo dharmaḥ | vipākaḥ sambhogaḥ | vicitraṃ nirmāṇam | vilakṣaṇaḥ svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ | yad uktam—"rūpakāyau tu paścimau"  iti |

"tāvad bhāvayed yāvad anupalabdhikaṃ kuryād" ity ukte etad eva dṛṣṭāntalakṣitaṃ sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsena bhāvyamāno maṇḍalacakrādyākāro niṣpādayiṣyati, pūrvapraṇidhānavaśāt sambhoganirmāṇakāyāv iti |

yadvā sātam idam anubhūtaṃ sādarādibhāvanayā sphuṭatāṃ svayam eṣyati | yad āhuḥ—

   tasmād bhūtam abhūtaṃ vā yad yad evātibhāvyate |
   bhāvanābalaniṣpattau tat sphuṭākalpadhīphalam || 

iti | atrāpi pūrvapraṇidhānāvedhavaśād rūpakāyadvayam | ayam eva ca praveśopāyaḥ | yad uktam—

   maṇḍalacakrādyupāyena svādhiṣṭhānakrameṇa ca | 

iti | madhyamārthatayā cedam evodghuṣyate |

   anucchedāt svasaṃvitter nīlādīnām abhāsanāt |
   nimittānām anutpādān madhyamā pratipan matā || 

iti | atra nimittānutpādo 'bhiniveśābhāvo vivakṣitaḥ | tena sadasadādyabhiniveśābhāvāc catuḥkoṭirahitatvam | caturthatāpy atra "caturthaṃ tatpunas tathā" iti vacanāt | tat prajñājñāne 'nubhūtaṃ nirākāravedanaṃ punar iti nīlādyākāracakramalāpagame tatheti prajñājñānam iva boddhavyam ||

sākāravādinas tu nirākāraṃ jñānaṃ svapne 'pi nānubhūyata iti vadanti | tad āhuḥ—

   nākāracakram avadhūya dhiyo 'sti vṛttis
   tadbādhane balini madhyanaye jayaśrīḥ |
   no ced anindyam idam advayam eva citraṃ
   ceto nirākṛtimatasya tu ko 'vakāśaḥ || 

iti | na caivaṃ mantavyam—ākāraprakāśābhāvād ākāraḥ prāṅ nāstīti | tanniścayābhāve 'py aśakyāpahnavasyānubhūyamānasya pṛṣṭollekhaniścīyamānasya ca nīlādivedanasya bhāvāt | yad āhuḥ—
 
	yad yathā bhāsate jñānaṃ tat tathaivānubhūyate |
	iti nāmaikabhāvaḥ syāc citrākārasya cetasi || 

iti | tataś citrādvaitavedanam eva param asti | atrāpi ca granthavistarabhayāt sādhakabādhakapramāṇacintā na kṛtā | etad eva catuḥkoṭirahitatayā madhyamārthenāpi ghaṭayanti | tathā coktam—

	nāsat prakāśavapuṣā na ca sat tadanyair
		ekena na dvitayam advitayaṃ na tābhyām |
	ittathaṃ jagad yadi catuḥśikharīvimuktaṃ 
		ko bhāṣyakāramatamadhyamayor viśeṣaḥ || 

iti | vyāvṛttikṛtabhedena sambhogābhinno 'pi vimardo dharmaḥ | vipākaḥ sambhogaḥ | vicitraṃ nirmāṇam | vilakṣaṇaḥ svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ | lakṣaṇabhūtaṃ prajñājñānaṃ tathaivābhyasyamānaṃ punaḥśabdavācyaṃ sac caturthaṃ saptāṅgayuktaṃ sādhyaṃ syāt | tatra saptāṅgāni—sambhogaṃ vitteḥ | sampuṭaṃ samāpatteḥ | mahāsukhaṃ sātarūpatayā | niḥsvabhāvaṃ kalpitavirahāt | kāruṇyanirbharaṃ pūrvapraṇidhānāvedhavaśena sambhogādinā sattvārthakaraṇāt | nirantaraṃ madhye 'ntarābhāvāt | nirnirodhaṃ pravāhānucchedāt | tad uktam | 

	sambhogasampuṭamahāsukhaniḥsvabhāva-
		kāruṇyanirbharanirantaranirnirodhaiḥ | 
	aṅgair mameṣṭam iha saptabhir eva yuktaṃ
		sādhyaṃ pramāṇaparibhāvitabuddhiśastam || 

iti | yad vālam anena saptāṅgayoginā sādhanena | aniyama evātra | yato nairātmyāyoginīcakraṃ bhāvyamānaṃ buddhatvahetuḥ | atha cātra saptāṅgayogi sādhanaṃ na bhavati | sampuṭābhāvāt | tad uktam—

	sādhyaṃ saptāṅgasaṃyuktaṃ tad eva yadi sādhanam | 
	nairātmyāyoginīcakraṃ bodhaye kiṃ na sammatam || 

iti | athaivaṃ matir yat tatrāpi khaṭvāṅgopāyasampuṭatvam asti | yad uktam—

	khaṭvāṅgasampuṭā devī sambhogādisamānvitā |
	nairātmyāyoginī hanta bodhaye kiṃ na sādhanam || 

iti | tad apy asundaram | pāramitānaye 'pi vivakṣitasākṣāt sampuṭābhāve 'pi prajñopāyātmakabodhicittasampuṭasambhavena mantranayasyeva saptāṅgayuktasādhyasiddhiprasaṅgāt |

	viśiṣṭaṃ sampuṭaṃ hitvā anyathā yadi kalpyate |
	śūnyatetarasāmpuṭyāt prasaṅgaḥ syān nayāntare || 

athātra sādhane saptāṅgayuktāsty eva | yataḥ—

	stanau hṛtvā bhaved bolaṃ kakkolamadhyasaṃsthitam ||
	tīradvayaṃ bhaved ghaṇṭā kiñjalkaṃ bolakaṃ bhavet | 

iti | tad apy apeśalam | yataḥ siddhyavasthāyām idaṃ sarvaṃ na sādhanāvasthāyām | atas tathāvidhasādhanābhāve 'pi saptāṅgayuktasādhyasiddhiprasaṅgaḥ pāramitānaye 'pi durnivāraḥ |

	prāg asampuṭatā bhāvyā niṣpattau sā bhaviṣyati |
	etat sammatam asmākaṃ sādhanaṃ punar anyathā ||

iti | etad eva cānye māyopamādvaitam iti varṇayanti | yathā svapnānubhūtakāminīratisaṃvedanaṃ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvyaparasvapnasaṃvedanenānubhūyamānaṃ nātyantocchedena mṛṣānubhūteḥ | nāpi saj jāgraddaśopalabdhārthakriyākārisvaparavedyavastuvad avisaṃvādābhāvāt | tadāhuḥ—

	svapnāt svapnaṃ yadaiva syāc ciccitrālīkatā tadā |
	naiva satyam asadvitter na cocchedaḥ prakāśataḥ || 

iti | tathaitad api viśvaṃ nātyantocchedenālīkaṃ vitteḥ | nāpi paramārthasat "sadasator utpādāyogād" ityādinā pratītyasamutpannatvenādhyavasitasya paramārthato 'tyantājātatvenānutpannasya sattvāyogāt | yathoktam—

	yat pratītyasamutpannaṃ notpannaṃ tat svabhāvataḥ | 
	yat svabhāvena notpannam utpannaṃ nāma tat katham || 

atrāpi ca caturthatvadharmakāyādiyuktatvavyavasthā pūrvavad eva boddhavyā ||

root:
citraṃ tato vipākaḥ syāt tṛtīye tu vilakṣaṇam |
vimardaś ca tato jñeyo haṭhayoganirākṛteḥ || SeNi 2 ||
commentary:
kiṃ punar evam aniyamenābhidhīyata ity āha.

yasmāt sarvākāraṃ sarvavastutattvam adhigamya sarveṣāṃ hitasukhavidhānārtham udyacchadbhir buddhasutaiḥ na tad asti kiṃcit yan na śikṣitavyam. anyathā sarvākāraḥ sarvasattvānām arthaḥ kartum aśakyaḥ. puṇyasaṃbhāro 'pi evaṃ vicarato 'paryanta eva syāt.

root:
anābhogaṃ hi yaj jñānaṃ tac cācintyaṃ pracakṣate |
sañcintya yad acintyaṃ vai tad acintyaṃ bhaven na hi || SeNi 30 ||
commentary:
nanv apratiṣṭhānam acintyatā | sā cintyamānā āvaraṇatayā malam eveti śaṅkānirāsārtham āha—anābhogam ityādi | tac cāpratiṣṭhānam acintyaṃ jñānaṃ na tadvicārāgataṃ kim tarhy anābhogaṃ svarasābhyāgatam | kutaḥ | sañcintya vimṛśya yad acintyaṃ tad yasmād acintyaṃ na bhavati | tad uktaṃ jñānasiddhau—

	bauddhaṃ jñānam anābhogaṃ nirvikalpam ataḥ smṛtam |
	sañcintya kāraṇābhāvān na tu niścintyatā bhavet || 

iti ||

root:
anābhogaṃ hi yaj jñānaṃ tac cācintyaṃ pracakṣate |
sañcintya yad acintyaṃ vai tad acintyaṃ bhaven na hi || SeNi 30 ||
commentary:
nanu haṭhaseko balātkṛto niryuktika iti yāvat | niryuktikatvam asya katham iti cet | ucyate—āgamavirodhāt | taṃ darśayitum āha | ālocanam ityādi |

	paramaviramayor madhye lakṣyaṃ vīkṣya dṛḍhīkuru || 

ity atrobhayor madhyaṃ vivakṣitam | tac ca tvanmate nāsti |

tan na | anyārthatvād asya | tathā hi nirdhāraṇa eṣā ṣaṣṭhī | tenāyam arthaḥ | dvayor madhye yaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sa iha grāhyaḥ | śreṣṭhaś ca virama eveti na kiñcid asustham | 

tarhi

	viramādiḥ paramāt paraḥ śūnyāc chūnyaṃ tu herukam || 

iti na ghaṭate | atra hi viramasyādiḥ paramāt paro 'bhimataḥ | tad api na | yato 'trāpy anya evārthaḥ | viramaś cāsāv ādiś ca viramādiḥ | āditvaṃ ca sahajāpekṣayā | ata idam api sustham |

tarhi—

	viramādau lakṣayet tac ca ānandatrayavarjitam || 

iti katham | atrāpi viramaś cāsāv ādiś ceti pūrvavan neyam | 

tarhi—

	vimardam ālocanaṃ proktaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti ca | 

iti katham | atra hi vikalparūpatā vimardādipadānāṃ sphuṭam eva gamyate | athātra katham api yadi nirvikalpatvābhidhānaṃ syāt tad etad api lokaprasiddhibādhayaiva hatam | tathā hi lokā vimardo vivādaḥ kṣodanam ālocanaṃ tattatkāryādicintanam iti manyante | kiṃ ca—

	vicitre prathamānandaḥ paramānando vipākake |
	viramānando vimarde ca sahajānando vilakṣaṇe || 

ity atra virama eva vimarda iti niścitam | anyac ca—

	prathamānandaṃ jagadrūpaṃ paramānandaṃ jagat tathā |
	viramānandaṃ jagac caiva na vidyate sahajaṃ triṣu || 

iti viramasya jagadrūpatayā saṃsārarūpatvam ākhyātam | itthaṃ ca "vikalpamātraṃ saṃsāraḥ" ity ukter asya savikalpatvam abhihitaṃ syāt | nirvikalpatvaṃ ca sahajatayābhimatam itīdam api vighaṭate | tathā ca—

	sahajānandasvabhāvo 'haṃ paramāntaṃ viramādikam | 

ity etad api vighaṭate | tathā—

	tat sādhyaṃ yoginītantre sahajākhyaṃ mahāsukham |
	paramānte bhavel lakṣyaṃ viramādau ca yatnataḥ || 

ity ādikam api vighaṭate | tathā—

	prathamaṃ kalaśābhiṣekaṃ dvitīyaṃ guhyam uttamam |
	prajñājñānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vai caturthaṃ tat punas tathā || 

iti | prajñājñānābhiṣekas tu sahajābhiṣeko yata idam api pratihanyate | ata evamādigranthavighaṭanenāgamavirodhāt tṛtīye vikalparūpo vimardo naiṣitavyaḥ | yatas tatra nirvikalpakavedanam evāste |

tad eva sopaskāram upasaṃharati—

root:
tathatāṃ ye tu paśyanti madhyamārthānusārataḥ |
te vai tattvavido dhanyāḥ pratyakṣaṃ yadi saṃvidā || SeNi 31 ||
commentary:
idānīṃ vijñānavādāśaṅkāṃ tadapagame cocchedāśaṅkāṃ ca nirākartum āha—

tathatām ityādi | tathatāṃ bhūtakoṭīṃ ye paśyanti sākṣāt kurvanti madhyamārthānusārataś catuḥkoṭivirahatas te dhanyās tattvavidaḥ | tat kim ucchedena | naiva | saṃvidā saṃvedanena yady aśeṣollekhaparihārāt tat tattvaṃ pratyakṣam anubhūtaṃ syāt |

etac caivaṃvidhaṃ satyadvayātmakam ubhayāntarahitaṃ śūnyatākaruṇābhinnaṃ prajñopāyasvarūpaṃ sadgurupādaprasādavitter jñeyam ||

root:
tathatāṃ ye tu paśyanti madhyamārthānusārataḥ |
te vai tattvavido dhanyāḥ pratyakṣaṃ yadi saṃvidā || SeNi 31 ||
commentary:
samādhānaparityāgāvakāśam āha.

agnidāhādi bhayam. tathā ratnatrayapūjādikṛta utsavaḥ. samadhikataraḥ sattvārthādir vā. tatsaṃbhave yadi sthātum aśaktaḥ, tadā kāmacāra ity anujñātam, sāpattiko na bhavatīty arthaḥ. kutaḥ punar ayam aniyamo labhyata ity āha—dānetyādi | śīlaṃ yady api dānāt prakṛṣṭam, tathāpy avaraśikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya tadanantaram eva uttaraśikṣāvasthitasyābhyāsapāṭavābhāvāt kathaṃcit tāvatkālaṃ tato nivartamānasyāpi nāpattiḥ. dānasyāsau kālo na śīlasya. ata evoktam—yady aśakta iti. etāvanmātreṇedam udāharaṇam. yathoktam—tatraikasyāṃ śikṣāyāṃ niṣpādyamānāyām aśaktasya, itaraśikṣānabhyāsādanāpattiḥ. āryākṣayamatisūtre 'py evam avocat—

	dānakāle śīlopasaṃhārasyopekṣā.

iti. na cātaḥ śithilena bhavitavyam.

root:
yāvān sarvasamāropaḥ sa sarvaḥ sarvathā na hi |
madhyamārtho nirāropas tatrāpohavidhī kutaḥ || SeNi 32 ||
commentary:
tad eva sopaskāram āha—yāvān ityādi | yatas tatra madhyamārthe yāvān samāropo 'dhyavasāyaḥ sa sarvo nāsti | evaṃvidhaḥ samāropābhāvo vijñānanaye apīṣṭaḥ | ata āha—sarvatheti | tatra hi vijñānasya vastusattvasamāropāspadatvam asti | ato na tatra sarvathā samāropābhāvaḥ |

etena māyopamasiddhānto 'pi pratyuktaḥ | kutaḥ | āstāṃ tāvad atra sarvavikalpo 'dhyavasāyānām apohaviṣayatayā nirāropatvaṃ ca vijñānavāde 'pi nirāropasambhavāt | tato madhyamārtho nirāropo niṣprapañcaḥ | param ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ | vijñānavāde nirvikalpatve 'pi gāḍhataravijñānasadbhāvāvidyāvaśād āhatyollekhābhāve 'pi cetasi tadaiva svasaṃvidgrahāt pṛṣṭhe vedanagrahaḥ sphuṭa eva | 

nanu tavāpy etat samam | pṛṣṭhe sarvavikalpabhāvāt | na | apratiṣṭhānatvenānāstheyasattvānurodhāt saṃvṛtyā vyavahārāt | atas tatrāpohavidhī vidhiniṣedhau kutaḥ | naivety arthaḥ |

root:
yāvān sarvasamāropaḥ sa sarvaḥ sarvathā na hi |
madhyamārtho nirāropas tatrāpohavidhī kutaḥ || SeNi 32 ||
commentary:
nanv apratiṣṭhānam acintyatā | sā cintyamānā āvaraṇatayā malam eveti śaṅkānirāsārtham āha—anābhogam ityādi | tac cāpratiṣṭhānam acintyaṃ jñānaṃ na tadvicārāgataṃ kim tarhy anābhogaṃ svarasābhyāgatam | kutaḥ | sañcintya vimṛśya yad acintyaṃ tad yasmād acintyaṃ na bhavati | tad uktaṃ jñānasiddhau—

	bauddhaṃ jñānam anābhogaṃ nirvikalpam ataḥ smṛtam |
	sañcintya kāraṇābhāvān na tu niścintyatā bhavet || 

iti ||

root:
jñānajñeyāsamārope manyanā tatra nānyathā |
sarvaṃ tathā yathā pūrvaṃ yathā buddhis tathā na hi || SeNi 33 ||
commentary:
tarhi pratīyamānā bhāvāḥ kathaṃ jñeyāḥ | ata āha—jñānetyādi | tatra hi jñānajñeyasamāropaśūnye tattvātmake jagati manyatā savikalpanirvikalpābhyāṃ nānyathā | kathaṃ tarhi | yathā pūrvaṃ tattvājñāne tathaiva tattvajñāne 'pi sarvam | tad uktam—

	nāpaneyam ataḥ kiñcit prakṣeptavyaṃ na kiñcana | 
	draṣtavyaṃ bhūtato bhūtaṃ bhūtadarśī vimucyate || 

iti | tathānyatrāpy uktam—

	bhavasyaiva parijñānaṃ nirvāṇam iti kathyate | 

iti | yadvā sarvaṃ tathā yathā pūrvam iti yathānavabodhē sahajarūpaṃ tathatārūpaṃ sarvaṃ jagat tathā bodhe 'pi jñeyam | tad uktam—

	yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt tathatāṃ buddhavān asi || 

iti | anyatra ca—"sahajagatikā hi sarvadharmāḥ. te tāṃ gatiṃ na vyativartante" iti | tathā—

	anutpāde 'pi buddhānāṃ tathaiva dharmatā sthitā |

ityādivistaraḥ | param ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ | yathā pūrvaṃ grāhyagrāhakādyadhyavasāyinī buddhis tathaiva paraṃ nāsti | tad uktam—

	amī dharmās tu nirvāṇaṃ mohāt saṃsārarūpiṇaḥ | 

iti | mohaś cātra grāhyagrāhakādyadhyavasāyaḥ | tathānyatrāpy uktam—

	saraha bhaṇaī
	ṇibbiappo jaïso taïso
	jaïso bujjhaï hoï ṇa taïso

iti ||

root:
jñānajñeyāsamārope manyanā tatra nānyathā |
sarvaṃ tathā yathā pūrvaṃ yathā buddhis tathā na hi || SeNi 33 ||
commentary:
anayoḥ samudāyābhāve doṣam uktvā pratyekam abhāve kathayitum āha.

na vidyate saṃprajanyaṃ yasmiṃs tad asaṃprajanyam. taccittaṃ yasya tasya. śrutacintābhāvanāmayaprajñāpariniṣṭhitaṃ vastu na smaraṇam adhivasati. tanmūlaṃ ca sarvaṃ kalyāṇam. kim iva? yathā sacchidrakumbhe mukhanikśiptam udakam adhastād gacchati nāvatiṣṭhate.

root:
yenājātaṃ jagad buddhaṃ buddhiḥ śuddhaiva bodhataḥ |
nijaṃ tasya jagat satyam anābhogena dhīmataḥ || SeNi 34 ||
commentary:
viditaivaṃvidhajñānasya jagad yathā tad darśayati—


yenetyādi | "sadasator utpādāyogād" ityādinājātaṃ jagad yena buddhaṃ pratyakṣato jñātaṃ tasya prtītyasamutpannā buddhiḥ śuddhaiva bodhato nirvedhataḥ | atas tasya dhīmato 'nābhogenābhogaṃ vinaiva nijaṃ sahajaṃ jagat satyam avitatham ||

root:
yenājātaṃ jagad buddhaṃ buddhiḥ śuddhaiva bodhataḥ |
nijaṃ tasya jagat satyam anābhogena dhīmataḥ || SeNi 34 ||
commentary:
iti kāyapratyavekṣayā tatsvabhāvam upayogaṃ ca vicārya pariniścitakāyaprayojanam upasaṃharann āha.

uktanītyāyattīkṛtaḥ ātmā cittakāyalakṣaṇaḥ sarvadā prasannavadano bhavet. bhrūlalāṭasaṃkocaṃ ca prasādahānikaraṃ tyajet. pūrvam eva asaṃcodita eva pareṇa svāgatādivādaiḥ saṃtoṣaṇaśīlo bhavet. sarvasattvānām akāraṇabāndhavaś ca.

root:
avibhāvitasambandho vikalpo 'sau pratītyajaḥ |
tad eṣa eva nirvāṇaṃ mā mṛthāś citta vibhramam || SeNi 35 ||
commentary:
adhunā vikalpo 'pi nirvāṇam iti darśayati—avibhāvitetyādi | avibhāvitasambandho 'viditasambandho 'sau vikalpaḥ prītyasamutpannaḥ | tat tasmād eṣa eva nirvāṇam iti | ataś citta bhrāntiṃ mā kuru | tad uktam—

	yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā |

iti | śūnyatā ca nirvāṇam iti ||

root:
avibhāvitasambandho vikalpo 'sau pratītyajaḥ |
tad eṣa eva nirvāṇaṃ mā mṛthāś citta vibhramam || SeNi 35 ||
commentary:
nanv apratiṣṭhānam acintyatā | sā cintyamānā āvaraṇatayā malam eveti śaṅkānirāsārtham āha—anābhogam ityādi | tac cāpratiṣṭhānam acintyaṃ jñānaṃ na tadvicārāgataṃ kim tarhy anābhogaṃ svarasābhyāgatam | kutaḥ | sañcintya vimṛśya yad acintyaṃ tad yasmād acintyaṃ na bhavati | tad uktaṃ jñānasiddhau—

	bauddhaṃ jñānam anābhogaṃ nirvikalpam ataḥ smṛtam |
	sañcintya kāraṇābhāvān na tu niścintyatā bhavet || 

iti ||

root:
pratipakṣe sthito naiva tattvāsakto 'pi naiva yaḥ |
gārddhyaṃ naiva phale yasya mahāmudrāṃ sa vindati || SeNi 36 ||
commentary:
ajātajñānabodhena mahāmudrā yathā labhyate tad darśayati—pratipakṣa ityādi | pratipakṣa iti svabhāvaguṇasāranirūpaṇatayā dānaśīlakṣamāvīryadhyānaprajñātmakapratipakṣanirūpaṇavikalpāsaṅge 'manasikāreṇa varjanāt sthito naiva yaḥ | pratipakṣanirūpaṇavikalpāsaṅgaprahāṇyā sāsravarūpādipañcopādānaskandhādyātmakavipakṣanirūpaṇavikalpāsaṅgaprahāṇir api draṣṭavyā | tadabhāva etadabhāvasyāvaśyambhāvitvāt | tattvāsakto 'pīti svabhāvādinirūpaṇatayā śūnyatātathatādyātmakatattvanirūpaṇavikalpe 'py āsaktaḥ saṃsakto naiva yaḥ | gārddhyaṃ naiva phale yasyeti prathamabhūmyādisarvākārajñatāntaprāptinirūpaṇavikalpāsaṅgarūpaṃ phale gārddhyaṃ kāṅkṣā yasya nāsti | mahāmudrāṃ sa vindati labhate | etenāpratiṣṭhānānāroparūpajagadātmatayā vipakṣapratipakṣatattvaphalāsaṅgavigamena sarvāsaṅgavinirmuktāṃ mahāmudrām ācaṣṭe |

tarhi mahāmudrāyāṃ dānapāramitādīnāṃ kim abhāva eva | na | tasyā eva sarvapāramitādyātmakapuṇyajñānasambhāradvayarūpatvāt | tad uktaṃ viśeṣacintibrahmaparipṛcchāmahāyānasūtre—

	yaḥ sarvakleśaparityāgaḥ idaṃ dānaṃ | yo 'nabhisaṃskāraḥ idaṃ śīlaṃ | yālakṣaṇatā iyaṃ kṣāntiḥ | yo vivekaḥ idaṃ vīryam | yad apratiṣṭhānam idaṃ dhyānam | yāprapañcatā iyaṃ prajñā |

etenāpratiṣṭhānāprapañcarūpaiva prajñāpāramiteti sthitam | tad uktaṃ saptaśatikāyām—

	bhagavān āha—yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi tadā kutra pratiṣṭhāya prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi | mañjuśrīr āha—yasminn ahaṃ bhagavan samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi | apratiṣṭhito 'haṃ tasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi | bhagavān āha—apratiṣṭhitasya te mañjuśrīḥ kā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā | mañjuśrir āha—saiva bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yan na kvacit pratiṣṭhānam | bhagavān āha—yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi katarat te kuśalamūlaṃ tasmin samaya upacayaṃ gacchaty apacayaṃ vā | mañjuśrīr āha—na me bhagavan tasmin samaye kiñcit kuśalamūlam upacayaṃ gacchaty apacayaṃ vā | nāsau bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati yasya kasyacid dharmasyopacayo vāpacayo vā | na sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā veditavyā yā kasyacid dharmasyopacayāya vāpacayāya vā pratyupasthitā | sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmān jahāti nāpi buddhadharmān upādatte |

ityādi ||

root:
pratipakṣe sthito naiva tattvāsakto 'pi naiva yaḥ |
gārddhyaṃ naiva phale yasya mahāmudrāṃ sa vindati || SeNi 36 ||
commentary:
saṃkleśasamudācāre saṃprajanyakāritāṃ yadety ādibhiḥ saptabhiḥ ślokaiḥ śikṣayitum āha.

prathamata eva svacittaṃ nirūpya. uktam. asaṃkliṣṭāvasthāyāṃ karaṇīyam uktam.

root:
yathaiva karmamudrāyām ānandādivyavasthitiḥ |
tathā samayamudrāyāṃ vajrācāryaprasādataḥ || SeNi 37 ||
commentary:
mahāmudrām uktvā caturānandasvarūpāṃ sarvagāṃ samayamudrām āha—yathaivetyādi | vajrācāryaprasādata iti sadgurūpadeśata ity arthaḥ | tatrāyam upadeśaḥ | mahāmudrātas tatpuruṣakāraphalarūpe saprajñe bhagavati sambhogarūpeṇotthite ā ghṛṣṭer ānandaḥ | maṇeḥ puraḥ paramaḥ | mahārāgād drutāpattau prajñopāyarūpacandrārkasampuṭasaṃlagnamadhyasthordvādhobindudvayarūpeṇa bindudvayarūpatā sahajaḥ | tad uktam—

	āi anta na majjha tahiṃ naü bhava naü nivvāṇa |
	ehu so paramamahāsuha naü para naü appāṇa ||

asya ca neyanītatayā dvividho 'rthaḥ | tatra nītārthaḥ | tasmin tathāvidhe vilakṣaṇe nirvikalpaṃ vedanam | neyārthaś ca | ǟi na prathamo bindur na | anta na antyo na | majjha tahiṃ nirantaratvān madhyābhāve madhyas tatra na | naü bhava na bhavarūpaḥ | upāyārkasaṃlagno bindur bhavaḥ | sa na tattvam | naü nivvāṇa na nirvāṇarūpaḥ prajñācandrasaṃlagnaḥ | kas tarhi | ucyate—ubhaikarasasvabhāva eṣa eva sa paramamahāsukhaḥ | nātra parasyātmano vā vittiḥ | atra ca prāg uktaḥ karmamudrāsahajavyavasthāpita iva vajrasattvādivyapadeśo jñeyaḥ | 

tataḥ pukkasyādicaturdevīgītikācodanānantaraṃ svapnaprabuddhavat sambhogarūpeṇa bhagavadutthāne sattvārthāya śuddhalaukikavikalpāmukhībhāvena yad ālocanaṃ tad viramaḥ | atrāpi "caturthaṃ tat punas tathā" iti caturthatvam | tad iti sahajopalabdham | punar iti sarvākāram | tatheti sahajavad boddhavyam iti kṛtvā | "eka eva suratānandaś catuḥsaṅkhyāvacchinnaḥ" iti vacanāt | yadā sarvam eva sahajarūpaṃ tadā samayamudrā caturānandarūpā | eka eva viramānandaḥ |

nanv atra bindurūpatayā nirākāravedanaṃ sphuṭam eva darśitam | na | tadāpy avācyasukharūpatayā sakalajagadākārasphuraṇe nirākārapratihateḥ |

tarhi bindurūpotpattiḥ kimarthaṃ karmamudropalabdhasukhavad atrāpi bhujamukhādyākāraprajñopāyātmakatāyā eva yuktatvāt | ucyate | sātabindurūpatvena mṛdākārād ghaṭākāravad āśrayaparāvṛttyā sākārakhyātyartham | yad uktam—"bhagavān bindurūpeṇāvasthitaḥ" iti |

athaivaṃ vācyam—

	saṃvṛtaṃ kundasaṅkāśaṃ vivṛtaṃ sukharūpiṇam |

iti | karmamudropalabdhaṃ saṃvṛtam aparamārtham | vivṛtam anāvṛtaṃ nirvāṇam | itthaṃ sukhaṃ bhinnam eva | tad api na | "sukhaṃ hitvā bhaven na saḥ" iti bindusukhayos tādāmyena bhinnasukhābhāvāt | etac ca—

	tasmāt saukhyaṃ na tattvākhyaṃ mahābhūtaṃ yataḥ sukham |

iti vacanāj jñeyam |

athaivaṃ matiḥ | vicitrasya bindurūpāpattyā nirākāratvam eva | tad api na saṅgacchate | nirākārābhiprāyeṇa yadīttham abhidhīyate tadā nirākārabodhasandehakāraṇaṃ bindum apahāya sātamātram eva param abhihitaṃ syāt | kim anena yathoktaprayāsabahulena binduneti | tasmān nirākāraṃ nāsty eva ||

root:
yathaiva karmamudrāyām ānandādivyavasthitiḥ |
tathā samayamudrāyāṃ vajrācāryaprasādataḥ || SeNi 37 ||
commentary:
prathamārambhiṇaḥ saṃtatābhyāsena kleśasya parihārārtham āha.

dṛṣṭicittaparikhedaparityāgāya kadācit karhicit diśo vyavalokayet. atha kadācit kaścit tatsamīpam āgacchet, tadā tasya praticchāyāmātraṃ viditvā svāgatavādena saṃtoṣaṇārthaṃ vilokayet. anyathā tatra tasyāvadhyānenākuśalaṃ prasavet.

root:
vicitraṃ karmamudraiva dharmamudrā vipākajā |
vilakṣaṇaṃ mahāmudrā vimardaḥ samayo bhavet || SeNi 38 ||
commentary:
anantaroktam evaikaikamudrāyā ekaikānandatvaṃ sphuṭayati—vicitram ityādi | gatārtham ||

nanu caturmudrānvayānugato 'yaṃ granthaḥ | sa ca yoginītantrānusāreṇa na yogatantrānusāreṇeti cet | tan na | ucyate—

	āryanāgārjunair uktaṃ śrīsamājānusārataḥ |
	pañcabhiś ca kramair yat tac caturmudrāsu kathyate || (1)

	kramayor mantramūrtitvacinnidhyaptī yathākramam |
	te caikamudrayokte 'tra mantramūrtimanaḥsthiteḥ || (3)

	dharmamudrāsukhaṃ yasmāt saṃvṛteḥ satyadarśanam |
	satyasya bhūtakoṭitvaṃ mahāmudrārtha ucyate || (3)

	phalaṃ samayamudrāyā dvayor advayavedanam |
	kramāṇāṃ mīlanaṃ divyaṃ buddhatvaphaladāyakam || (4) 

tathā ca pradīpoddyotanaṣaṭkoṭivyākhyāyām ācāryacandrakīrtipādair uktam—

	utpattikrama ādau syān mantramūrtiprasādhakaḥ |
	cittanidhyaptimātraṃ tu dvitīyaḥ krama ucyate ||

	tṛtīyas tu kramo ramyaḥ saṃvṛteḥ satyadarśanam |
	satyasya saṃvṛteḥ śuddhiś caturthaḥ krama ucyate ||

	pañcamo yuganaddhākhyo yat satyadvayayojanam | 
	sādhanāṅgam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvatantrārthasaṅgrahaḥ ||

	eṣāṃ kramāṇāṃ bhedāṃs tu prastāravidhinā bahūn |
	sammīlanaṃ ca teṣāṃ vai yo vetti sa hi tantravit ||

tathā cāryadevapādair api sūtakamelāpake mantratattvamudrātattvātmatattvadharmatattvadevatātattvanāmabhiḥ pañcakramāṇām uddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ | tatra mantratattvam iti hūṃkārādimantrotthitā hevajrādimūrtiḥ | mudrātattvam iti saṅkhyāgaṇanākrameṇa neyārthatayā cittanidyaptimātraṃ nītārthatas tu karmamudrāyām | ātmatattvam iti jagataś ciccitraniḥsvabhāvatā | dharmatattvam iti dharmānutpādaḥ | devatātattvam ity ātmatattvadharmatattvayos tādāmīkaraṇam abhinnateti yāvat | 

	etāni pañca tattvāni gurūṇām upadeśataḥ |
	caturmudrāsu yojyāni pañcakrama iva kramāt ||

nanu—

	kramam utpattikaṃ caiva utpannakramam eva ca ||
	kramadvayaṃ samāśritya vajriṇāṃ dharmadeśanā |

iti tantre pāṭha | tat kathaṃ pañca kramāḥ | ucyate | utpattikrame piṇḍīkramavajrajāpau bāhyotpattigambhīrotpattyaparanāmakau | utpanne ca svādhiṣṭhānābhisambodhiyuganaddhakramā utpannapariniṣpannasvābhāvikakramāparanāmakā iti |

etāsāṃ caturmudrāṇāṃ sadbhāvaḥ svabhāvaś ca sarvarahasyatantrokto vijñeyaḥ | tad uktaṃ tatra—

	mānasikā mahāmudrā samayamudrā tu sarvagā |
	vācasī dharmamudrā tu karmamudrā tu kāyikī ||

root:
vicitraṃ karmamudraiva dharmamudrā vipākajā |
vilakṣaṇaṃ mahāmudrā vimardaḥ samayo bhavet || SeNi 38 ||
commentary:
syād etat—dānapāramitādiṣu katham iva cittaṃ pradhānam? sā hi sarvasattvānāṃ dāridryāpanayanalakṣaṇety āha.

dāridryaṃ hi nāma sāsravasukhabhogabubhukṣayā cittakārpaṇyam upakaraṇavaikalyaṃ vā. tad apanīya jagato yadi dānapāramitāparipūrir bhavatīty ucyate, tadā sā katham? na kathaṃcid api pūrvatāyināṃ pūrvam abhisaṃbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yujyate. kutaḥ? jagaddaridram adyāpi, nādyāpi yāvaj jagaddāridyam upaśāmyati.

root:
mahāmudrām ajānānāḥ karmamudraikasādhanāḥ |
āmnāyatattvato bhraṣṭā rauravaṃ yānti yoginaḥ || SeNi 39 ||
commentary:
adhunā ye karmamudrāyāṃ tathāgatāśvāsaṃ vajradharāśvāsam eva vā jñātvā santuṣṭā bhavanti tan nirākaraṇārtham āha—mahāmudrām ityādi | āmnāyena guruparamparayā yat tattvaṃ tato dviṣṭāḥ karmamudraiva tattvaṃ na dharmamudrādikam ity anuttarasambuddhadharmapratikṣepād yogino rauravaṃ yānti | rauravaśabdasyopalakṣaṇenānye 'py avīcyādayo nirayā grāhyāḥ | rauravādinirayagamanaṃ ca saddharmapratikṣepasaṃvartanīyam āryāṣṭasahasrikādisūtrāntādiṣu sphuṭam iti na pratanyate || 

nanu karmamudraiva tattvaṃ na bhavati kutaḥ |

	karmudrāṃ śaṭhāṃ krūrāṃ pāpiyasīm atibhīṣaṇāṃ |
									dūrataḥ parivarjayet ||

iti | tathā—

	naśvarī mānuṣī prajñā sukhaṃ tasyā viniśvaram |

ityāditantrapāṭhāt | 

	adṛṣṭaparamānandaḥ strīsukhaṃ bahumanyate |

iti pāṭhāc ca | 

	yathā darpaṇārpitaṃ mukhasya pratibimbaṃ mukhaṃ na bhavati | na pūrvasiddhaṃ nāpy adhunā siddhim | tad eva mukhapratibimbaṃ sādṛśyamātram āpādayati | tathāpi lokāḥ svamukhaṃ dṛṣṭam iti kṛtvā bhrāntyā santuṣṭā bhavanti | tathaivācāryāḥ kumatayaḥ prajñājñānam āsādya sahajam anubhūtam iti kṛtvā santoṣam utpādayanti | santuṣṭāś ca santo dharmamudrāyā vārttām api na jānanti |

ityādi caturmudrānvaya āryanāgārjunapādokteś ca |

	kecid dvayendriyajaṃ saukhyaṃ tattvam āhur narādhamāḥ |
	tac cāpi mahāsukhaṃ naiva pravadanti jinottamāḥ ||

nanv evam anekatantroktāyāḥ karmamudrāyāḥ pratikṣepād bhavato 'pi nirayagamanam āgatya militam | na | tasyāḥ prādhānyena tattvarūpatāmātram āgamoktyā dūṣitam | tadupayogas tu "karmamudrāṃ samāsādya" ityādinā kāraṇarūpatāpradarśanena khyāpita iti | kutas tatra pratikṣepa ity alaṃ bahunā | śeṣaṃ subodham ||

root:
mahāmudrām ajānānāḥ karmamudraikasādhanāḥ |
āmnāyatattvato bhraṣṭā rauravaṃ yānti yoginaḥ || SeNi 39 ||
commentary:
asamādhānasya ca rakṣaṇām āha.

saret puraḥ apasaret paścāt. prapātādyupaghātaṃ nirīkṣya ca. evam ity uktakramadiśā svaparahitaprayojanam avagamya pratipattisāro bhavet.

root:
ālocanaṃ vimardaś cet tṛtīye katham iṣyate |
yat tatrālocanaṃ naiva bhaved vittir alakṣaṇā || SeNi 3 ||
commentary:
nanu haṭhaseko balātkṛto niryuktika iti yāvat | niryuktikatvam asya katham iti cet | ucyate—āgamavirodhāt | taṃ darśayitum āha | ālocanam ityādi |

	paramaviramayor madhye lakṣyaṃ vīkṣya dṛḍhīkuru || 

ity atrobhayor madhyaṃ vivakṣitam | tac ca tvanmate nāsti |

tan na | anyārthatvād asya | tathā hi nirdhāraṇa eṣā ṣaṣṭhī | tenāyam arthaḥ | dvayor madhye yaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sa iha grāhyaḥ | śreṣṭhaś ca virama eveti na kiñcid asustham | 

tarhi

	viramādiḥ paramāt paraḥ śūnyāc chūnyaṃ tu herukam || 

iti na ghaṭate | atra hi viramasyādiḥ paramāt paro 'bhimataḥ | tad api na | yato 'trāpy anya evārthaḥ | viramaś cāsāv ādiś ca viramādiḥ | āditvaṃ ca sahajāpekṣayā | ata idam api sustham |

tarhi—

	viramādau lakṣayet tac ca ānandatrayavarjitam || 

iti katham | atrāpi viramaś cāsāv ādiś ceti pūrvavan neyam | 

tarhi—

	vimardam ālocanaṃ proktaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti ca | 

iti katham | atra hi vikalparūpatā vimardādipadānāṃ sphuṭam eva gamyate | athātra katham api yadi nirvikalpatvābhidhānaṃ syāt tad etad api lokaprasiddhibādhayaiva hatam | tathā hi lokā vimardo vivādaḥ kṣodanam ālocanaṃ tattatkāryādicintanam iti manyante | kiṃ ca—

	vicitre prathamānandaḥ paramānando vipākake |
	viramānando vimarde ca sahajānando vilakṣaṇe || 

ity atra virama eva vimarda iti niścitam | anyac ca—

	prathamānandaṃ jagadrūpaṃ paramānandaṃ jagat tathā |
	viramānandaṃ jagac caiva na vidyate sahajaṃ triṣu || 

iti viramasya jagadrūpatayā saṃsārarūpatvam ākhyātam | itthaṃ ca "vikalpamātraṃ saṃsāraḥ" ity ukter asya savikalpatvam abhihitaṃ syāt | nirvikalpatvaṃ ca sahajatayābhimatam itīdam api vighaṭate | tathā ca—

	sahajānandasvabhāvo 'haṃ paramāntaṃ viramādikam | 

ity etad api vighaṭate | tathā—

	tat sādhyaṃ yoginītantre sahajākhyaṃ mahāsukham |
	paramānte bhavel lakṣyaṃ viramādau ca yatnataḥ || 

ity ādikam api vighaṭate | tathā—

	prathamaṃ kalaśābhiṣekaṃ dvitīyaṃ guhyam uttamam |
	prajñājñānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vai caturthaṃ tat punas tathā || 

iti | prajñājñānābhiṣekas tu sahajābhiṣeko yata idam api pratihanyate | ata evamādigranthavighaṭanenāgamavirodhāt tṛtīye vikalparūpo vimardo naiṣitavyaḥ | yatas tatra nirvikalpakavedanam evāste |

tad eva sopaskāram upasaṃharati—

root:
ālocanaṃ vimardaś cet tṛtīye katham iṣyate |
yat tatrālocanaṃ naiva bhaved vittir alakṣaṇā || SeNi 3 ||
commentary: tadanantaram asthīny api khaṇḍaśaḥ pṛthag bhinnāni kṛtvā majjānaṃ paśya avalokaya. yady antaraṃ kāyaḥ caturmahābhūtikaḥ mātapitraśucikalalasaṃbhūtaḥ duḥkhamayaḥ kṛtaghnaś ceti vistareṇa pratipādayiṣyatīti kim atra sāram asti vijñapraśastaṃ nyāyyaṃ vā, ity ātmanaiva vicāraya.

root:
mudrās tāvan na buddhyante catasraś ca catuḥkṣaṇāḥ |
yāvan na śabareśasya spṛśyante pādapāṃsavaḥ || SeNi 40 ||
commentary:
mudrāṇāṃ bodhārthaṃ sveṣṭadevatāprabhāvaṃ darśayann āha—mudrās tāvad ityādi | śabareśasyeti siddhaśrīśabarapādasya | śeṣaṃ subodham ||

idānīṃ puṇyapariṇāmanayā grantham upasaṃharann āha—

root:
mudrās tāvan na buddhyante catasraś ca catuḥkṣaṇāḥ |
yāvan na śabareśasya spṛśyante pādapāṃsavaḥ || SeNi 40 ||
commentary:
ajātajñānabodhena mahāmudrā yathā labhyate tad darśayati—pratipakṣa ityādi | pratipakṣa iti svabhāvaguṇasāranirūpaṇatayā dānaśīlakṣamāvīryadhyānaprajñātmakapratipakṣanirūpaṇavikalpāsaṅge 'manasikāreṇa varjanāt sthito naiva yaḥ | pratipakṣanirūpaṇavikalpāsaṅgaprahāṇyā sāsravarūpādipañcopādānaskandhādyātmakavipakṣanirūpaṇavikalpāsaṅgaprahāṇir api draṣṭavyā | tadabhāva etadabhāvasyāvaśyambhāvitvāt | tattvāsakto 'pīti svabhāvādinirūpaṇatayā śūnyatātathatādyātmakatattvanirūpaṇavikalpe 'py āsaktaḥ saṃsakto naiva yaḥ | gārddhyaṃ naiva phale yasyeti prathamabhūmyādisarvākārajñatāntaprāptinirūpaṇavikalpāsaṅgarūpaṃ phale gārddhyaṃ kāṅkṣā yasya nāsti | mahāmudrāṃ sa vindati labhate | etenāpratiṣṭhānānāroparūpajagadātmatayā vipakṣapratipakṣatattvaphalāsaṅgavigamena sarvāsaṅgavinirmuktāṃ mahāmudrām ācaṣṭe |

tarhi mahāmudrāyāṃ dānapāramitādīnāṃ kim abhāva eva | na | tasyā eva sarvapāramitādyātmakapuṇyajñānasambhāradvayarūpatvāt | tad uktaṃ viśeṣacintibrahmaparipṛcchāmahāyānasūtre—

	yaḥ sarvakleśaparityāgaḥ idaṃ dānaṃ | yo 'nabhisaṃskāraḥ idaṃ śīlaṃ | yālakṣaṇatā iyaṃ kṣāntiḥ | yo vivekaḥ idaṃ vīryam | yad apratiṣṭhānam idaṃ dhyānam | yāprapañcatā iyaṃ prajñā |

etenāpratiṣṭhānāprapañcarūpaiva prajñāpāramiteti sthitam | tad uktaṃ saptaśatikāyām—

	bhagavān āha—yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi tadā kutra pratiṣṭhāya prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi | mañjuśrīr āha—yasminn ahaṃ bhagavan samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi | apratiṣṭhito 'haṃ tasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi | bhagavān āha—apratiṣṭhitasya te mañjuśrīḥ kā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā | mañjuśrir āha—saiva bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yan na kvacit pratiṣṭhānam | bhagavān āha—yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi katarat te kuśalamūlaṃ tasmin samaya upacayaṃ gacchaty apacayaṃ vā | mañjuśrīr āha—na me bhagavan tasmin samaye kiñcit kuśalamūlam upacayaṃ gacchaty apacayaṃ vā | nāsau bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati yasya kasyacid dharmasyopacayo vāpacayo vā | na sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā veditavyā yā kasyacid dharmasyopacayāya vāpacayāya vā pratyupasthitā | sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmān jahāti nāpi buddhadharmān upādatte |

ityādi ||

yat sādhitaṃ mayā puṇyaṃ tenāstu jagataḥ sukham || SeNi 41 ||
commentary: samyaksekam ityādi | subodham ||

root:
samyaksekaṃ vidhāyaitad dhaṭhaduḥsekavarjitam |
yat sādhitaṃ mayā puṇyaṃ tenāstu jagataḥ sukham || SeNi 41 ||
commentary:
evam ātmabhāvādīnām utsargaṃ rakṣāṃ ca pratipādya punar vistareṇa rakṣāśodhanavardhanāni pratipādayitum upakramate. utpāditabodhicittena hi bodhisattvena utsṛṣṭasyāpi cātmabhāvasya rakṣāśodhanavardhanāni kāryāṇi. yasmāt-

	paribhogāya sattvānām ātmabhāvādi dīyate |
	arakṣite kuto bhogaḥ kiṃ dattaṃ yan na bhujyate ||

	tasmāt sattvopabhogārtham ātmabhāvādi pālayet |
	kalyāṇamitrānutsargāt sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadekṣaṇāt || (Sikṣāsamuccaya 5-6)

tac ca ātmabhāvādiparipālanādi śikṣārakṣaṇād eva syāt. anyathā narakādivinipātagamanāt tan na syāt. ata idam abhidhīyate.

śikṣyate upādīyate gṛhītasaṃvaraṇeneti vihiteṣu karaṇīyatā, pratiṣiddheṣv akaraṇaṃ śikṣā, tāṃ rakṣituṃ paripālayituṃ kāmena icchatā bodhisattvena ātmacittaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ prayatnata iti kathayiṣyamāṇāt. atha śikṣārakṣaṇādhikāre kim iti cittaṃ rakṣyata ity āha—na śikṣeti. anyathā śikṣaiva rakṣitumaśakyā calam anāyattaṃ cittam arakṣatā. cittasya calatāyāṃ śikṣāyāḥ sthairyāyogāt.

root:
vilakṣaṇam ato yuktaṃ hanta boddhuṃ tṛtīyake |
svasaṃvitter bhavet siddhir āgamārtho 'pi saṅgataḥ || SeNi 4 ||
commentary:
vilakṣaṇam ityādi | subodham ||

nanu lokaprasiddhibādhāyā abādhakatvāt katham "ālocanaṃ vimardaś cet" ityādinā bādhā darśitā | tad etad api bhavato 'asmadabhiprāyāparijñānaphalam | yato "viramānandaṃ jagac caiva" iti vimardasya jagadrūpatayā prastutabādhanena yathoktasarvāgamavighaṭanāt | ālocanam ityādigrantho 'pi vighaṭata evety ata ālocanam ityādinā bādhā darśitā | ata evāryanāgārjunapādair api caturmudrānvaye—

	paramaviramayor madhye lakṣyam vīkṣya dṛḍhīkuru |

iti bādhā darśitā | tarhi tvanmate

	ānandena sukhaṃ kiñcit paramānandaṃ tato 'dhikam |
	viramānandair virāgaḥ syāt sahajānandas tu śeṣataḥ || 

iti katham | tad apy evaṃ jñeyam | ānandaparamaviramaiḥ kiñcitsukhatadadhikavirāgāṇāṃ grahaṇāc cheṣataḥ pāriśeṣyatas tribhyo anyatayā sahajānando boddhavyaḥ | yadvānandaparamaviramasahaja ity anukramavaśād evam uktam | boddhavyas tu tṛtīya eva sahajaḥ |

yady evaṃ kuto bhagavatā suṣeka eva na darśitaḥ | kim ity āyāsabahulahaṭhasekaśaṅkāspadam ānandaparamaviramasahaja iti kramo darśitaḥ | tan na | pustakapāṇḍityanirāsakalyāṇamitrādhīnārthatvād eva kramadarśanasya | tad uktam—"kalyāṇamitrādhīnā hi bodhiḥ" | tathānyatra—"guruṇā tuṣṭena labhyate" iti | kiṃ cettham āgamavirodhena haṭhasekaṃ duḥsekaṃ ca dūṣayatā nirākārādivyavsthā na dūṣitaiva | tasyā āyojanamātrasya viruddhatvāt | ato nikhilavyavastheyaṃ vajradharāśvāsarūpasuṣekasiddhānta eva veditavyā | svasiddhānte haṭhaduḥsekavādino 'py evaṃ varṇayantīty etadartham atra darśitā ||

commentary:
adhunā ye karmamudrāyāṃ tathāgatāśvāsaṃ vajradharāśvāsam eva vā jñātvā santuṣṭā bhavanti tan nirākaraṇārtham āha—mahāmudrām ityādi | āmnāyena guruparamparayā yat tattvaṃ tato dviṣṭāḥ karmamudraiva tattvaṃ na dharmamudrādikam ity anuttarasambuddhadharmapratikṣepād yogino rauravaṃ yānti | rauravaśabdasyopalakṣaṇenānye 'py avīcyādayo nirayā grāhyāḥ | rauravādinirayagamanaṃ ca saddharmapratikṣepasaṃvartanīyam āryāṣṭasahasrikādisūtrāntādiṣu sphuṭam iti na pratanyate || 

nanu karmamudraiva tattvaṃ na bhavati kutaḥ |

	karmudrāṃ śaṭhāṃ krūrāṃ pāpiyasīm atibhīṣaṇāṃ |
									dūrataḥ parivarjayet ||

iti | tathā—

	naśvarī mānuṣī prajñā sukhaṃ tasyā viniśvaram |

ityāditantrapāṭhāt | 

	adṛṣṭaparamānandaḥ strīsukhaṃ bahumanyate |

iti pāṭhāc ca | 

	yathā darpaṇārpitaṃ mukhasya pratibimbaṃ mukhaṃ na bhavati | na pūrvasiddhaṃ nāpy adhunā siddhim | tad eva mukhapratibimbaṃ sādṛśyamātram āpādayati | tathāpi lokāḥ svamukhaṃ dṛṣṭam iti kṛtvā bhrāntyā santuṣṭā bhavanti | tathaivācāryāḥ kumatayaḥ prajñājñānam āsādya sahajam anubhūtam iti kṛtvā santoṣam utpādayanti | santuṣṭāś ca santo dharmamudrāyā vārttām api na jānanti |

ityādi caturmudrānvaya āryanāgārjunapādokteś ca |

	kecid dvayendriyajaṃ saukhyaṃ tattvam āhur narādhamāḥ |
	tac cāpi mahāsukhaṃ naiva pravadanti jinottamāḥ ||

nanv evam anekatantroktāyāḥ karmamudrāyāḥ pratikṣepād bhavato 'pi nirayagamanam āgatya militam | na | tasyāḥ prādhānyena tattvarūpatāmātram āgamoktyā dūṣitam | tadupayogas tu "karmamudrāṃ samāsādya" ityādinā kāraṇarūpatāpradarśanena khyāpita iti | kutas tatra pratikṣepa ity alaṃ bahunā | śeṣaṃ subodham ||

commentary: etad anantaraṃ duḥsekam āha—cumbanetyādi | darśanam ārabhya ghṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ yāvad bāhyakriyā vicitram | bolakakkolayogāt prabhṛti śaśino maṇeḥ pūrvaṃ yāvad āgamanaṃ ghṛṣṭis tatra vipākaḥ | ratne ruddhvā vakṣyamāṇasthānaṃ yāvad vilakṣaṇam iti ya evam āmananti te duḥsekasaṃvida iti | saṃśabdena tān upahasati ||

commentary:
paraguṇāmarṣaṇaṃ vārayann āha-

sarveṣāṃ hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭānāṃ sattvānām, sarve vopakramāḥ duḥkhaparihāreṇa tuṣṭayarthāḥ. sarvārambhapariśrameṇa tuṣṭir evotpādayitavyety arthaḥ. sā ca tuṣṭir dhanavisargair api durlabhā, syād vā na veti. iha punar ayatnasiddhopasthitā kasmāt parihīyata iti matvā bhokṣya anubhaviṣyāmi saṃtoṣasukham anyayatnaniṣpāditair guṇair upanāmitam. na hi priyaputraguṇair akṣamāyuktā. iti bhāvanayā paraguṇaśravaṇāc cittakārkaśyam apakuryāt.

commentary: teṣāṃ nirāsārtham āha—ratnetyādi | śivasyedaṃ śaivam | vedasyedaṃ vedam ||

root:
ratnagarbhe tu yā vittiḥ saiva tattvaṃ bhaved yadi |
śaivavedaṃ bhavet tattvaṃ na hy etad bauddhasammatam || SeNi 6 ||
commentary:
adhunā pratyekaṃ mudrāṇāṃ caturānandasvabhāvatām āha—ānandā ityādi | mudrāṃ mudrāṃ pratyānandāś catvāro mahāmudrāṃ vihāya jñeyāḥ | etadartham eva cāgamād ityādinā hetutrayam āha | tathā hy āgamaḥ—

	vicitre prathamānandaḥ paramānando vipākake |
	viramānando vimarde ca sahajānando vilakṣaṇe || 

ityādinā hevajrādiṣu vicitrādīnām ānandāditvam uktam | tataś ca yatraiva vicitrādisambhavas tatraivānandādivyavasthā | tatsambhavaś ca mudrātraya eva na mahāmudrāyām | ayaṃ cārthaḥ svasaṃvedanarūpaḥ sphuṭa eva | sadgurūpadeśaś ca vicitretyādivakṣyamāṇa iti ||

ratnapuram idaṃ devi kiñjalke jalatāṃ vrajet |
rudro yugme śivaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śaktiḥ saiva parātparā || Seni 7 ||
commentary: nanu śaivādīnāṃ kim etad asti | ata āha—ratnapuram ityādi | ratnaṃ maṇiḥ | tad eva puraṃ sthānaṃ yasya sukharūpābhimatasya tad ratnapuram | kiñjalke patitam | jalatāṃ niḥsāratām | rudro bhagavān | yugme samāpattau | śivaḥ kalyāṇāvāhakaḥ | ata eva śreṣṭhaḥ | saiva tattvaṃ śaktiś cidrūpā | parāc chreṣṭhāt parā śreṣṭhā tad eva ||

rudro yugme śivaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śaktiḥ saiva parātparā || Seni 7 ||
commentary:
yad uktaṃ kalyāṇamitrān utsargād iti tadāha.

kalyāṇakarmaṇy abhyudayaniḥśreyasaprāptilakṣaṇe mitram asādhāraṇo bandhuḥ, tat kāyajīvitavipraṇāśabhayabhīto 'pi na tyajet. kalyāṇamitrānuśaṃsāś ca prajñāpāramitāyām āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāṃ sadāpraruditaparivartād veditavyāḥ. caturdharmakasūtre 'py uktam—

	kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yāvajjīvaṃ na tyaktavyam api jīvitahetoḥ.

iti. aparityājyasya kalyāṇamitrasya lakṣaṇam āha bodhisattvaśikṣāsaṃvare vyavasthitam. mahāyānārthapaṇḍitam. etādṛśaṃ sudurlabham.

na santi tattvato bhāvāḥ śaktirūpeṇa bhāvitāḥ |
śaktis tu śūnyatādṛṣṭiḥ sarvāropavināśinī || SeNi 9 ||
commentary:
tad eva paraṃ viśvarūpam astīti darśayann āha—na santītyādi | bhāvā bāhyā rūpādayas tattvataḥ paramārthato na santi | kathaṃ tarhi nīlādipratibhāsaḥ | ata āha–śaktirūpeṇa bhāvitā iti | cicchaktisvabhāvaṃ gatāś cidātmāna ity arthaḥ | tarhi saiva paramārthasatī syāt | atas tan nirāsārtham āha—śaktir ityādi | subodham |

etad eva catuḥkoṭirahitam | tad uktaṃ bhargaśikāyāṃ śākteye tantra—

	na san na cāsat sadasan na ca tan nobhayojjhitam | 
	durvijñeyā hi sāvasthā kim apy etad anuttamam || 

iti |

root:
na santi tattvato bhāvāḥ śaktirūpeṇa bhāvitāḥ |
śaktis tu śūnyatādṛṣṭiḥ sarvāropavināśinī || SeNi 9 ||
commentary:
atityāgaṃ niṣedhayan punar ātmarakṣām upadarśayann āha.

satāṃ satpuruṣāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaḥ. laukikalokottaraparahitasukhavidhānam | tatsevakaṃ kāyam alpārthanimittaṃ na pīḍayet. anyathā mahato 'rtharāśer hāniḥ syāt. ata eva pūrvasmin hetupadam etat. kutaḥ punar evam? yasmād anenaiva sukumāropakrameṇa saṃvardhamānaḥ śīghram eva sattvānāṃ hitasukhasaṃpādanasamartho bhavati.

-- 5.67

yata evaṃ tasmāt svaśarīraśirodānādi na kartavyam iti niṣiddham. kadā? aśuddhe mitrāmitretarasarvavyasanijanasādhāraṇapravṛtte kṛpācitte. atyārabdhena hi vīryeṇa svaparahitārthasya bādhā syāt. samapravṛtte punar āśaye svaparātmano 'tirikte vā na niṣidhyate. yaduktam—tathā svaparabodhipakṣaśrutādyantarāyakarau tyāgātyāgau na kāryau. adhikasattvārthaśaktes tulyaśakter vā bodhisattvasyādhikatulyakuśalāntarāyakarau tyāgātyāgau na kāryāv iti siddhaṃ bhavati.

idam eva ca saṃdhāya bodhisattvaprātimokṣe 'bhihitam—

	yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputra abhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisattvo bodhyaṅgair abhiyuktaḥ, tena kathaṃ dānaṃ dātavyam, kataraṃ dānaṃ dātavyam, kiyadrūpaṃ dānaṃ dātavyam? peyālaṃ. dharmadāyakena bhavitavyam. yaś ca śāriputra gṛhī bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saptaratnaparipūrṇāni tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt, yaś ca śāriputra pravrajyāparyāpanno bodhisattvaḥ ekāṃ catuṣpadikāṃ gāthāṃ prakāśayet, ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati. na śāriputra tathāgatena pravrajitasyāmiṣadānamanujñātam. peyālaṃ. yasya punaḥ śāriputra pātrāgataḥ pātraparyāpanno lābho bhaved dhārmiko dharmalabdhaḥ, tena sādhāraṇabhājinā bhavitavyaṃ sārdhaṃ sabrahmacāribhiḥ

iti. tatraivāha-

	yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputra anabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisattvaḥ, tena dharma āsevitavyaḥ. tatra tenābhiyuktena bhavitavyam iti. anyathā hi ekasattvārthasaṃgrahārthaṃ mahataḥ sattvarāśes tasya ca sattvasya bodhisattvāśayaparikarmāntarāyān mahato 'rthasya hāniḥ kṛtā syād.

iti.

anenopāyakauśalena viharan na bodhimārgāt paribhraśyate. ayam abhiprāyaḥ—dattaḥ pūrvam evānenātmabhāvaḥ sarvasattvebhyaḥ. kevalam akālaparibhogāt parirakṣaṇīyaḥ. ato na mātsaryasyāvakāśaḥ. nāpi pratijñātārthahānir iti. yad uktam—

	bhaiṣajyavṛkṣasya sudarśanasya mūlādibhogyasya yathaiva bījam |
	datvāpi saṃrakṣyam akālabhogāt saṃbuddhabhaiṣajyataros tathaiva ||

iti.

commentary: mohacaritān adhikṛtyāha | mahāmahamahāmoha iti || mahāmaheti pūrvavat | mahāmoho vairocanaḥ | dhiyāṃ moho dhīmohaḥ | mūḍhaś cāsau dhī mohaś ca mūḍhadhīmohaḥ | tasya sūdano vināśakaḥ || krodhacaritān adhikṛtyāha | mahāmahamahākrodha iti | tathaiva mahāmaheti | mahākrodha ity amoghasiddhiḥ | mahākrodharipur mahān iti | sattvāsattvaviṣayatvād mahākrodhaḥ | tasya sa eva mahāripur iti ||

commentary: he svāmin tavcchaktipātasamāveśamayabhaktyānandāsvādam anāsādya, bodhasya parā dehapātaprāpyā prakṛṣṭāpi yā śāntaśivapadātmā daśā syāt kaiścit sambhāvyate, sā taiḥ sambhāvyamānā māṃ praty āsavasya yathā śuktatā paryuṣitatā tathā bhātīti yāvat | yatas tair bhaktyamṛtam anāsvādyaiva śuktīkṛtam | yaiḥ punar āsvādyate, taiḥ svacamatkārānandaviśrāntīkṛtatvāt kā śuktatāsambhāvanā? āsvādād iti lyablope pañcamī | athavā tvadbhaktyamṛtāsvādād api parā mokṣarūpā yā kācid daśāstīti sambhāvyate, sā mahyaṃ na rocate, bhaktyamṛtāsvādasyaiva niratiśayacamatkāravattvād ity evaṃparam etat |

root:

commentary: sphoṭo vikāśaḥ. moṭanaṃ saṅkocaḥ. te ubhe mudre, hevajreṇa kṛtatvād iti mahān saṃkṣepaḥ. tad dhyeyam ityādi. hevajrāhaṃkāriṇo yā kācit cintā tad eva dhyānam ity arthaḥ. yasmād iti dhyai cintāyām iti dhātupāṭhād ity abhiprāyaḥ. ukto mahāmokṣasukhalakṣaṇaḥ paramārtho yaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ, tasya sākṣātkaraṇaṃ bhāvanayā. bhāvanāpariniṣpattir mukhyaṃ dhyānam.

commentary:
asmād api saṃvegamanasikārāc cittasyānarthavivarjanena rakṣā vidhātavyety āha.

aticireṇa kālena labdham uktaṃ kṣaṇavaraṃ smaraṇena cetasi kṛtvā punaḥ punar antaraṃ sthirīkaromīdṛśam uktasvabhāvam. aprakampyaṃ kampayitum aśakyaṃ kāmādivitarkapavanaiḥ parvatarājavat.

evam etābhyāṃ śīlasamādhibhyām anyonyasaṃvardhakābhyāṃ cittakarmapariniṣpattiḥ. tasmād avasthitam etat—cittaparikarmaiva bodhisattvaśikṣā iti. tena yad uktam—

	cittarakṣāvrataṃ muktvā bahubhiḥ kiṃ mama vrataiḥ | (bodhi. 5.18)

iti, tat pariniṣṭhitam.

commentary: jayanti bhakti iti | bhaktipīyūṣarasa evāsavavaraḥ - utkṛṣṭaṃ pānaṃ, tena udgataharṣā ye te jayanti — sarvotkarṣeṇa vartante | kīdṛśāḥ | advitīyāḥ — addvitīyā asādhāraṇasvarūpā api tvaddvitīyāḥ — tvam eva dvitīyas tulyarūpo yeṣām | atha ca tvaddvitīyā api - bhaktisamāveśenātyantam abhedāsādhanatvāt tvam eva dvitīyaḥ - prabhutvena pariśīlito yeṣāṃ, tathābhūtā api advitīyāḥ—viśvābhedinaḥ | advitīyāś ca kathaṃ tvaddvitīyāḥ, tvaddvitīyāś ca katham advitīyā iti virodhacchāyā ||

commentary:
keṣāṃcit punar anyathāpi smṛtir utpadyate. tadupadarśayann āha.

ācāryopādhyāyasaṃnidhau tadanyatamārādhyabrahmacārisaṃnidhau vā saṃvasatāṃ tadanuśāsanyā, bhītya tadbhayenāpy ādaraḥ kāryeṣu sarvabhāvenābhimukhyam, avajñāpratipakṣo dharmaḥ. tatkāriṇāṃ yatnavatāṃ sukṛtināṃ tadanuśāsanīṃ hitāhitavidhipratiṣedhaniyamam anugṛhṇatāmakṛcchreṇaiva smṛtir utpadyate.
