commentary: pariharati śāstram iti | yadaivāsya śāstrasyedaṃ prayojanam ity uktaṃ tadaiva tayor upāyopeyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandho 'rthād ukta eva | na caivam arthaprāptam arthaṃ sūtrakārā akṣarair nibadhnanti asūtratvaprasaṅgād iti ||

root:
kṛtvā sākṣāt svādhipaṃ sātarūpaṃ
paścāt tyaktvā sātamātraṃ phalaṃ syāt |
śuddhaṃ sākṣāc chakyate naiva kartuṃ
tenākāro bhāvitaḥ svādhipasya || 10 ||
commentary:
kṛtvetyādi. svādhipaṃ sveṣṭadaivataṃ sākṣāt kṛtvāmukhīkṛtya sātarūpaṃ sukhaikasvabhāvam, paścād devatākāraṃ parityajya, sukhamātraṃ phalaṃ sādhyaṃ vyavasthitaṃ syāt.

nanu yadi sākṣāt kṛtvāpi devatākāras tyaktavyaḥ, tarhi prathamam eva kasmād vibhāvitaḥ? sukhamātram eva dvitīyasādhyavat kiṃ na vibhāvitam? kiṃ vṛthāprayāsenety āha—śuddham ityādi. śuddhaṃ kevalaṃ devatākāravirahitaṃ sukhamātraṃ naiva sākṣāt kartuṃ śakyate, ākārarahitasya sukhasyānupalambhāt. tasmāt tena kāraṇenākāro bhāvitaḥ svādhipasyeti tṛtīyam. ayam arthaḥ—devatākārasaṃvalitam eva sukhaṃ vibhāvya, sākṣātkṛte devatākāraṃ tyaktvā, sukhamātram eva sādhyam uktaguṇam.

root:
kṛtvā sākṣāt svādhipaṃ sātarūpaṃ
paścāt tyaktvā sātamātraṃ phalaṃ syāt |
śuddhaṃ sākṣāc chakyate naiva kartuṃ
tenākāro bhāvitaḥ svādhipasya || 10 ||
commentary: sthitveti || he megha, vane caranti te vanacarāḥ || tatpuruṣe kṛti bahulam" iti bahulagrahaṇād lug bhavati || teṣāṃ vadhūbhir muktāḥ kuñjā latāgṛhā yatra tasmin || nikuñjakuñjau vā klībe latādipihitodare ity amaraḥ || tatra te nayanavinodo 'stīty arthaḥ | tasmin āmrakūṭe muhūrtam alpakālam | na tu ciraṃ svakāryavirodhād iti bhāvaḥ || "muhūrtam alpakāle syād ghaṭikādvitaye 'pi ca" iti śabdārṇave || sthitvā viśramya | toyotsargeṇa "tvām āsāra-" ity uktavarṣeṇena drutataragatir lāghavād dhetor atikṣipragamanaḥ san | tasmād āmrakūṭāt param anantaraṃ tatparaṃ vartma mārgaṃ tīrṇo 'tikrāntaḥ | upalaiḥ pāṣāṇair viṣame vindhyasyādreḥ pāde prasyantaparvate || "pādāḥ pratyantaparvatāḥ" ity amaraḥ || viśīrṇāṃ samantato visṛmarām || etena kasyāścit kāmukyā priyatamacaraṇapāto 'pi dhvanyate || revāṃ narmadām || "revā tu narmadā somodbhavā mekhalakanyakā" ity amaraḥ || gajasyāṅge śarīre bhaktayo racanāḥ | revā iti yāvat || "bhaktir niṣevaṇe bhāge racanāyām" iti śabdārṇave || tāsāṃ chedair bhaṅgibhir bhābhir viracitāṃ bhūtiṃ śṛṅgāram iva bhasitam iva vā || "bhūtir mātaṅgaśṛṅgāre jātau bhasmani saṃpadi" iti viśvaḥ || drakṣyasi | ayam api mahāṃs te nayana kautukalābha iti bhāvaḥ ||

root:

sphuradamitamunīndraiḥ sarvasattvārthakāri
pravadati punar anyaḥ sādhyam ucchedaśūnyam || 11 ||
commentary:
gaganetyādi. gaganasamaṃ māyopamaṃ vicārāsahaṃ śarīraṃ yasya. lakṣaṇair dvātriṃśadbhir aśītibhiś cānuvyañjanair maṇḍitāny aṅgāni yasya. nirupamaiḥ sthaulyanairantaryāsaṃsārapravāhitvanirāsravatvādibhir upamābhāvād upamātikrāntaiḥ sukhaiḥ pūrṇaṃ romāgraparyantaṃ saṃpūrṇam. svābhayā ca tathābhūtayā saṃgataṃ samāliṅgitam. sphuradbhir anantanirmitair munīndrais tathābhūtair eva sarvasattvārthakāri. ucchedeneti nirodhena śūnyaṃ tucchaṃ riktam.

etad uktaṃ bhavati—gaganamāyāmarīcigandharvanagarodakacandrapratibimbasvapnopamam ekānekabhāvābhāvagrāhyagrāhakasvabhāvarahitam anādyantam aśeṣavastusaṃdohasvabhāvam anābhāsaṃ nirañjanaṃ sarvopamātikrāntaṃ paramasūkṣmātigambhīraprajñārūpatayā dharmakāyasvabhāvam, dvātriṃśallakṣaṇavibhūṣitaśarīram aśītyanuvyañjanavirājitagātraṃ paramaśṛṅgārayauvanādyupetaṃ svābhāṅganāliṅgitāṅgaṃ rūpavajrāditārāparyantadevīgaṇair anantaprabhedānimittaratisvarūpaparamānandopabhogadvāreṇa pratibimbavat sambhujyamānaṃ karuṇāsaṃvalitodārarūpatayā sambhogakāyarūpam, nānādhimuktivineyajanaparipācanārtham anekavidhaprātihāryadvāreṇa nirmitānantakulāntarbhūtasaṃbuddhabodhisattvaspharaṇasaṃhārakāritvena nirmāṇakāyātmakam, śūnyatākaruṇābhinnabodhicittasvabhāvāmalaprajñopāyasamādhisambhūtasatsukhāpūrṇam āsaṃsārasthitidharmaṃ apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇarūpaṃ nirmalanivātaniścalapradīpaśikhāprabandhanityatayā nirodhaśūnyaṃ caturthaṃ sādhyam.

root:
gaganasamaśarīraṃ lakṣaṇair bhūṣitāṅgaṃ
nirupamasukhapūrṇaṃ svābhayā saṃgataṃ ca |
sphuradamitamunīndraiḥ sarvasattvārthakāri
pravadati punar anyaḥ sādhyam ucchedaśūnyam || 11 ||
commentary: tantrasyāvatāraṇas upodghātaḥ prastāvanety ekārthaḥ | tat pradhānaṃ paṭalaḥ paricchedaḥ || iti prathamapaṭalavyākhyā ||

root:
kṛtvā sākṣāt svādhipaṃ sātarūpaṃ
tyaktvopekṣājñānamātraṃ phalaṃ syāt |
āsaṃsārasthāyi sattvārthakāri
cintāratnaprakhyam ekāntaśāntam || 12 ||
commentary: kṛtvetyādi. sākṣāt svādhipaṃ kṛtvā, paścāt tyaktvā, upekṣārūpaṃ yaj jñānaṃ tanmātraṃ sādhyaṃ syāt. anyat sugamam. etad uktaṃ bhavati—maṇḍalacakrarūpaṃ sākṣāt kṛtvā, paścāt tan nirodhya, upekṣājñānamātraṃ sādhyaṃ syāt pañcamam.

āsaṃsārasthāyi sattvārthakāri

commentary: pariharati śāstram iti | yadaivāsya śāstrasyedaṃ prayojanam ity uktaṃ tadaiva tayor upāyopeyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandho 'rthād ukta eva | na caivam arthaprāptam arthaṃ sūtrakārā akṣarair nibadhnanti asūtratvaprasaṅgād iti ||

root:
kṛtvā sākṣān maṇḍalaṃ sātarūpaṃ
paścāt tasya svecchayā nirvṛtiś ca |
sattvārthasyāpy asty abhāvo na cāsmin
prādurbhāvo nirvṛtād asti yasmāt || 13 ||
commentary:
kṛtvetyādi. kṛtvā sākṣān maṇḍalaṃ sātasaṃvalitam, tasya svecchayā nirvṛtir nirodhaḥ.

nanu yadi sākṣāt kṛtvāpi paścāt svecchayā nirodhayitavyam, tadā karuṇāyā anekakālābhyastāyā abhāvaḥ syāt. tasyāś cābhāvāt sattvārthābhāvaḥ syād ity āśaṅkyāha—sattvārthasyāpy asty abhāvo na cetyādi. asmin pakṣe sattvārthābhāvo nāsti, yasmān nirvṛtāc cakrāt karuṇāsaṃvalitāt sattvārthasya prādurbhāvo 'sti.

etenaitad evāha—sātasaṃpūrṇacakraṃ sākṣāt kṛtvā, yāvadiṣṭaṃ kālaṃ vyavasthāpya, paścāt tasya sarvathaiva pradīpavan nirodhaṃ kṛtvā sthātavyam. yadā punaḥ sattvārthābhilāṣo bhavati, tadā niruddhād eva cakrāntaram utpādya sattvārthaḥ kartavyaḥ. cakrāntarotpāde 'pi ciraniruddhād eva cakrād yathābhavyatayā vineyānāṃ yathābhilaṣitaprāptir bhavatīti ṣaṣṭham.

root:
kṛtvā sākṣān maṇḍalaṃ sātarūpaṃ
paścāt tasya svecchayā nirvṛtiś ca |
sattvārthasyāpy asty abhāvo na cāsmin
prādurbhāvo nirvṛtād asti yasmāt || 13 ||
commentary: triṣu kāmarūpyārūpyadhātuṣu | durlabhaṃ dīpankarānantaraṃ vipaśyādibhir buddhair adeśitatvāt | aśrutam iti gurunirapekṣārthāvagateḥ | nanu yady evaṃ syāt ko doṣaḥ | buddhājñālaṅghanam eva | atha pratirūpo gurur na prāpyate | arthāvagatiś ca bhavati | tadāvaśyaṃ buddhabodhisattvādipratimāyā agrataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā yāvat parisamāptaṃ tāvad uddeśayet | etad api bhagavatā anujñātam | etat tvayābhāvād aśrutaṃ bhavati | adhogatiṃ narakagatim ||

root:
kṛtvā sphuṭaṃ rūpam abhīṣṭam eṣāṃ
paścān nirodhaṃ phalam āha kaścit |
abhinnarūpaś ca yato nirodho
na pakṣabhede 'pi tato 'sti bhedaḥ || 14 ||
commentary:
kṛtvetyādi. ṣaṇṇāṃ pakṣāṇām anyatamasya phalasya sādhyatvād yad yad evābhiṣṭaṃ tad eva sākṣāt kṛtvā, paścāt sarvathaiva pradīpavan nirodha uttarakālaṃ sattvārthādiśūnyaḥ sākṣāt kartavyaḥ.

nanu ṣaṭpakṣabhedena ṣaḍ eva nirodhāḥ syuḥ. tat katham eka eva nirodha ity āśaṅkyāha—abhinnetyādi. abhinnaṃ rūpaṃ yasya sa tathā. na hi nirodhānāṃ ṣaṭpakṣalakṣaṇabhede 'pi bhedo 'sti, abhāvaikarūpatayā nirodhasya samānatvāt. ayam arthaḥ—anyatamapakṣaṃ sākṣāt kṛtvā, paścāt tasya santānocchedarūpo nirodha iti saptamaṃ sādhyam.

root:
kṛtvā sphuṭaṃ rūpam abhīṣṭam eṣāṃ
paścān nirodhaṃ phalam āha kaścit |
abhinnarūpaś ca yato nirodho
na pakṣabhede 'pi tato 'sti bhedaḥ || 14 ||
commentary:
kalyāṇamitrasya paryupāsanaparijñānārtham āha.

śrīsaṃbhavavimokṣād āryagaṇḍavyūhaparivartāt kalyāṇamitraparyupāsanaṃ śikṣet jānīyāt. yathoktam āryagaṇḍavyūhe āryaśrīsaṃbhavena- 

	kalyāṇamitrasaṃdhāritāḥ kulaputra bodhisattvā na patanti durgatiṣu. yāvat saṃcodakāḥ kalyāṇamitrā akaraṇīyānām. saṃnivārakāḥ pramādasthānāt. niṣkāsayitāraḥ saṃsārapurāt. tasmāt tarhi kulaputra evaṃmanasikārāpratiprasrabdhena kalyāṇamitrāṇy upasaṃkramitavyāni. pṛthivīsamacittena sarvabhārodvahanāparitasanatayā. vajrasamacittenābhedyāśayatayā. cakravālasamacittena sarvaduḥkhāsaṃpravedhanatayā. lokadāsasamacittena sarvakarmasamādānāvijugupsanatayā. rajoharaṇasamacittena mānābhimānavivarjanatayā. yānasamacittena gurubhāranirvāhanatayā. aśvasamacittena akrudhyanatayā. nausamacittena gamanāgamanāparitasanatayā. suputrasadṛśena kalyāṇamitramukhavīkṣaṇatayā. ātmani ca te kulaputra āturasaṃjñotpādayitavyā kalyāṇamitreṣu ca vaidyasaṃjñā, anuśāsanīṣu bhaiṣajyasaṃjñā, pratipattiṣu vyādhinirghātanasaṃjñā. ātmani ca te kulaputra bhīrusaṃjñotpādayitavyā, kalyāṇamitreṣu śūrasaṃjñā, anuśāsanīṣu praharaṇasaṃjñā, pratipattiṣu śatrunirghātanasaṃjñā.

yad uktaṃ sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadekṣaṇād iti tad upadarśayitum āha. etad iha śāstre pratipāditam, anyad yad iha noktam. buddhena bhagavatā bodhisattvānāṃ karaṇīyatayā nirdiṣṭam, tan nānāsūtrāntārthaparicayād veditavyam.

root:
prajñājñānād uttaraṃ bodhicittā-
svādaṃ turyaṃ sekam āhāvaraṃ tat |
yasmāt sarvo bhāvanāsu prayāso
vyarthaḥ prāptas tatphalasya prasiddheḥ || 15 ||
commentary: prajñājñānetyādi. prajñājñānopadeśād uttarakālaṃ yat bodhicittasyāmṛtarūpasya rasanayā grahaṇam, tat turyaṃ caturthaṃ sekam āha kaścit. tac cāvaraṃ hīnam, vinikṛṣṭam iti yāvat. kasmād avaram? yasmāt sarvaprayāso mantramudrādevatādyākārabhāvanāsu punaḥpunaranuṣṭhānalakṣaṇas tathāgatokto vyarthaḥ prāptaḥ. kutaḥ? tatphalasya bhāvanāsādhyasya phalasya bodhicittāsvādakāla eva prasiddhatvāt prāptatvāt, anyasya viśiṣṭasya phalasyābhāvād iti yāvat.

root:
prajñājñānād uttaraṃ bodhicittā-
svādaṃ turyaṃ sekam āhāvaraṃ tat |
yasmāt sarvo bhāvanāsu prayāso
vyarthaḥ prāptas tatphalasya prasiddheḥ || 15 ||
commentary:
evaṃ tāvad anayor anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ guṇadoṣāv abhidhāya, anarthavivarjanārthaṃ niṣphalaspandavarjanam āha.

prathamaṃ tāvad idaṃ cittam ity adhyātmani cintayati. sarvakālam īdṛśam uktakramayuktam upasthāpayitavyam. tataḥ paraṃ niṣphalaspandavarjanārtham apagatakaraṇagrāmeṇeva niṣphalarūpādiviṣayagrahaṇasarvavikalpopasaṃhārān mayā sthātavyam. kim iva? kāṣṭhavat, cakṣurādivyāpāraśūnyatvāt.

root:
prajñājñānād uttaraṃ prāptarāmā-
svādaṃ turyaṃ sekam āhādhamaṃ tat |
yasmāt sarvo bhāvanādau prayatno
buddhoddiṣṭo niṣphalaḥ saṃprasaktaḥ || 16 ||
commentary: prajñetyādi. prajñājñānād uttarakālaṃ yāḥ prāptā yathāmilitā rāmāḥ striyas tāsāṃ samāpattidvāreṇa ya āsvādaḥ, taṃ turyaṃ sekam. tad apy adhamam. śeṣaṃ gatārtham.

commentary: māyājāletyādi | asmin māyājālamahātantre 'meyair mahāvajradharair mahāmantradhāribhir hṛṣtair yā saṃpragīyate tāṃ ||

root:
pañcapradīpāmṛtabinducandra-
bhrūmadhyabindūdbhavamaṇḍalāni |
vāyoḥ svarūpaṃ galaśuṇḍikādyam
atattvarūpaṃ svayam ūhanīyam || 18 ||
commentary:
pañcapradīpetyādi. pañcapradīpaśabdena gokudahanalakṣaṇasya, amṛtaśabdena vimūmāraśulakṣaṇasya satatānuṣṭhānam eva sādhyaṃ manyante. bindur iti hṛccandrasthaṃ binduṃ dedīpyamānaṃ tattvaṃ sādhyaṃ ceti kṛtvā kecid bhāvayanti. candra iti hṛdisthaṃ kalārūpam ardhacandraṃ vā hṛtkamalasthaṃ kecid bhāvayanti.

bhrūmadhyabindūdbhavamaṇḍalānīti bhruvor madhya ūrṇāyāṃ binduṃ vibhāvya tadbindūdbhavāni maṇḍalāni vāyuvāruṇamāhendrāgneyalakṣaṇāni. etad uktaṃ bhavati—mukhaśravaṇacakṣurghrāṇāni hastāṅgulībhiḥ pidhāya bhrūmadhyabindur draṣṭavyaḥ. tasya sphuṭāvasthāyāṃ śubhāśubhanimittasaṃsūcakāni māhendrādimaṇḍalāny upajāyante. taṃ ca binduṃ tattvam iti manyante.

vāyoḥ svarūpam iti pūrakakumbhakarecakapraśāntakalakṣaṇam ānāpānādilakṣaṇaṃ ceti. etad uktaṃ bhavati—śaivasāṃkhyādinirdiṣṭaṃ vāyusvarūpaṃ jñātvā taṃ vāyuṃ nirodhabhāvanayā sthirīkṛtyākāśa utplutya gamanaṃ parapurapraveśaṃ yāvan muktiṃ ca sākṣāt kurvanti vāyuvādinaḥ.

galaśuṇḍiketi. galapradeśe jihvāmūlopari hastiśuṇḍikākārā adhaḥpralambamānā upajihvāsaṃjñikā galaśuṇḍikāsti. sā ca śaktirūpā. tadadhaḥ śivarūpam asti tattvam. sā ca jihvāgreṇa spṛśyamānā nirantaraṃ amṛtaṃ sravati. tena ca ghargharāmṛtavarṣaṇena santarpyamānam ātmānaṃ dhyāyād iti galaśuṇḍikātattvam. ādiśabdena hṛnmadhyaṣoḍaśanāḍikācakramadhyasthajñānasvarūpaṃ śivarūpaṃ tattvaṃ bhāvayitavyam ityādīnāṃ parigrahaḥ.

tat sarvaṃ tīrthikādibhis tattvarūpeṇābhimatam atattvam iti svayam evohanīyaṃ vicāraṇīyam iti yāvat.

root:
pañcapradīpāmṛtabinducandra-
bhrūmadhyabindūdbhavamaṇḍalāni |
vāyoḥ svarūpaṃ galaśuṇḍikādyam
atattvarūpaṃ svayam ūhanīyam || 18 ||
commentary:
smṛtim adhikṛtyādhunā prāha.

yataḥ smṛter abhāve dūṣaṇam evaṃ syāt. tasmād idam atra doṣaṃ paśyatā smṛtir ālabambhanāsaṃpramoṣalakṣaṇā manodvārān manogṛhapraveśamārgāt nāpaneyā nāpasāryā, sadāvasthāpayitavyety arthaḥ. atha kadācit pramādatas tato 'pagacchet, tadā gatāpi punar nirvartyopasthāpyā tatraivāropayitavyā. katham? saṃsmṛtya manasi nidhāya āpāyikīṃ narakādidurgativyathām.

tatra dvādaśemāḥ smṛtayo niṣphalaspandavarjanārthaṃ tathāgatājñānatikramānupālanavipākagauravasmṛtiprabhṛtayaḥ śikṣāsamuccaye pradarśitāḥ. tata eva vivekenāvadhāryāḥ.

sāpi smṛtis tīvrādarāt samutpadyate. ādaro 'pi śamathamāhātmyam avagamya ātāpena jāyate. etac ca yathāvasaraṃ vakṣyāmaḥ.

root:
svapnendrajālapratibimbamāyā-
marīcigandharvapurāmbucandraiḥ |
anyaiś ca śabdair upamābhidheyair
naivāsti sādhyaṃ kathitād ihānyat || 19 ||
commentary: svapnendrajāletyādi. svapnendrajālopamaṃ pratibimbamāyāmarīcigandharvanagarodakacandropamam iti śabdaiḥ, anyaiś ca gaganapratiśrutkaphenopamam ityādiśabdair upamābhidheyair upamāvācakair naivāsti sādhyaṃ kathitāt sādhyād anyat. paraṃ kathita eva sādhya ete śabdāḥ pravartanta iti svayaṃ boddhavyam.

marīcigandharvapurāmbucandraiḥ |
anyaiś ca śabdair upamābhidheyair
naivāsti sādhyaṃ kathitād ihānyat || 19 ||
commentary: tantrasyāvatāraṇas upodghātaḥ prastāvanety ekārthaḥ | tat pradhānaṃ paṭalaḥ paricchedaḥ || iti prathamapaṭalavyākhyā ||

root:
anupamasukharūpī śrīnivāso 'nivāso
nirupamadaśadevīrūpavidyaḥ savidyaḥ |
tribhuvanahitasaukhyaprāptikāro 'vikāro
jayati kamalapāṇir yāvad āśāvikāśāḥ || 1 ||
commentary:
anupametyādi. kamalaṃ padmaṃ pāṇau yasya sa kamalapāṇir avalokiteśvaro bhagavāñ jayatīti sambandhaḥ. kiṃviśiṣṭaḥ? anupamam ity atipraṇītatvamahattvāsaṃsārasthāyitvalakṣaṇair dharmair yuktasyānyasyābhāvād upamārahitaṃ sukham eva rūpaṃ svabhāvo yasya sa tathoktaḥ. punar api kiṃviśiṣṭaḥ? śrīḥ puṇyajñānasambhāralakṣaṇā, tasyā nivāsa āśrayo yaḥ sa tathā. dharmakāyarūpatvena sarvagatatvāt pratiniyatanivāsābhāvād anivāsaḥ.

punaḥ kīdṛśaḥ? nirupamāḥ paramarūpayauvanaśṛṅgārādirasamahākaruṇādiyuktatvenopamātikrāntā rūpavajrāditārāparyantadaśadevīrūpā vidyāḥ parivārakatvena yasya sa tathā. saha svābhārūpayā vidyayā vartata iti savidyaḥ. tribhuvanasya tribhuvanavartino janasya yad dhitam āyatipathyaṃ buddhatvādikaṃ, saukhyaṃ tadātve pathyaṃ cakravartitvādikam, tayor yā prāptiḥ sākṣātkriyā, tasyāḥ karaṇaṃ kāro yasya sa tathā. aparinirvāṇadharmakatvenāpratiṣṭhitanirvāṇarūpatvenānyathātvalakṣaṇasya vikārasyābhāvād avikāraḥ. evaṃviśiṣṭo bhagavāñ jayati.

kiyantaṃ kālam ity āha—yāvad āśāvikāśāḥ. āśā daśa diśo gaganasvarūpāḥ. yadvā āśāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ bhavabhogatṛṣṇāḥ. tāsāṃ vikāśā avakāśāḥ pravartanāni, prādurbhāvā iti yāvat. te yāvat tāvad bhagavāñ jayati, sarvebhyo hariharahiraṇyagarbhādibhyaḥ prakṛṣṭo bhavatīty arthaḥ.

atrānupamasukharūpīty anena svārthasaṃpattiḥ kathitā. śrīnivāsa ity anena tadupāyaḥ, puṇyajñānasambhārayoḥ śrīśabdenābhihitatvāt. tribhuvanahitasaukhyaprāptikāra ity anena parārthasaṃpattir uktā. nirupamadaśadevīrūpavidyaḥ savidya ity anena tadupāyaḥ, tathābhūtadaśadevīdvātriṃśallakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanakāyākāraśūnyena sarvākāraparārthasaṃpatteḥ kartum aśakyatvād iti.

tribhuvanahitasaukhyaprāptikāro 'vikāro
jayati kamalapāṇir yāvad āśāvikāśāḥ || 1 ||
commentary: iti manasi nidhāya tathaiva saṃyatātmā tiṣṭhet. trapādarabhayānvitaḥ—apratirūpe karmaṇi trapā lajjā, śikṣāyām ādaraḥ, tadatikrame bhayam. buddhabodhisattveṣv eva vā trapādayaḥ. evaṃ sati aparo 'pi viśeṣaḥ syād ity āha—buddhetyādi. tad evaṃ viharatas tasya pratikṣaṇam akāmata eva buddhānusmṛtiḥ syāt.

gambhīraśūnyapratibhāsamātra-

nirlepanīrūpanirañjanādyair
bhrāntir na kāryāparasādhyasattve || 20 ||
commentary: gambhīraśūnyaṃ pratibhāsamātraṃ śāntātisūkṣmam anabhilāpyaṃ nirlepaṃ nīrupam nirañjanādi, ādiśabdāt śivaṃ nirākāraṃ niṣprapañcam anādinidhanam ityādiśabdair bhrāntir na kartavyāparasādhyasattve 'parasya sādhyasya sattve sattāyām. ebhiḥ śabdair eva param api kiñcit sādhyaṃ kathitād astīti bhrāntir na kartavyā. athavā nātikathitam eva sādhyam ebhiḥ sarvair abhidhīyata iti niścayaḥ.

commentary:

commentary: śrīmantranītiśabdena sāmānyayogatantravācakenāpi śrīsamājaḥ parigṛhyate, caturthārthakasyānyatrāsambhavāt. śeṣaṃ subodham. nānācāryopadeśagaṇasaṃkulair vyākulaiḥ saptabhir bhedaiḥ prakārair atītānāgatavartamānācāryagatopadeśarāśisaṃgrāhakaiḥ. sphuṭāvagataye sukhena sphuṭapratītyartham iti.

sambhrāntabodhā nikhilā hi tīrthyās
tattvasya sādhyasya ca rūpavittau |
tebhyaḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ kila tattvavettā
vedāntavādīti janapravādaḥ || 3 ||
commentary:
sambhrāntetyādi. sambhrānto vibhrānto bodhaḥ prajñāviśeṣo yeṣāṃ tīrthikānāṃ te tathoktāḥ. sarva eva tīrthyā ātmātmīyagrahatimiropahatabuddhinayanāḥ. tattvam idam iti sādhyam cedam iti tattvasya sādhyasya yat svarūpam, tasya yā vittiḥ pratītiḥ, tasyāṃ bhrāntāḥ. śeṣaṃ subodham.

nanu tattvasādhyayor upādeyatvenaikarūpatvāt kathaṃ tattvasya sādhyasya ceti bhedena nirdeśa iti cet. asad etat. tattvaṃ hy upādeyatve 'pi sukhaduḥkhopekṣādisakalapratibhāsasaṃdohavyāpakam. sādhyaṃ cānabhimataparihāreṇecchālakṣaṇaṃ phalam upādeyatve 'pi sakalaprāṇibhir avaśyam evāsādhyavyāvṛttyā sādhayitavyatvenābhimatam ity adoṣaḥ.

tatra tāvad vedāntavādyabhimataṃ sādhyam āha—ānandarūpam ityādi.

root:
sambhrāntabodhā nikhilā hi tīrthyās
tattvasya sādhyasya ca rūpavittau |
tebhyaḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ kila tattvavettā
vedāntavādīti janapravādaḥ || 3 ||
commentary:
evaṃ tāvad anayor anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ guṇadoṣāv abhidhāya, anarthavivarjanārthaṃ niṣphalaspandavarjanam āha.

prathamaṃ tāvad idaṃ cittam ity adhyātmani cintayati. sarvakālam īdṛśam uktakramayuktam upasthāpayitavyam. tataḥ paraṃ niṣphalaspandavarjanārtham apagatakaraṇagrāmeṇeva niṣphalarūpādiviṣayagrahaṇasarvavikalpopasaṃhārān mayā sthātavyam. kim iva? kāṣṭhavat, cakṣurādivyāpāraśūnyatvāt.

root:
ānandarūpaṃ svavid aprakampyaṃ
vedāntinaḥ sādhyam uṣanti śāntam |
saśrāvakāḥ khaḍgajināś ca sādhyam
icchanti rūpādyupadher virāmam || 4 ||
commentary:
ānandarūpam iti sadā sukhamayatvāt. svavid iti jyotīrūpatvena svayaṃ prakāśamānatvāt. aprakampyam ity anityatayā kampayitum aśakyatvāt. śāntam iti kleśopakleśaśūnyatvena parikalpitatvāt. evaṃvidhaṃ sādhyam uṣanti kāmayante.

saha śrāvakair vartante ye khaḍgajināḥ khaḍgaviṣāṇakalpā ekacāriṇo vargacāriṇaś ca pratyekabuddhās te sādhyam icchanti. kīdṛśam? rūpādyupadher virāmaṃ rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānalakṣaṇānām upadhīnāṃ skandhānāṃ virāmaṃ vicchedam, nirodham iti yāvat. etad uktaṃ bhavati—sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāḥ sopadhiśeṣanirupadhiśeṣabhedena bhinne 'pi nirvāṇe nirupadhiśeṣam eva nirvāṇaṃ sākṣātkartavyatve-na sādhyaṃ pratipannāḥ.

root:
ānandarūpaṃ svavid aprakampyaṃ
vedāntinaḥ sādhyam uṣanti śāntam |
saśrāvakāḥ khaḍgajināś ca sādhyam
icchanti rūpādyupadher virāmam || 4 ||
commentary:
uktau dvau devatāyogau samāhitaḥ sandhyāsu, asamāhitaḥ sandhyāntarāleṣu. tattvayogo vaktavyaḥ, yatas tribhir vinā nāsti śīghrataraṃ bodhiḥ. ata āha—tattvetyādi. tattvasya dyotakaḥ paṭalas tattvapaṭalaḥ.

rūpaṃ nīlapītādi. tan nāsti na vidyate. kathaṃ nāsti? svarūpeana—yad asya svarūpaṃ bālaiḥ kalpyate darśanagrāhyaṃ[^1] [ms-a fol. 35r] vastubhūtam, tena nāsti, [ms-c fol. 25r] ekānekasvabhāvavirahāt. kevalaṃ bhrāntā buddhir bālānām asataiva tena tenākāreṇa khyāti svapnādāv iva. rūpābhāve na kaścid rūpaṃ paśyatīti draṣṭā 'pi nāsti. tenāha—na draṣṭā ceti. na draṣṭety arthaḥ. draṣṭā cakṣurdhātur draṣṭā puruṣo dvāv api svarūpeṇa na staḥ. yad anayoḥ svarūpaṃ vastugrāhakaṃ bālair vikalpyate tena na staḥ. evaṃ yāvan na sparśo nāpi spraṣṭā ca. iyatā daśāyatanāni rūpacakṣurādīni. draṣṭādirūpaś ca pudgalo nāstīty uktam.

na cittam iti vijñānalakṣaṇaṃ cittam. vijānātīti vijñānaṃ ṣaḍvijñānakāyāś cakṣurvijñānadhātur yāvan manovijñānadhātuḥ. etāny eva samanantarātītāni manodhātuḥ. saptaite vijñānadhātavo manaāyatanam. yaś ca ṣaḍbhir vijñānair vijñātā pudgalaḥ, so 'pi vijānātīti vijñānam. tataḥ so 'pi cittaśabdenoktaḥ. tad ubhayaṃ [ms-a, begins 35v, begin °sti] nāsti, tayor grāhakalakṣaṇatvāt, grāhyābhāve ca grāhakāyogāt.

kasmād grāhyaṃ nāsti? ekānekasvabhāvavirahāt. siddha eṣa hetuḥ sāvayaveṣu daśasvāyataneṣu niraṃśeṣu ca paramāṇuṣu. paramāṇumātre 'pi sthūlapratibhāsāyogāt.

dharmāyatane tu yāni dravyāṇi teṣu niraṃśeṣu pratibhāsamānarūpasyotpatter asiddho hetuḥ, tasmān na dharmāyatanaṃ nāstīty ata āha—na caittikam iti. cittasya viṣayaś caittikaṃ dharmāyatanam, tad api nāsti. akṣaṇikānām anyatra nirākṛtatvāt, kṣaṇikānām api grāhyatvāyogāt, atītānāgatānām asattvena vartamānānām akāraṇatvenāgrāhyalakṣaṇatvāc ca viṣayasya. yadi tarhi dvayarūpeṇa na santi, dvādaśāyatanāni pudgalaś ca kena rūpeṇa santi? dvayapratibhāsinā bhrāntirūpeṇa dravyataḥ santi, tena pratītyasamutpannatvāt. yat punar eṣāṃ rūpaṃ dvayaśūnyatā vijñaptimātratā prakāśamātratā sarvatra samarasā, tenaite paramārthataḥ santi. tad dhi paramārthaḥ paramasya lokottarajñānasyārtho viṣayaḥ. tatra dvayasaṃgṛhītaṃ rūpaṃ nāstīti parijñeyam, tadastitvābhiniveśasyaiva sarvānarthamūlatvāt. dvayapratibhāsi bhrāntirūpaṃ prahātavyam, bhrāntiprabhedatvāt sarvānarthānām. dvayaśūnyatārūpaṃ punar eṣāṃ pratyakṣīkartavyam, tatpratyakṣasyaiva samyagjñānarūpatvāt, tasya ca sarvabhrāntipratipakṣatvāt, krameṇa mahāsukhamahāmokṣasakalabuddhaguṇavaśitvasādhanatvāc ca. so 'pi mahāmokṣaḥ paramārthaḥ paramaphalatvāt tad api samyagjñānaṃ paramārthaḥ paramo 'rtho 'syeti kṛtvā. iyatā tathatātattvam uktam.

ākāraśūnyaṃ gaganendurūpaṃ
pratyātmavedyaṃ karuṇārasaṃ ca |
sallakṣaṇair bhūṣitam arthakāri
dānādiniṣyandam apetasaukhyam || 5 ||
commentary:
idānīṃ pāramitānayavādinām abhimataṃ caturvidhaṃ sādhyam āha—ākāraśūnyam ityādi.

ākārair nīlapītasukhaduḥkhādibhiś citrarūpaiḥ śūnyaṃ nirākāram. ata eva gaganasyeva nirākāratvenendor iva prabhāsvaratvena rūpaṃ svabhāvo yasya tat tathā. pratyātmavedyam iti svasaṃvedanaikavedyam. karuṇā duḥkhād duḥkhahetor vā sakalajagadabhyuddharaṇakāmatā. saiva rasaḥ svabhāvo yasya tat tathoktam. etad uktaṃ bhavati—nīlapītādicitrākāraśūnyaṃ nirābhāsaṃ nirañjanaṃ gaganopamaṃ svacchaṃ sakalajagadarthakāri mahākaruṇāyuktaṃ pratyātmavedyaṃ pāramitopadeśaśabdābhidheyaṃ sādhyam iti pāramitānaye prathamaṃ sādhyam.

śobhanāni ca tāni lakṣaṇāni ca dvātriṃśallakṣaṇasaṃjñakāni, tair bhūṣitam. arthaṃ janānāṃ prayojanaṃ kartuṃ śīlaṃ svabhāvo yasya tad arthakāri. dānādīnāṃ daśapāramitānāṃ niṣyandaṃ tatprakarṣaprabhavatvena sadṛśaṃ phalam. duḥkhasya pūrvam eva prahīṇatvāt, sākṣātkaraṇāvasthāyāṃ saukhyasyāpy abhāvāt, upekṣārūpatvenāpetasaukhyam apagatasaukhyam. etad uktaṃ bhavati—dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharāśītyanuvyañjanavirājitaśarīraṃ sakalajagadarthakāri dānādipāramitābhyāsabalenotpannaṃ samyaksaṃbuddharūpaṃ sukhaduḥkharahitatvenopekṣārūpaṃ dvitīyaṃ sādhyam.

commentary: saṃpūryetyādi. dānādipāramitā eva guṇā, guṇyante 'bhyasyanta iti kṛtvā. tān saṃpūrya paripūrṇān kṛtvā, yat saṃbuddhānāṃ kṛtyaṃ sakalam avaśyakartavyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ tad api kṛtvā, bhūtakoṭeḥ śūnyatālakṣaṇāyāś cittacaittanirodhātmikāyā yat sākṣāt karaṇaṃ tad api sādhyam astīti pāramitānayasthā evaṃ bruvate caturthaṃ sādhyam iti.

commentary: svadevatetyādi. svadevatākāraviśeṣeṇa sveṣṭadevatākāreṇa śūnyam, nirākāram iti yāvat. prāg eva prathamataram upadeśānantaram eva devatākāranirapekṣaṃ sukhaṃ sambhāvya, bhāvanayā sākṣāt kṛtvā, sphuṭaṃ sphuṭīkṛtaṃ san mahāsukhasaṃjñakaṃ bhavati. tac ca jagadarthakāri cintāmaṇisamānarūpam. etad uktaṃ bhavati—upadeśānantaram eva mantramudrādevatākārarahitaṃ bhāvanayā sphuṭīkṛtaṃ mahāsukhasaṃjñakaṃ cintāmaṇivaj jagadarthakāri māyopamam āsaṃsārasthāyi dvitīyaṃ sādhyam.
